hotels.name: YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 366 Orchard Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 238904

reviews.review_comment: Booked for 3D2N with balcony, the experience is amazing, room design is great and location is very centralised. Good choice for a short staycay
not bad
Took the balcony room with queen bed. Great view, room is well spaced out.
Good location, clean & comfortable. I love the adorable robot

I was at Yotel Singapore only for two nights. Room was very efficient made, just right as your outside most of the time anyway. I saw I nice mixture in the age of the guests. Guys like me, families and young people. Especially for the young people it is convenient that the hotel is real 2022 ! For me, 64 yrs, when I had some questions all the staff was great with their assistance. Also the IT man (senior) that helped me out with my mobile charge problems. All in all compliments ! Well done all.
Used the room for a birthday celebration & to use the pool! Quite cosy. Just nice for 4 pax. We didn’t stayover though. Convenient location!
Design is smart, bed is smart. There's robot for stuff delivering

reviews.review_title: Dated hotel in a good location ”
reviews.review_comment: The beds were too soft and the air conditioning could be colder. The lights and air conditioning would switch off because of the motion sensor, so it becomes a problem when you are sitting at the toilet bowl a little longer then usual.
It was a great weekend getaway. I just love the view from the room.
Location is very good.. But the BED is realyyyyy bad...veryyyyy uncomfortable...i cannot sleep because the bed..i think they use cheap BED...i will never ever stay in this hotel again

reviews.review_title: Best Value Central Orchard Road Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Yotel is centrally located and reasonably priced for Orchard Road - convenient for everything
very small room, stressful stay
room is for solo or couple only
Room is small. If you’re looking for a solo staycation to rest your mind and charge yourself, this hotel will great for you!
very clean 👍
Nice! Good job.
convience to orchard shopping areas, easy access to MRT. polite and helpful crews.

Yotel is the benchmark for hotels. Ever since my first stay on 31 Dec last year, I’ve never considered any other hotels. It’s been my to-go place for my past two staycations. I’ve already booked my third one and can’t wait to return! Yotel is clean, tidy and has fabulous staff. The hotel feels just like my second home. It feels welcoming and comfortable to stay there. Give Yotel a try! (Or many :P)

Pros: Nicely furnished room with adjustable bed. Body wash, shampoo, conditioner, moisturizer and toothpaste/toothbrush provided. Vanity kit is available upon request. There is also Iron in the room which comes in handy for business traveler. Nice view out the window. International tv channels. AI robot helps to deliver extra bottled waters or towel which is interesting to see. Cons: Room is small. Bathroom floods each time you take a shower. Has self-check in kiosk but not very dummy proof (staff is prompt to jump in and help though).
Clean room, with fantastic location at the heart of Orchard Road. Only thing about the room is that it is very small, door opens right to the bed.
Good location to orchard shopping centres, easy to access subway. helpful crews.
Room is really tiny but hotel is conveniently located near all the huge malls. Within walking distance
Is too small
Neat
Good size compact space of a room. Splendid view from room/balcony. Location is very very good, walking distance to shaw movie theatre, shopping malls and food places.
Sinking in your bed.
Nil
Great location... Clean rooms... Downside.. Rooms service only once in 4 days

The location is good, close to everywhere. However the bed is too soft for comfort, it will sink when we sleep on it, and the room is too damp. I hang a jeans, it felt cold and damp when I wore it the next day.

I would highly recommend this hotel for short staycations. My overall stay was near perfection except for the fact that the housekeeping staff was making so much noise in the early morning around 7-8AM, when most guests are still sleeping. Despite calling the front desk and letting them know about this issue, the noises still persisted the next morning. I am very disappointed with this experience. I'm not talking about any noise, it's those noises where staff were laughing and shouting at the top of their lungs. I hope you can tell your staff to be more considerate for the guests in the future. All in all, I would still come back to stay at this hotel.

reviews.review_title: A Gem in the Heart of Town”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed here twice and the standard has been great and consistent. The staff are nice and friendly and above all professional in helping you no matter how busy they are. The room is small but its comfortable and clean. Price is afforadable for a place located at the buzz of town. Love the view from the room. Will not hesitate to come back again.
Room was small but cozy. Second time staying at Yotel and service and cleanliness was great. Plenty of food around the area as well

reviews.review_title: Great location for Orchard Road shoppers”
reviews.review_comment: A very smart and stylish hotel. I had a great view from the ceiling to floor windows in my room. Loved the cute robots who did room service.

reviews.review_title: Value for money but bed wasn’t the best ”
reviews.review_comment: Good deal for a hotel in the heart of Orchard. Small room but cozy enough. Bed was weird, not sure if it’s the mechanics of the smart bed but partner and I felt like we were sinking in, and if too close to the edge it feels like the bed is pushing you off. May stay again for the convenient location, but not ideal if you’re looking for a good night’s rest.
Great Hotel...
Room is quite small but the incline bed makes a different. Staff was nice and efficient. Location was perfect.
Not too bad! Clean.

Pros: clean. Has all basic amenities. Fantastic location Con: Stayed in the premium room. Had the worst sleep among all the hotels ive stayed in my entire life. The bed was sinking.. also since the bed was able to go up and down, i can feel the bend on the bed ard the area that was able to lift up. I thot only one side was sinking... the whole bed was sinking when i sat around to find a comfortable position. Its was a horrible night sleep. The pillow was alrite. My biggest issue is the bed. A hotel is for u to rest. If u are not fussy about a sinking bed and is ok waking up with a backache, by all means this hotel is for u, otherwise, look elsewhere.
Nope

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Yotel. The view was great from the 27th floor, and although the room is not as big as what you’d get from other hotels, Yotel made sure that it was a good use of space, and every part of the room was well thought out. The facilities/amenities provided were good (including the free welcome Cocktail), and the only gripe I had was the fact that the bath and the room itself is only separated by a glass panel, and water did leak out to the room itself, it’d have been nice if there was a small slope or step from the shower to the room so that it doesn’t happen though. But otherwise, a fantastic place to stay in, and Orchard Road is just a stone’s throw away. Great location. Will definitely come again!
not recommended
Thank you for wishing me happy birthday!thanks for the macarons and birthday cards! Mel,jac and the other guy!
good location and modern hotel
Needs some twin bed for some cases

reviews.review_title: Great locations with modern hotel concept ”
reviews.review_comment: Great locations has making differentiation to this hotel, and support with modern concept especially great bathroom designs able to feel the sun and connected to Orchard. The skin urban lotions, shampoo and etc fm Australia is so nice and upgrade the standard of this hotel. Will definitely staying in this hotel for future visits in Singapore orchard.
Situated in the heart of Orchad Road - strategic location, value for money, love the view (if you're on high floor).
Our stay was comfortable…although its small its really very clean the toilet has bidet the view is fantastic! the location is superb will come back again!
Room is not spacious but has all the necessary facilities and location is great to go to ION orchard wheellock place ets
Best location and affordable prices
I love that the room was really clean and well maintained. It feels really cosy too. No regret booking the room with balcony as the view was beautiful in the evening!

Like the cleanliness and location. Swimming pool is quite small, surprise they don't provide bath robe in room. The space for queen room is only able to fit 2 pax at max. Overall recommended for short staycation.
Hotel room is very clean and compact. Value for money and hotel staff is very friendly.
room though small, has space saving features. i like the feature that allows bed to be propped up. only grasp was the tv that was so bad at connecting to my samsung phone.
Nice cosy room for 1. Has smart tv which is a plus point. Most importantly, it is located in the heart of orchard.
Love the ambience. Staff are warm and friendly. Love the service with a smile. Walking distance to mrt and shopping malls
Small room but very clean and very convenient location. Staff are very friendly n helpful I wish I knew that I had to book for the swimming pool
Most convenient staycation venue in Singapore. Quality staff and efficient check-in process.

reviews.review_title: Great central location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: Cleanliness and location wise is excellent. Not recommended during if going for swimming. No slots after check in, but no one was at the pool. Dissapointed abt this issue. Hopefully reservation for pool can be improve.

reviews.review_title: Nice albeit small room and great location”
reviews.review_comment: Very good service from housekeeping but unprofessional front desk officer (a woman with long hair). She was too harried and harsh towards guests.
Stayed for a night and enjoyed it very much. Room is small but clean and neat. Though the bed is just besides the door, i hardly hear any noise outside. Good location with many amenities nearby
good and nice for a escape
Room was clean when we checked in. It’s located at a good area and provided a lot of useful necessities
While the location is strategic, the bed is quite small for 2 ppl. We have stayed for 3D2N, but the staff never clean the room at all. Not even changing the dustbin. Disappointed.
Best thing is the location. But the room is smsll.
Very good location with awesome staff who are courteous and efficient, room was lovely with clean facilities and comfy bed!

This is my 1st time book with Yotel. My room lock have issue and after informed staff, they fast response to help chg new room for us even ald at the midnight. And give us a free drink to redeem on lvl10. This is professional. The pool is clean ,after swim won't feel uncomfortable. Will come back again.
The smart tv could not connect using ios.
The room is very cozy and nice 😍 2 people is just nice 👌🏻 The location is very convenient as well!

went for 2 days staycay. loved the room , small but compact and very modern! the pillows were really comfy and great to sleep in. Staff were all helpful since the beginning cause I made a wrong double booking and they help me out sort the problem out. Highly recommended and will be back to staycay again!
Friendly and Caring staff and surprising wishes for me with bday card & delicious macaroons. Like 👍🏼
Small room vs great location.
Super comfy bed and pillows. Great location as well.
The bed and pillow are super comfortable. Once u lie down, u wont feel like waking up again
The room and the view is AMAZING!!

Had a great stay! Booked the room with the balcony. The hotel accommodated our request for a high floor and gave us a room on the highest floor. The view was amazing! The service at the restaurant is excellent. Kudos to Matthew who went the extra mile for us. Not to mention the food as well -it was tasty and certainly value for money!
Bed can incline like hospital bed, pillows are good, many places to hang your stuff. Had a good view from the toilet

The staffs are attentive and gave a small gift token n birthday card on my birthday (though I didnt make any special request). the room is clean and had a great view overlook the city. Will definite go back again
Room is clean. Only the bed could have been better. Follows the weight so not really firm and stable.
delayed flight, does not wish to modify the stay, even with a supplement

Stayed there for 4 night. Superb location as its close to all amenities. Best place to walk around all the Malls in Orchard. I arrived earlier, the staff was very accomodating by allowing me to do early check-in. The in house cafe have good varieties of food & beverage selection. Only sad back, the bed is very small & not so comfortable. Was having back pain. Apart from that it was a perfect stay
staff was friendly and gave my boyfriend free snacks as it was his birthday. The room was clean. I especially loved the bed.
Your nice is so nice but your room is too small

Yotel's rooms are extremely small. It is really not worth the money. Queen bed doesn't feel like queen sized. Very small, even for 2 normal sized adults. Check in time is late at 3pm, check out time is early at 11am. Do not come here. There are other cheaper hotel deals you can get on carou-sell even. Do not come here. Rooms are not worth it.
Best hotel for a short getaway
Good for solo staycation! Not able to use miracast for my netflix shows but if you bring your own hdmi cable, that’ll be good! Bluetooth connection works for spotify. Overall it was a pleasant stay!
Bedding is sad
Very convenient near orchard.Hotel is nice,received the corner top room with a cityview.Love the bed super comfortable.
The room is rather small but the layout is cleverly designed to optimise the use of the limited space. One suggestion - a shower curtain will help to prevent the whole toilet being wet
There are 6 lifts in the hotel, but the waiting time for lift is still very long!
This is my 2nd visit to Yotel, first king room with Balcony is definitely worth the money, the room is super clean and the views are great!
You’ve got to be here & feel the cozy & nice view of either SG sun rise or Sun rise….
Thr bed was really comfortable and the hotel took note that we were there for our anniversary, and gave us a surprise gift. Really thankful of that. Will visit again.

Its a nice hotel even tho its a bit small but the soap and shampoo smells so nice on top of that theres lotion as well. The bed is the best part which is adjustable and super comfy!! And dont even get me started with the channels there was so many channels on the tv like astro and korean channels. Overall was a super pleasant stay i would definitely come again
Will repeat again !
Good value for money.... The city view at night was nice. The bed is very comfortable....If they have smart tv mean great.

It's a cute futuristic hotel that had a view in the toilet. Stayed there for 4 days 2 nights. The pool is quite nice. The restaurant also has good food. The room looks like in a futuristic set up. They call it a cabin. It's kinda tight for a queen sized bed. For travelers who have a back problem like me... The bed is quite soft for support. I guess it's built that way so that it can be bent. There is also no proper table which made it hard for me to do some desk top work. I used the foldable thing built below the tv which also works but not for longer hours. So if u plan to stay there and so some work, it's not a good place. I love the view from the toilet tho! Dint have the chance to experience Yoshi and Yolanda but I guess you guys should check it out! They're cute robots! 😍
Good choice if you want to feel like you're in the future! :)
This will be my Go To Hotel from now on! I love the service and I’m grateful that the staff accommodated my early check in request! Thank you Yotel Orchard! I will definitely come back!
Can be better
A nice place and comfortable environment

hotels.name: Hotel Chancellor@Orchard
hotels.address: 28 Cavenagh Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 229635

reviews.review_comment: Convenient location for downtown hang out. Rooms are with reasonable size for the price.
No channels.
Nice room, cleaniness good, staff polite and good service. Location fantastic...well worth the money.
I stayed for 6 nights, but the room key didn't respond well and I had a lot of trouble getting in and out of the elevator and the room. I consulted with the receptionist once, but it didn't improve.
Cant expect much for its price , Overall good stay.

This hotel is a bit old but the location is superb for the value if you need to do business around Orchard. Need to upgrade the cleanliness especially the bathroom (some yellow stain on the wall) and also on the bed cover which a little bit yellowish. Should provide more hangers in the closet only 2 hangers? It has a very good size Swimming pool which very helpful after a busy hot day.
If you like quiet environment.this will be good for you.

reviews.review_title: Hidden gem a stone throw away from Somerset MRT”
reviews.review_comment: Very close to Orchard road and Somerset MRT. My room overlooked the expressway and the Istana, which was an amazing view to wake up to every morning. Could hardly hear the traffic at all. The room itself looked partially refurbished, but otherwise very comfortable and well-sized (for a city hotel). I enjoyed the hot water machine, much better than the standard kettle supplied in hotel rooms. Hotel wifi was stable and fast, but unsecured. This is not big issue unless you are concerned about cybersecurity over an unsecured network (e.g. banking). Each room does come with a secured network (password-protected), but it was down during my stay and took 4 days to set up, hopefully this has been rolled out for all the rooms by now. Hotel staff were helpful and supportive through my stay, the manager understood my concerns and personally ensured my request was resolved. Would definitely consider staying again.
The hotel is very old and all the rooms have an old smell, old furniture and a cabinet for storing your clothing all have an old smell. I did not enjoy my stay.
Front desk bit harsh. Not reply properly

Good but don't expect too much for the price. Check-in is slow. Queue is long but there are ppl walking ard at counter not willing to open more counters. Got a room with 2 single beds when requested for double. Tell us can merge the beds ourself.. but later realized not possible also. Tv remote not working. Corridor got a v.strong stench in the morning.
it a nice hotel and comfortable. if u dont mind it look old and need littlee brush up. if you re not fussy i recommended it. good for short stay which nearby to shop and sight see city
Height is too high for a short person like me (165cm) Slipped and fall and had a really bad bruise
1. Took 2 hours waiting time for check in - long queue and very slow staffs 2. The lady filipino receptionist was very unfriendly when we ask about the pool reservation.

Room not cleaned. Amenities just dumped in a bag and dumped on the floor corner of the room! Staff were not helpful. 2 beds but only gave 1 pillow and i blanket. When asked for extra, another set came without covers! Called and asked again, the only thing dey can say is they will check. But nothing happened. Wanted to book for pool. Were told at reception to call "0" from the room. Called "0" from the room, was told to go down reception!!

We were greated by super long Queue at the reception which leads us to a Q even out of hotel which we were fine since its the start of a holiday. After a 45mins Q, someone started distributing Q number and moving us to 2nd level to sit and wait. After waiting another 30min our number was called and we were made to go back down to reception and resumed our Q. Since our Q no was on a bigger number, we had to wait for the front to be cleared. We asked a staff why we were shifted up and down and still in a Q. He rumbled and was angrily blaming his chairman for reducing the room rate that causes the overbooking. Over at the check in counter, we saw 3 struggling front desk staff with super long chcek in procedures that also contributed to the not moving Q. When our turn, we were welcomed by a stressed looking gentleman who told us they are left with only single rooms. We offered to wait for housekeepers have not finish cleaning the room so we can get what we booked for

Waste 45min waiting for the check in. Even check out also need to Q up n wait. Room is below expectation Everything look n feel so old Cleanliness is below expectation The corridor smell rotten Not a good experience staying there
Libby sofa very old and dirty

Generally was a clean room. Mattress was comfy but pillows were too soft n low not the usual feather down one would expect. Only a few cable channels and youtube access. Tried to connect laptop to hdmi tv but unsuccessful as room wifi was not working. Breakfast was a simple bento sent to room. No bidet in toilet. Location was great, within walking distance to alot of eateries, malls & movies.
strategic location makes it easy for us who bring 2 toddlers to go easily. clean rooms, friendly staff.
Staff ramah
Hotel is abit old and rusty

The staff very kind, I was supposed to pay another cost for late checkout. When I explain to the staff that I was Lost because i was wrong get the bus, he said ok you dont have to pay for late check out
It's a bit out of Orchard Road and not really in the shopping area.
walking distance to Orchard Road
City center just around Orchard Road. The room is just good enough for resting after all-day activity
Excellent location to go shopping
Awesome location very close to public transit, rooftop pool tons of shopping nearby. 10/10 would recommend
Service was horrible. Staff were very rude and the room was hap hazard
The breakfast wasn't good
excellent as always
good location
great for money and comfortable
Terrible place, no rooms with balcony available, no smoking in the entire hotel and the worst breakfast ever had.
Car park is very expensive. Room is not too bad. Good for short and budget stay.
It was a very convenient and relaxing stay for me, my mother and my mother-in-law. Very near to train stations, malls, restaurants

I was having meeting at the hotel is very strategic to the place I was going to. Brought my spouse also, and she was happy to be able to walk around Orchard Road on her own since the hotel is nearby. No complaints
Bit more choice of tv channels would be nice.
Staff are great hotel has good vibe

reviews.review_title: It is in heart of the city so convenient”
reviews.review_comment: If you want to be in heart of the city.........this is it.

reviews.review_title: Great location for shopping on Orchard road”
reviews.review_comment: Pros we’re the great location and very competent and helpful manager, Dimitri. The hotel caters primarily for guests from India. Rooms were small, but clean and functional. Major downside is the terrible breakfast buffet and shabby restaurant.
Typically Singapore service, no smile "Receptionist only"
Great Stay. Great Price.. Cosy and Clean..
No shampoo and conditioner are provided.
Can't complain, pretty good place.
The beauty of this hotel is the location - a 2 minute walk to Somerset with the MRT, shops and restaurants. The hotel itself is ok. Clean and good value for money.

reviews.review_title: I dont have chance to stay at this hotel, since Singapore “Red” for the Corona Virus, ”
reviews.review_comment: I felt disappointed since wasted my money then I cant reschedule the hotel although I have written an email to agoda if it is possible to reschedul since Singapor “ Red” condition for the Corona Virus, for my safety I postphone my travel, luckly I can reschedul the ticket but not for the hotel

reviews.review_title: Poor experience dominated by staff with attitude”
reviews.review_comment: A decent hotel in central SG - good price considering location - is spoiled by staff who go on the attack when you ask for reasons behind some decisions. Considering i paid in advance, i was surprised to be asked for a S$50 deposit. When i questioned this there appeared to be no reason so i was met with wishy-washy responses like 'we'll tell the management'. But this response was from the Duty Manager. Who was he going to tell? Himself? On checking out i asked for a receipt. The person behind the counter said i should ask Agoda, so I asked why they couldn't supply one and i got less than friendly response followed by the person staring at the desk for the rest of the conversation and mumbling 'uh-huh, uh-huh, yes I AM Listening.' Although they clearly has no interest in listening. All in all guest relations seemed more in line with prisons, than a hotel. It made the last guests half-eaten cake and snacks that i found in my fridge no more than an unhygienic after-thought.
I will not recommend any my family and friends, staff are rude and not helpful
Restaurant does not cater for Australians and there is no option for a decent evening meal.

The room is not that spacious. But the location is perfect for you who only stayed 24 hour in Singapore. We came during the corona virus. So when we arrived the staff checking our body temprature before we going inside the lobby. The staff was super nice she even offer us a late check out, since we check-in pretty much late too.
The hotel is too old and not up to the 4 star standard. Staff seem busy with bus loads of tourists and have little time if you are not on one of the tour buses they operate.
no reviews because we were not able to push thru with our travel to sg and stay at the hotel because of the corona virus scare..we tried to ask for a reconsideration but no response.thanks anyway..

reviews.review_title: Breakfast was served as if you’re in a third world country. Food trays are always empty. ”
reviews.review_comment: Room needs more attention in cleanliness.
Not very convenient to reach town
close to orchard road and mrt somerset. Room is basic but clean. Consider good price for Singapore standard.
If any of you are looking for a hotel which located in Orchard, I would like to recommend this hotel.
Best location, clean and comfort
Overall Good Only If They Could Put Water Hose Near The The Toilet Bowl For Ppl To Wash Up After Doing (Business) will be good. Housekeeping very friendly and doing good job.
no comment
Breakfast was very below standard. Nothing tempting. Location of Hotel is good.
Room is so dusty. not clean. Also not handbook for water tool which hotel provided. Staff does not change towel for guess

reviews.review_title: Not chean hotel, Absolute NOT a 4 star”
reviews.review_comment: I had book 5 nights 14 -19 Jan in this hotel, and that was a BIG mistake. The hotel as Agoda say its a 4 star hotel but its not even a 3 stars worth. Hotel lobby as hallway have a bad smell, room was even worse..bathroom have a smell like a public toilet (urine) the bedsheet was dirty and strongly change after 1 night. Feel likethere are flees in the room

reviews.review_title: We had a very pleasant stay”
reviews.review_comment: We had a very pleasant stay
Elevators not working properly and very slow, too crowded
Very old and very nasty hotel. Full of chinese tourists. The hallways are dark and gloomy, and there were a lot of shady people. Only good for those just wanting a sleep and checking out the next day
Great location and access to train station and restaurants. Worth the money and good stay on our booking.
Best value for money.
I am happy because a lot of mall at surounding of hotel
Hotel needs badly renovation. The room has very unpleasant smell. And the interior is rundown.
nice place in orchard in a budget price, the room is enought for a couple, very cold AC, Near Sommersert. Decent place to stay.

reviews.review_title: Breakfast is limited, few dishes only”
reviews.review_comment: Staff at receiving door (for breakfast ) is not good, not friendly
Good place and hygiene

Location is the winning chip for this hotel. It is close to Orchard malls, the post office and the MRT. There is also a small Hawker place a block towards Orchard Road. ON the other hand, I suspect the hotel has been around for some time now and it is quite obvious with some of its room facilities. The staff can also use some upgrade or refresher on hospitality and clientele relations. I am sure some adjustments will make this hotel a high contender for more clientele, even more than it already is.
The standard of the hotel is not as it has been rated. New owner but the hotel is not fresh, clean and tidy
Location is great, centre of Singapore
Good location but too expensive. The room is very small. There are much better hotels than this.

The location is best between Somerset and Dhoby Ghaut station. Lots of shopping malls within few mins walk(unless you hate walking under Singapore’s hot scorching sun). Hotel itself is just okay average; during my check in there were lack of front desk agents and they were too preoccupied with themselves + when asked for room service at early morning, staff were saying that we need to wait until the housekeeping clock in which is very unprofessional (not to mention the tone of annoyance on the phone). Room-wise, the hot water dispenser is very useful however, placed too high, probably suitable for tall guests, but it would be difficult for shorter people to see into the cup (very dangerous for hot water). Body wash/shampoo wasn’t filled up enough upon check in; room wasn’t prepared thoroughly. Other than that everything’s great great. It’s a good location and price and hotel with enough facilities, if the service improves I believe guests will feel more welcomed&comfortable!

Hotel is located next street of Orchad, location is very good for being in Center. Rooms and baths are too small, you just pay this price for location, if you don't interest on Orchad you can check for Hotels/Apartments in other regions better than there, but if you are looking to be around Orchad and would like to go room for just sleeping, that's very good. I just had unexpected visit and made reservation just after I landed to Singapore, for that situation i didn't have too much option and it was fine, but If I come for holiday I do not choose this hotel for sure.
it' a good hotel with helpful staff.

reviews.review_title: Swimming pool on rooftop is excellent but the room and hall way ugly. Bad ambience ”
reviews.review_comment: Swimming pool on rooftop is excellent but the room and hall way are ugly
Hotel Chancellor location is near MRT, Full room amenities include a dispenser.
Everything was perfect and loved the location close to everything.

Yes, the location is fabulous! The room satisfactory. Decor tired but the linen was white and fresh. Wasn't keen on the waterheater for a cup of tea. Confusing to operate. Minimal tea/coffee satchets (2 x teabags) Staff very pleasant and attentive at the front desk. Breakfast unsatisfactory. The worst I've had anywhere and I'm not fussy! Dining staff disinterested. I needed my earplugs for a good nights rest as the traffic noise disturbed me but I am a very light sleeper. Summary : Probably worthy of its 3 * status due to the location, cleanliness and the pool looked clean and inviting. Recommend eating elsewhere.
Modern and nothing special, but decent price and good location for what we wanted

No Hygenie at their breakfast. We got food poisoning from eating there plus over priced. The rooms were tiny. Tv and fridge were not working. The bathroom lock was broken. Over all not a great experience. Will never go there again.

Located on the road next to Orchard road so the popular malls MRT stations and bus stops are within wlaking distance. Room was clean. Pool is good for lap swimmers (approximately 28m long) but a little narrow which wasn't too much of an issue when we used it before 8am.
The reception was very unfriendly and arrogant

This is the mostly dirty hotel we have stay. When we check in. The toilet seat still have urine stain on it. The floor is dirty as well and once we lay down on the bed, our leg and body being to be itchy. Stay there for 3 hours max and check out. This is not even a 4star hotel. Feel like a 1star or even 0 star!!!
1. Hotel reception staff is wonderful - Ms Helen is really courteous & helpful 2. Worth e money - simple but clean facility. 3. Great location - near to MRT stations ie sommerset & dhoby ghaut

reviews.review_title: toilet very dirty when it wet . mean no cleaning at all”
reviews.review_comment: only location
House keeping staff very unhappy working there.
The room is very basic there are much better hotels for value for money
- best location - best value for money - nearby plaza singapure & orchard -near mrt sommerset - will stay here again thanks! :)

I like how the hotel room provided a water filter dispenser. Bed and pillows were comfortable, hotel breakfast was great. Good location, located near Orchard malls. There were not many amenities but the roof top pool was okay. Hotel reception service and waiting time could be improved...
Pls put a hose near the toilet bowl. Check in time at 2pm.

reviews.review_title: The location is very strategic for shoppers. ”
reviews.review_comment: The bathroom is relatively small. The facilities in the hotel room is just too basic.
check-in was fuss free, the room was clean and the WiFi is fast! love it.right smack in the cbd!

hotels.name: Marina Bay Sands (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 10 Bayfront Avenue, Marina Bay, Singapore, Singapore, 018956

reviews.review_comment: Always a good stay

Still one of the best hotel I’ve stayed because it’s at the prime location where there are food, shopping and relaxation (massage). Staffs are friendly and accommodating to my requests. Cleanliness still needs to improve slightly for the bedsheets and towel as I saw some stains. Otherwise everything is still good.

reviews.review_title: Room with the view of the sea”
reviews.review_comment: The view of the harbour/sea is amazing and the size of the room is definitely worth it for the price. You should definitely stay here to experience the infinity pool. I would highly recommend getting the room with the view of the sea and the gardens.
I was there one night with my family and would say it provided very good service from the hotel staff and overall very fun experiences for the kids

We are VTL traveller. The hotel do help us for quick check in. However the hotel is very tedious for facilities booking, attend to our needs and treat us like a fault as we booked the hotel through agoda.

reviews.review_title: love it and worth the money”
reviews.review_comment: The experience is just so amazing. Stayed at MBS to celebrate husband's birthday and we never regret it at all. Absolutely clean room. Beautiful neat comfortable. Nothing can go wrong. Room came with a very romantic balcony facing the gardens by the bay such a beautiful view in the evening and in the morning. Reception is well organise having the queue number so its not overcrowding. And everyone is just so friendly. Love it and definitely coming back!

Due to covid, can only book 1 hour slot at pool. Unfortunately, even when checking the pool bookings earlier than the advised 24hour period, there was only one time slot left....11pm. However, staff are very kind and accommodating, giving surprise treats for belated birthday and sent up baths salts when requested.
Very friendly staff at the check in counter.

Stay was good, except we did not know that we still had to get a queue number to check in when we arrived at the check in time, which is 3pm. Our queue number only allowed us to start checking in at 5pm. We hope the hotel will increase its efficiency on the check in process. By the time we got the room, it was already after 5pm.

Stayed in MBS on 3 Dec to 6 Dec as a means of getting away from home. Generally, MBS is good except for the below:- 1) Pillow too soft 2) Shower head is fixed (I am used to a shower head that I can hold on to) 3) The day before my checkout (5 Dec), there were loud noises ("pom") like explosion coming from the ceiling (noon time) for about 30mins to an hour. I thought sound proofing in hotels were good but it is proven wrong. As it stopped, I did not call for assistance. 4) Too many people at the lobby waiting to check-in or checking-in. I think the check-in system is great. We can book for a slot and get a number. I got an upgrade and got a room with a great view. It was great! The staff who helped me with the check-in was great too.

reviews.review_title: Not suitable if you're looking for a quiet/cosy place”
reviews.review_comment: It is not a hotel with a proper lobby... If u wan a private cosy hotel, this is definitely not the place. There's no actual lobby. The ground floor lobby where the check~in counter and concierge is more like a public thorough fare where all kind of people are there ie, those visiting the casino, those visiting the linked sandy Bay mall, tourists and local alike who just wanna drop in to see the place. Not sure if it is due to current pandemic, it is such a pain that each time to take the lift to go up the room u need to announce your room number and all the occupants names for the "gatekeeper" to register into his laptop and likewise when you exit the lift... What a pain!!
Not the cheapest, but has a great time enjoying central location.

reviews.review_title: Central location, nice skyline and garden view from ”
reviews.review_comment: Central location with lots of good restaurants within hotel and shoppes. A quick getaway staycation.
Fantastic Hotel! 10/10
Very friendly staff .. helpful . Would coming back again n recommend for my family n friends ..
Great
I was the older child and it was a great place for a staycay to celebrate my dad's birthday, being in a great location with good food and views and facilities
Ambience awesome, nice place to recharge, relax and chill
Nice pool view

reviews.review_title: One of the best staycay ever”
reviews.review_comment: I was super impressed by MBS standard of service. From the valet to the staff at the Express Service to even the lifeguards at the Infinity Pool, all gave top-notch service. We got a Premier city view at Tower 1 and remained at this tower even at the Infinity Pool. Best sunset view ever and not crowded (unlike at Tower 3, not sure why). There was an option to use the jacuzzi but we opted out of it just cos we were to enamoured by the city view the whole 1hr15min time we were there.
Both of us enjoyed our 1 night we at MBS. We loved waking up to see the magnificent city view from our bed.
Booked the garden view, I’ll be coming back for it in the near future. Absolutely nice view! Worth it! 😊
Too pricy for room size and quality. Ritz Carlton provides better value for money.
Great hotel with great views and facilities!
Much better than we expected. Great weekend helped immensely by the free room upgrade. Thanks to all the staff!
The staff are all efficient and of course the room are spacious and infinity pool is the best!
Managed to get good upgrade of room
Finally we get to stay here! I love the infinity pool! It’s not too crowded due to covid so it’s really nice to take photo. Room is big and clean. Staff are friendly. Thank you.

reviews.review_title: Literally, the Top of the World”
reviews.review_comment: Staying at Marina Bay Sands was the highlight of our COVID years. We thought, perhaps once in a lifetime we'll try this hotel and pamper ourselves. The view, the pool, the hospitality and the food, we thought we knew MBS as we've been visiting here so many times for various occasions, we were wrong. The experience was beyond our expectations we're considering to stay again soon!

We would like to shout out to Dyana Din, the amazing front desk staff who checked us in. She kindly attended to our request and gave us an amazing room. She really made our first anniversary extra special! Thanks Dyana!!!

I specially booked a room for marriage proposal as the environment and scenery is pretty. Although my proposal failed, I still want to say thanks to the front office for their excellent hospitality. Many thanks and I appreciate it very much

reviews.review_title: Definitely one of the best hotels in Singapore”
reviews.review_comment: We were given a free upgrade to a suite! My sons were over the moon when they saw the room. V beautiful and clean. Only thing agoda package does not come with free breakfast and complimentary valet parking.
Stunning place to get away for awhile
Ive been there for hollidays... good hotel.. good staff..
near the attractions, great foods,

reviews.review_title: The Best Staycation Ever in Singapore”
reviews.review_comment: You could expect the finest services from this well-known hotel. It could be due to off-peak, my wife and I had a complimentary upgrade to premium room at level 38 with the stunning view of Garden By The Bay & ocean. The room came with Nespresso machine with 4 signature capsules. We had also ordered In-room dining for dinner (Marinara Spaghetti & Fish and Chips) & breakfast (Baker's Basket), the foods were absolutely great. Overall it was the best experience so far for our staycation!

Marina Bay stands by their standards! Always giving me the best service without fail. Vathya from Check-In counter was the cherry on top in this staycation. She gave me an awesome upgrade. On point gave us our anniversary cake! All the staff are helpful and cheerful. Connected with the Marina Bay sands mall this hotel gives you everything that you need when in vacation. 100% world class.

There is no 24hrs convenience shop for customers staying at the hotel to buy small items. The only 1 closed at 11pm. Mbs claims to be one of the best hotel yet, cannot even get to buy simple things after 11pm.
good
good
Best Stay

Good registration system with mobile queue number and the staff Dyana served me well. Upgrade my room from Deluxe to Premier for my occasion. Room with superb view! Valet parking with multiple entry. Hassle free!
Best shopping area

MBS is a really great place to stay for a staycation. The room is clean, spacious and have all the required amenities. The Infinity Pool was amazing, and breathtaking. The only issue we encountered during our stay is the rude staff (and provided us wrong information about the booking system for the Infinity Pool) that was monitoring the entrance to the Infinity Pool on our first day. But the hotel staff made it up with an extended check out timing. Shout out to Devi, the staff that help us with the check-in. Amazing service from her. 10/10 would recommend it here.

reviews.review_title: I dont like the rigid ambassadors at the lift lobby”
reviews.review_comment: one of my staycay that I dont quite like
Love staying at Marina Bay Sand . Love the ambiance , the hospitality and the pleasant and ever helpful staff . Make your staycation memorable
Excellent and convenient place to be for short staycation
not bad

We booked 2 rooms to celebrate my dad's birthday. Service is consistently good, be it at the reception, the room service, the rise restaurant, the pool or the staff stationed outside our lift lobby. Our rooms were facing the beautiful Gardens by the bay. The morning sun rise was a treat. We also enjoyed ourselves tremendously at the pool, though the water was icy cold. Within short walking distance to attractions like Gardens by the bay and Art science museum. Will definitely love to stay there again!

Book it to celebrate my hubby’s birthday. Not only was there a Birthday Cake delivered to the room, we got a free upgrade too! Fantastic view of the harbour and the staff were super friendly. My little boy’s need is well looked after as most of the restaurant and facilities are kids friendly. Definitely recommend anyone looking for somewhere chill and relax in SG!
NORMAL 3 STARS
very good
nice hotel...will come again
The hotel room was nice and clean, staff was accomodating however one of the main attractions which was the infinity pool was fully booked during our stay..
Check in was a hassle. Otherwise it is a perfect experience for the family.
Totally best. Unbelievable view 👍👍👍👍

Book directly from hotel may have better advantage as hotel will send you the SMS for check-in time, and the link to book the infiniti pool - which you may wait longer at the hotel and may not get any slot for the swimming if wait till check-in.

The room is very spacious and it's located at Tower 2, Club King City View. The kids luv it. Only during this period you need to pre-book the swimming pool. We are so lucky there is a slot available at the very last minute. You need to keep on trying to see the web-link. Upon check in, we also received the complimentary box of cholate and the drinks in the fridge & snacks in the cabinets are free too. The bathub is huge. Only they the toilet do not have any bidet. They should have one. Thanks.
Love the stay there. Would have loved the tv to be less outdated. Otherwise, sky park and Infiniti pool was nice! The room is big and spacious!
Checkin takes more than one hour.There was no waiting area .People with kids and old people were standing despite paying such high charges per night
Good staycation in MBS with Family room. Spacious and clean . 👍👍👍

My family tremendously enjoyed our stay at the MBS. Thank you to the caring and efficient staff. You guys made it really worthwhile. Hotel was crowded and booked but each and every staff gave their personal touch to their client’s individual concerns. Thank you for your quality service!
There is only one Halal dining place that is at the Shoppes - Beanstro.

First time to MBS, we are greeted with welcoming staff and everything was top notch! We love the infinity pool as well! As we are celebrating our wedding anniversary, we have a complimentary cake to celebrate our special day too! We had a wonderful staycation at MBS!
Overall quite satisfied. Great location. Breakfast buffet is too pricey. Perhaps can consider to offer free parking for guests based on their stay?
IT'S A REALLY NICE HOTEL

We had a great time. However, check in process took us about an hour. You might want to get queue number before reach the hotel to avoid long waiting time. Swimming pool session also need to book due to self distancing measure.
Our family had a great stay, hotel is impressive
Booked the hotel as a birthday surprise for the fiancee. Perfect view, perfect environment.
Hotel location very convenient and staffs all very friendly . Highly recommend must stay here if you travel in Singapore.
I was expecting that you will arrange honeymoon amenity to be sent to our room after check in.... When we book we never recieve notice that the infinity pool is by booking.
Staff were friendly and the check in and check process was smooth and fast. the room view was amazing and the cleaniness was great. just that they did not have in room dining
Thank you for making my mom's birthday a memorable one, Marina Bay Sands! <3

For people who are for staycation, there are plenty of stuff you can do, from eating, shopping, entertainment, sightseeing can be all done under one roof. So do not need to do any planning. Will come again to stay another day!
Overall a good experience but just that the time allocated for using the pool at just 1hr a day per room is not really enough.

Booked MBS for our wedding anniversary.Told them to decorate but i didnt proceed with it but they automatically left us a cake when we left the room for the pool. The staff are very professional. The infinity pool was the best experience. The view from our room was spectacular
must have seen/been infinity pool

reviews.review_title: Marina Bay Sands garden suites views”
reviews.review_comment: Garden suite room view awesome, looking out to the gardens by the bay and sea view
Our first time in Marina Bay Sands was really great. The staff are all so friendly and helpful. The room view was nice, not bad.

MBS does not disappoint - even with the pandemic, the booking system for the facilities is fuss free. We had free flow snacks and the staff topped up the complimentary mineral water bottles very generously after cleaning our room. Staff are polite - from the valet all the way to the cleaning staff and it was definitely an excellent experience at MBS! Definitely worth the money too.

reviews.review_title: Bland. Uninspiring. Without its infinity pool”
reviews.review_comment: Staff were exceptionally courteous and helpful despite being inundated with typical demanding guests. Although a visit to the concierge failed to materialise a housekeeping request. A premium booking with what I believed had accompanying premium perks, failed to realise a visit to its top floor infinity pool. No doubt due to some poorly managed poorly strategised ‘Q’ system. Leaving ones only impression limited to its bland accommodations, tasteless in-room dining and scratchy bathroom linen. Final say; Not coming back.
Really had a wonderful experience during my stay at MBS. check-in & out was smooth. Clean hotel room. and good customer services

Had a 3D2N stay at MBS. While the view from the room was spectacular (granted that you book rooms at the higher level), there is room for improvement for the staff service. The staff service was rather inconsistent, with a small handful of hotel staff providing excellent service and majority of the hotel staff providing mediocre service. The only memorable service received was when the receptionist managed to squeeze us in for a slot for the infinity pool. We had a not so good experience when we were given inconsistent message regarding utensils request. At first they told us it was chargeable if we request for more than a dozen of utensils. When we clarified with the receptionist during our check-out, she said that requesting for utensils is not chargeable at all, regardless of number of utensils requested. Quite inconsistent in the message given... Most of the staff there were also quite unenthusiastic, not the kind of service level I was expecting from MBS. Perhaps it is because of the high volume of Singaporeans doing staycation there?

Swimming is a rush during the covid period. But it's not the hotel's fault. In fact, they are making it as pleasant as possible. I wish there was food options from room service. Other than that, we had a very satisfying stay.

No doubt, the price per night is quite costly for an average Singaporean like myself. But it was our honeymoon night and even though we could not travel for our honeymoon, we are really glad we chose to stay at MBS. We had such an amazing time at MBS. From the moment we stepped out of the car, until the moment that we checked out - the service was extremely top notch from the staff at MBS. Shoutout to Firdaus from the Sky Park and his team, as well as Pauline from the receptions team, for the highly commendable service. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.
Tip: Be sure to SMS 'Q' for the infinity pool once you get your confirmation code for your booking. It is likely to be fully booked if you decide to queue for the pool on check-in day in COVID times.

From the beginning all the way till the end - they treated us very well. It was my birthday so my friends left a cake at reception, they kindly located the package and sent it over my room. They helped us book restaurants as well! For the pool - you must book a 1 hour slot during the day. It was a busy weekend so there were no more slots available in the booking website. They kindly found us a slot at 11pm - just nice for a midnight swim. It was actually a better option, nice view of the night lights. The rooms weren't anything special, but the view and the service is stellar!

reviews.review_title: Hotel with good location and exceptional view”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel location is very ideal as it in the heart of the city. The shoppes (mall) connected to the hotel added to its convenience. There’s a lot of restaurants to choose from and a food court too. MRT is just right there too. The infinity pool is the cherry on the top however, due to covid-19, it’s access is limited to an hour and you have to book it in advance. You are force to vacate after the given slot as they clean the facilities (sunbeds, tables, etc) and prepare it for the next slot. It feels restricting but gives you security as well that everything has been cleaned and safe. In room food is quite pricey but delish!

PROS.. Hotel is located at the heart of Singapore. Has a great view over looking the CBD on 1 side and Gardens By the Bay on the other. The infinity pool was great. Free minibar. Staffs are friendly too. CONS.. Too expensive. Room was so-so for a Luxury Hotel Resort. Using of pool and gym requires booking the night before and system a bit lagging. No free parking provided. Check in at 1500hr, Check Out at 1100hr.
The staff at the pool was very kind and friendly.
The view from our hotel is fantastic. Staff is friendly. Definitely a good staycation.

reviews.review_title: It depends on your travelling experience”
reviews.review_comment: To those who cant read long reviews, if youve stayed in hotels like the Hilton in Tokyo, MBS is strictly okay only. But if you don't travel and only stay locally, MBS is slightly above average. Location, convenient enough since it's right next to the bayfront mrt and walking distance to the attractions such as gardens by the bay,shopping malls etc. Facilities were okay, shower head was a little rusty but it was plastic, not sure what's happening there. The table beside the bed was dusty AF, just happened to drop my child's milk bottle behind it and dust was literally flying everywhere. Balcony facing the gardens by the bay was nice but floor was dirty and took the grand out of the view a little. Skypark was the worse. View was mediocre at best. Maps that were printed in multiple languages at the viewing areas were peeling off, signs were faded due to rain or sun. Apparently maintenance took a day off here. Value for money? I paid around 600 for one night, quite affordable for a hotel of this calibre but I definitely would not consider it value for money. If it was heavily discounted, I might recommend MBS, other than that, you're better off elsewhere. Unless you're filthy rich and have no concept of money. Staff fortunately was the saving grace for this entire endeavour. Pleasant, polite and helpful.

reviews.review_title: Horrible service and not value for money at all”
reviews.review_comment: Service was horrible. Front desk staffs were arrogant. Queues forever building up checking in took so long. Opened up so many rooms for stay yet only allow a max of 200 ppl at the pool. As a result you either you either have to go wake up Super early to try your luck with their lousy Q system or wait until late before you can even know if you can come up to swim. No complimentary parking for hotel guests. Ridiculous check out timing at 1100hrs. Staffs were not accommodating in any way. Seems like they only pay attention to their VIPs and disregard everyone else. All in all, MBS is nice to look at but not the best to stay in if you’re in Singapore. Never coming back and wasting my money.
great view, nice pool

Due to COVID-19, my partner and I could not travel overseas to celebrate our first anniversary. After much thoughts, we decided to plan a staycation over at MBS. This was our very first stay in MBS and we had an amazingly fabulous time, all thanks to the great hospitality provided by MBS. Knowing we were celebrating our first anniversary, MBS was so sweet to prepare us a cake. We were very surprised and felt so thankful. We would also like to express our heartfelt thanks to the front desk staff, Mary Jane, for assisting us in our check-in. Her attitude was really good. She made an effort to explain the terms and conditions by MBS and also the different kinds of facilities that MBS provides. Thank you Mary Jane, thank you MBS.

reviews.review_title: If you arent wealthy and rich this review is for you”
reviews.review_comment: If you want to experience infinity pool on floor 57 which and awesome buffet food and great view this is for you. Its expensive and I stayed for one night and it was worth it. But 1 night was enough to me to get the experience. If I want some luxury in my life maybe then I'll visit again. Staff was nice., Rooms we're nice and location. But the location is a bit isolated if tou want to stroll around. Probably need taxi for that or I just didnt find my way out of the hotel : ) Try to get the room as high floor as possible. I was at 47 and view was nice.
Really friendy staff at the reception, at the luggage store even in the restaurant.

You pay for the sky bar, pool, view and architecture, worth doing, however after you’ve experienced it there are other luxury hotels that are less crowded. The housing keeping is excellent, rooms r extremely well cleaned.

Hello there, We have already made a call to cancel the Business trip due to the employee is unfit to go travel. Appreciate it if you could give us feedback on whether the Hotel can be refunded or not. Thank you.
Couldn't get better than this. AMAZING!!!

hotels.name: ibis budget Singapore Ruby (SG Clean Certified, Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 10 Lorong 20, Geylang, Singapore, Singapore, 398730

reviews.review_comment: Good value place, lots of great places to eat around the hotel. Don't be worried that it is in a red light area, no one hassles you. Friendly manager as well. One downside is that it's not really close to an MRT.
The hotel was centrally located. We have a great stay. Nice rooms.
I needed a place to sleep between flights and this place did the job. Very small room but quiet, clean, functional and not too far away from the airport.
Previously was fragrance, and was now IBIS budget. The hotel rate is always resonable and the room is good at this price. It's very hard to find a huge room size at this price in Singapore. Trust me!
good
will book again
5 stars!

A very comfortable and reasonably-priced accommodation for travellers-on-the-go like us who spend most of the day out on tourists spots and just go back to the hotel for a good night's rest before exploring again the next day.

reviews.review_title: To expensive for a very small room”
reviews.review_comment: Too expensive for a very small room and it's toi far away from the center. I asked for 1-bed king size but get 2 joined small beds
near airport
Excellent
Near bus station, food center and MRT station
Nice location overall near shops and cafes, quiet room. Would use short term again.
Water heater is very hot, but otherwise a very satisfying stay for us.

reviews.review_title: bollosa couple from the Philippines...nice to stay”
reviews.review_comment: the room is nice and the staff are great. If you are a night person this is the place to be. The location is good and near Train station. Convenient store and food stall are near the place.

The hotel charged from my card as well as took cash. It was a pay at the property option for my initial booking for 4 days. They said it was a booking guarantee for the dates and it will be reimbursed once paid. It was during December 2019 and till date we have not received that refund. I have been to many hotels and customer care towards such situations are dealt very professionally. I tried to contact the hotel and Agoda with this problem and Agoda services says the hotel are saying that it will be reimbursed as I did provide all proof of payment and receipts.
slOw internet cOnnectiOn

Tiny little room, but extremely clean with good amenities. The hotel is about 500 meters from MRT station and the bus stop is just around the corner. Lots of bars, restaurantes e grocery stores around.
Staffs are friendly and helpful, supermarket and restaurant are nearby, only 10mins short walk from MRT station, definitely my first choice of my next staying. Strongly recommended.

We planned to stay in Singapore during New Year's Eve for 5 nights to see more about culture and all. Travel by bus via the hotel is very convenient also when you want to find something to eat also very fun to explore. Only some neighbor around looks sometimes a bit scary but not a problem when you just ignore them. I will definitely stay here again once I travel to Singapore.

The staff was very accommodation. I had some medicine with me that had to be stored in a fridge at all times and therefore the friendly staff upgraded me to a room with a refrigerator. That's good service!
Room is comfortable to stay, even a little bit small. Also the place is clean, and the staff is friendly. A quite far from nearest MRT station. But overall stay is okay.

10 min walk from Ajunied station. But there’s a bus stop that’s very close to the hotel (you can take bus from station to hotel that’s very convenience). The room was OK. Great thing is there’s Fox movie channel. The environment at night is not quiet safe for woman who travels alone.
Room is clean and renovated . Value for money . Staff is helpful and friendly too 👍🏼

reviews.review_title: Near mrt station, lots of food centre, small room space”
reviews.review_comment: Good location, we were satisfied with our stay.

Its a super small room that cost a lot. You can't bring guest inside the room, they will ask for ID. This was very disappointing. You can't check in early, have to wait. The lobby is too small that there's no much place to sit. There's a two more hotels nearby, I suggest you check those instead.
Good and clean
Over all is OK
Location is good, near resto, shop and halte bus. Many activities of SIN Night Life
desk wasn’t friendly AT ALL

good location near bus stop, you can walk going MRT station (Aljunied) while there are so many stores and restaurants along the way...you will not notice that you are already in the train station. the staffs are very accommodating. The only thing not good is the TV reception in our room, but since we are not fond of watching TV, it's ok.

reviews.review_title: DPJF goes to Singapore ft. Hotel Ibis Budget Singapore Ruby”
reviews.review_comment: The value for money is excellent especially it is just near the train station and the bus stop. There are also restaurants that is very cheap. The place looks safe and friendly. You can easily talk to the staffs and some of them are friendly and nice. The facilities are equipped enough to satisfy us, worth the money. What I don't like is how nasty the bed-sheets are. They are not cleaning it thoroughly, I can still see spots of menstruation in the pillow sheet and the comforter. They should really improve in their cleanliness.
the location is easy to access and a lot of food stall around. it is a red light street and many special service girls around.
the staff are not friendly, and we seeing they speak very lound and rude to other customer, especially those unable to speak in English customer.
stay here for U2 concert. great location for culinary. got a great restaurant near the hotel.
Nice room, very clean and comfortable. I will definitely come back.

reviews.review_title: room size is suitable for single traveller”
reviews.review_comment: for solo traveller, it is nice to stay.

I like to stay here because the front desk staff name Sheila (I hope I don’t write wrong name ).she always remember my name a give me feel very warm ,like I going back home .i like her smile and she is very helpful.She have do a very good job 👍
gooooooodd
When go in the room, got bad smell due to no suction inside the toilet n the room n toilet really quite small.
Close proximity to many shops and eateries . Room was clean and spacious

1. ROOM- Cheap but comfortable. Small room but comfy pillow, blanket and bed. Washroom is clean and the water pressure is good and heater works well. Aircond is also strong. 2. HOUSE KEEPING- They clean the room daily. 3. CHECK IN PROCESS- Regardless of your special request during the booking, check in is only allowed at 3pm unless if you are willing to pay SGD 45.00 for early check in at the reception.
Great place for it's price
This place certainly is small but it's central and clean. I like it for its location with the bus system but also it's clean room

Hotel is near the major roads, near to a lot of food courts as well as groceries and establishments where you can buy your daily essentials. The neighborhood feels safe. It’s not fancy and for the facilities, what they have are the minimum you will expect from a hotel, but very sufficient. Plus point also for the hair dryer for each room. Also, the staff allowed us late check in, and they are always really courteous. Loved staying in here and will stay here again when I get back.
It's just good enough for biz traveler especially those who know this area. Late evening still have nice restraint near by, can money exchange, so convenient.

reviews.review_title: Just like a Japanese biz Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: It's a good choice for Biz traveler especially to know how convenient this area. Good foods, so convenient places, and enough room.
The lift is dirty and needs renovation.
Valumm for money. Clean and quite
Nice area
The hotel room is clean and newly touched up, as hotel is doing a refurbishment by phases transition from fragrance hotel to ibis budget. Request for highest floor, level 8.
Not bad for just sleeping... many sell food around hotel
Quiet room..good
The room is quite small but for 2 with no big luggage and one night is alright. The room, bathroom, are good
good location, room is small and bathroom is tight and very small

It was our first trip to Singapore. We went there in May. We chose Gaylang for the budget and despite its being known for the dark area, many fellows who have stayed here said there was nothing bad about it at all. The room was pretty small, but full of liveliness. I REALLY LOVE THE COLORS ON THE WALL AND THE GRAPHICS AROUND THE BED. It is such a stylish hotel. Bathroom was very small, but we didn't need it that big anyway. So we choose Fragrance Ruby for the new and nice look of the hotel, and also the price. At first we got two room on the same floor, but one of them was full with cigarette smell so we asked the hotel for help. They changed the room for us but it was on a different floor, so we had to split. Bad thing is that the elevator takes you only to the floor on which your room is. But that was not a big deal. We actually arrived before check-in time, and could drop our luggage at the hotel before going back there again after lunch. Overall was satisfying.
Location at red light district
The staffs were nice and really accommodating. Room is okay but no bidet :(
Hotel is near to airport and other amenities.

reviews.review_title: Not ideal to stay if hotel is currently under renovations”
reviews.review_comment: Our experiences on this hotel did not meet my expectations. Though we were informed that the hotel is under renovations but a lot of inconveniences you will experience. Workers are using the guest elevators, construction noise is unbearable and the hotel floor lobby is messy with debris , guest's carpet elevator are full of debris and stains. I witnessed a worker not wearing shirt using guest's elevator. I highly recommend not to stay in this hotel if it is under renovations.

reviews.review_title: Should hire staffs who can actually smile”
reviews.review_comment: True that we could not expect more in a budget hotel, but staffs can actually smile every once and awhile.. We came in earlier than expected, the front desk staff were Rude on expalining the situation. As if we didnt pay anything to stay in the hotel.. Bad rep for an Ibis' hotel operated... When we checkout,, the next morning, different staffs we're at the desk, it wa totally different, they greed us, smiles a lot eventhough we only returning the room key...

Booked 2 different rooms on 2 different nights. However, Receptionist was very helpful and assisted with our request accordingly, arranged same room to reduce our hassle of checking-out and checking back-in again. Location strategic accessible to nearby MRT Bus Station, MRT station is further away yet within walking distance as well (Aljuneid).

Receptionist was very helpful and assisted with our request accordingly. Location strategic accessible to nearby MRT Bus Station, MRT station is further away yet within walking distance as well (Aljuneid).
Good for short and budget stays, only room, the hotel doesn't has any facilities. Location is good if you are moving around the area.
Bang for your buck and very convenient to go to the national stadium just a 15 minute walk
This is our favorite hotel in Singapore. Just surprised that the hotel changed its name. :) Fragrance Hotel as a name was good. Thanks for the wonderful stay again!

reviews.review_title: Pretty pleasant hotel in a good location”
reviews.review_comment: Pretty pleasant hotel in a good location
If possible provide breakfast too
the housekeeping are nice. and the receptionist duty at night is very accommodating.
We booked two bed room,but they gave one bed
Hotel is being renovated, very noisy
It was okay It was okay It was okay
The place is clean and good location. Great customer service whenever i am there. Keep it up

Good value for money. Our room has just enough to space to sleep in for 3 nights. Lots of restaurants in the area and is very safe. Its good when you just needed a place to drop your stuff and sleep for a few days while you go explore.
Easy to walking from MRT or Bus stop. You can traveling to city by bus is easy

reviews.review_title: Great place to rest for budget travelers”
reviews.review_comment: It was our first time in Singapore and we dont find staying in luxury hotels rational as we will not spend the whole day in the hotel anyway. We only rested and slept there for 4-5 hrs. There wa no noise and we were able to rest well for the next day. If you want a place where you can just doze for the night, take a shower and change, you can book in this hotel.

reviews.review_title: Noisy at corridor and next to my room. ”
reviews.review_comment: Toilet air circulation not working, smell bad.

when we booked this hotel as the old name "Frangrance Ruby" but we arrived there, this hotel was change its name already as "Ibis Budget Frangrance Ruby". It was so surprise for us. It is in the renovation process. Around this hotel, there is indian restaurant and 7-11 convinced store. The distance between Mrt Aljunied and the hotel was 5-7 mins. Inside the room, there was hair dryer, shampoo, soap liquid, 2 drink water, electric kettle, towels, tv. if we hava a chance for backing to Singapore, we will stay here.

I emailed specifically that our ETA is 2:30-3AM. When we arrived, I greeted the night staff with a smile even though we're exhausted from our flight. LATIFAH & DANIEL just looked at us as if I ruined their chatting. No greetings at all and LATIFAH even told me I have to wait because she's already 'running her system' which I found so senseless. They keep on murmuring to each other not caring if we're in front of them. Finally after few minutes, gave us our room key. Without saying anything. O was really pissed. Our room is 'fine', I booked for superior queen bed, they gave us 2 single beds. Ask them they said my 'request is subject to availability'. Like what?! I paid for it! They don't know how to check guests requests/bookings? The next day, they 'upgrade' us. But it became the 'WORST STAY EVER' We can't sleep at all because the room smells paint! We can breath ,we decided to book in another hotel. Its the worst hotel I've ever been! Feel bad for Ibis buying this hotel/management

We had a very satisfied experience in here. Easy check in/ check out, also have many restaurants nearby. Hotel is little bit old but overall it’s really valuable with this price. Would come back again if we visit Singapore again.

I understand that the renovation works is on going to make this place beautiful again. There’s still hacking works after 5pm and also early in the morning as early as 8am ppl have already started work. Can hear carpenters working and also painters started painting and the smell is terrible. The toilet also smells. Worst thing is there’s no tissue provided and when called to the operator and instead of they sending someone up, they asked you to go get it from them downstairs. Bed wasn’t level as the base was high on one side and low on the other side.
over all is ok
good

reviews.review_title: Small, yet clean and cozy rooms. Near to the bus station. ”
reviews.review_comment: Got the chance to stay at Ibis Ruby (formerly Fragrance Hotel - Ruby). Along Geylang, so expect 24 hours shops everywhere. Food place is very nearby. Convenience stores are nearby. Room is quite small. No cabinet and tables. Just the bed and a small stool chair. However, aircon is cold. We had to turn it off or put it at 25 degree celcius every night. Hot shower is available. There is smell at the toilet, but acceptable. :(
Upgrade TV to smart TV with You Tube etc....

reviews.review_title: Best within the price range .value for money.”
reviews.review_comment: Clean at its upmost level . Staffs are friendly. Now it is “ibis budget ruby “
Hotel is a little bit far from MRT , have to walk 15-20mins to MRT station. The room is small for me but overall its okay for couple to stay. The room is clean and the staff is friendly.

reviews.review_title: Just nice for me and wife for 1 night stay”
reviews.review_comment: Pros: The staffs were so kind and place was 10mins walk to Aljunied mrt station. Bus stop was just 100meters from the hotel. AC was very cold in our room that night Cons: A bit small for travellers with big luggages. You can only watch national channels Early noise from the cleaners in the morning There’s a bad smell from the toilet coming from the sink and toilet bowl and we dont know why. Toilet was really small specially for those people from a 5’ 7” tall and up. No bidet as well Toilet roll and body wash were not topped up.
Not very Good cleaning

stayed here for 1 night, hotel is good but the room is small, near convenience store, HALAL indian-muslim restaurant nearby which serves good foods, location is good, easy to get grab, so overall this hotel is quite good for all kind of travelers
But they dont allow early check in, you need to pay 45sgd.
Very heavy rotten smell in the toilet every time enter. The smell do not goes away. Feel so uncomfortable in the toilet. But overall the room is ok

hotel was located near at Aljunied Station and at Food Loft ( foods here are so delicious ) which is very convenient. staffs are accommodating. room was a bit small and it was not cleaned thoroughly upon check-in, especially the toilet. I guess it was not checked before they release the room. they set up damage and stained linens. tissue was not replenished. found some hair strands at the toilet. there's a bad smell coming from the drainage of the shower room. bring toiletries if you will not be contented in shampoo and bath gel combined in soap dispenser . good job who make up our room every day, he/she got our requests on how we want to clean our room. Despite of our first day experience, we still had a good stay and it is good enough when it comes in value for money.

reviews.review_title: Budgt friendly and a great place for travelers”
reviews.review_comment: The size of the room is just right for 2 persons. No cabinets but there were designated places to hang your stuff both in the cr and the room area. Mrt station is just near, approximately 8 min walk. Easy to get around, lots of places to eat nearby. There is a convenience store nearby also. My only comment is that when you get back to your room after having it cleaned, it sometimes leaves a bad smell from the bathroom. I’m not sure if its from the septic tank or not but its bearable and usually just goes away. But overall, I recommend this place. I’d go back again soon!
I would definitely book in this hotel if I can go back to Singapore. 😊😍

If you want a private room and bathroom, this is probably the best value you'll get - because it's located in the red light district. If the stigma isn't an issue, it's actually a nice area with bright lights and lots of food. The hotel is safe and clean. Would stay again.

reviews.review_title: I Love EVERYTHING About This Hotel.”
reviews.review_comment: Clean & Nice room Polite staffs Check-in before 2PM without additional fees (~1.45PM) Near by the Bus Stop + MRT Station + Restaurant + 7-Eleven Thanks for the beautiful memories

This is my 4th time I came to this hotel and again I was assisted by Evelyn in the checkout process . . the rooms is getting better and clean . . Dear Evelyn could you add my ID Line: vat0410 . . Thank you and will see you again.

reviews.review_title: Friendly staff, good location near temple and clean room. ”
reviews.review_comment: Room small for 3 pax. Cannot find a spot to open our two other cabin bags
Would highly recommend this place.

hotels.name: Ramada by Wyndham Singapore at Zhongshan Park (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 16 Ah Hood Road, Novena, Singapore, Singapore, 329982

reviews.review_comment: Love the pool love the cleanliness love the comfort love the service!
Best!

Reasonable price and kind staff made my biz trip pretty comfortable. 7 Eleven is just next to the hotel and Zhongsan Mall is located in same building. So, don't worry about something to eat. Let me just say the hotel staff. Very kind during the whole 3nights stay. Catch a taxi, Give me information about the possible hospital to get a pre departure PCR. In case of next visit in Singapore, I assure to visit Ramada Hotel again.
Very helpful and considerate staff. Great location with many food options.

Except room has ants, except shower water is weak, except the room card not working and have to walk up and down 3 times and the receptionist keep saying card is working (and not their problem) and except the receptionist think customer going up and down several times due to the faulty card will still have good patience and ask for respect instead of gaining the respect , everything is fine...The one star is for the cleaning lady who understand would need to work in the room and not over disturbing but just do a quick cleaning ..

reviews.review_title: Amazing staff and great place to stay”
reviews.review_comment: We had a memorable staycation at Ramada Hotel. Thank you to the duty manager Iza for giving us complimentary late check out even if we didnt ask for. My twin girls had so much fun and they are so happy! I am recommending this hotel and thumbs up! Thanks again to all the staff that made our stay memorable :)

our 11 day stay at the hotel was a memorable pleasant happy ones , thank you everyone for taking good care of me and my 2 girls. Your Kindness really made a difference!! I RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL TO EVERYONE!!
All friendly staffs and polite near all amenities.
Friendly staffs good location and competitive price.
Very good hotel with good facility will come again

My bedding was dirty on arrival to the room in more than one way and clearly had not been changed from the guests before me. When I told the front staff, he stared at me and said nothing, and wouldn't help me. I also complained I was downgraded rooms, and he did the same thing. The whole experience was very negative.
