Oh, and the vents were broken, and even when shut off, a crazy loud noise came from the general vent system.

We had to book a stay at the last minute due to some water disruption at home. Shout-out to the staff too and especially a female staff at the concierge who were super accomodating and helpful. Would 100% recommend and would totally book a stay again if needed

For Novena area this is the best hotel, great check in services from the team. Good value for the room size , very clean. Next building you have a small centre, Fairprice to get all your groceries, coffees. Hawker centre is 5minutes walk away. Museum is 3 mins only. Small park is 1 minute away. Fantastic.

Not my first time stay. Check in took less than 10 mins. Had to pay returnable deposit. Housekeeping was good. Had issues with the door, satisfied that it was resolved less than 20 mins. Room has the basic amenities. Location of hotel is good, it is beside the mall and a 7-11 and bus stops. Check out took less than 5 mins.

Pros - A mall downstairs - Large windows - Aircon temperature adjustable Cons - Ants around the room, even in bed - Smelly stained duvet - Staff tried entering the room with 'Do not disturb' sign - Very rude duty manager (she was reviewed as rude by another guest on another website)
This hotel ramada is really awesome and clean and smell nice.. easy to find food. The hotel food is also nice and worth the price. I am regular here, swimming pool is awesome...
The staff need to be trained to wish all guests. There was no advice given on the use of the WIFI as it had many ways to log in. Overall the hotel is good.
easy to go anywhere
Boon Tong Kee Mutton Soup Fish Head Steamboat Pastries

Stayed for 2 nights on a recent business visit to Singapore . The management are very coercive for everyone to deposit a refundable 500 SGD for cleaning purposes however they are not intent on returning it and will keep punching away one excuse after another. I checked-out on the 16th January when I was assured that the deposit should happen quickly although the T&C say 7-14 working days. I have followed up consistently thereafter with the same technical assurances. fast forward to 3rd February now, Im being asked to show proof of having payed the deposit in the 1st place ! The hotel management have really showed no commitment to refund my money back which suggests outright fraud behaviour. Please look elsewhere.
Value for money, good location for a relaxing staycation

Did not even try to accommodate my request even though I have made request earlier for wedding anniversary. The room they offered was so dusty and it’s a joiner bed. Totally disappointed and would not go back to this hotel again

When I noticed that the hotel used for quarinetine, I ask the staff did they same level with me, the staff said no, but in the next morning I realised that almost all of the room nearby were use for quarintine when I saw food are hanging out of the door and the rubish put outside the door!For sashould separate
Gd location. Lot of eateries. Helpful staff
Booked 3 days 2 nite to celebrate husband birthday. We with 4 children. We got connected room but the door is so inconvenient as dint have any stopper or wat so a bit hard for us.
Overall a very good stay in a perfect location. Checkin experience was not so good. Room very neat and tidy. Only a chiller available in the room which was not to my liking
nice hotel

reviews.review_title: Bathtub have mouldy stain on silicon ”
reviews.review_comment: bathtub have cracks and TV have limited channels. No YouTube no HDMI. Not very user friendly. Ice bucket $8 per mini bucket.

reviews.review_title: Staff are very friendly and welcoming”
reviews.review_comment: I had the best front office staff checking me in. Very friendly, polite and very welcoming too. I felt very positive and good upon checking in which is very important. Also, the staff manning the safe entry table was also smiling and very welcoming and really made me feel very welcome. These are extremely important aspects for guests when they first come into the hotel.

Staff was very attentive. Check in time was acceptable. I’ve requested to be upgraded to a bathup room with paying extra, the initial check in time is 2pm how ever our room was only ready by 4pm. We kindly request the front desk if we can extend late check out, and they gladly accommodate to this request. They also offer drinks coupon for the delay, very proactive. In short it is worth the price!

I have stayed here twice. I feel that there front desk staff is rude at times and I have felt like this everytime i visit them I called the housekeeping to confirm the dail in number for front desk and they asked me "Why" I had to give them a justification but still they didnt share it
Friendly staff nice room and clean
Great location and more food options. Really worth it
Nothing to comments

reviews.review_title: nice location and clean room and helpfulstaff ”
reviews.review_comment: just want to suggest if the front counter staff able to just re-activate my room card key immediately will be better than request me to Q with people who coming for check out and check in.
the staff there is friendly:) affordable prices and convenient location
A pleasant stay, staff are very helpful and provide excellent service throughout our stay. Hotel location also very convenient, would love to come back someday. Recommended.
good

The stay was pleasant. The only problem I faced was limited vegetarian options and no indian dishes. Otherwise its clean, well maintained and at nice location walking distance from MRT. Staff was helping and courteous.
The staffs there are really friendly and helpful...
Managed to get my room at checkin time despite the long queue. The lady checked me in the last time as well. They did pretty well despite the weekend crowd
Had my countdown here in 2021 & 2022, pretty affordable hotel!
Conveniently located to local food…. Very spacious and clean room… In fact quite cosy…. Very clean bathroom also….. Nothing fancy but definitely value for money….
The staffs there are very friendly and helpful...

reviews.review_title: Nice pool, clean room, best staff”
reviews.review_comment: pool is awesome, room is clean though bit small. i will be definitely back.
Hotel facilities including the pool were great. Really good breakfast options.
Great place to be in
Rude and slow. Refund of deposit took so long to credit back to my credit card.
Long waiting hours to check in . 2-3 hours of wait with no compensation .

I booked for 2 rooms, we are only able to check-in by 4:30pm and 5:30pm, instead of 2pm because the rooms are not ready yet. They gave supplementary drinks while waiting. I asked if we can have late check out since we have late check in but they only allow 1 room at 1pm and 1 room still 12noon. We lost many hours that should be enjoyed at the hotel. Hotel room is value for money, only the late check-in.
Rooms have been maintained well. Clean and cosy

reviews.review_title: Clean room and nice swimming pool”
reviews.review_comment: nice room and the size is just nice for a couple like us, swimming pool is easy to book and it is nice to swim at night
Overall:satisfaction,some items for improvement: room's corridor almost always smelt cigarette smoke,maybe from stair area,soundproofing in room not good,
I enjoy staying in this hotel, it’s clean and staff are quite friendly. But location not close to MRT station. If want to book bathtub room need to top up money.

Good price point of mid $100+ range/night for a comfy 4 star hotel stay. Room of decent size, cosy and clean bathroom w shower. Gym and swimming pool nt huge but decent enough. Just next to Zhongshan mall for any late minute necessarities purchase and lotsa eateries within few hundred metres along balestier Road. Not beyond impressive but great value for money Staycation in sg.
Hotel is located next to the Zhongshan Park & WanQingYuan. Nice location.Novena MRT station is abt 12min walk away. Lots of eatery around. Hotel staffs are friendly & helpful.

reviews.review_title: Put customer to "No Show" without informing”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel gave check-in time of 2-3pm. Got delayed in checking. Shockingly, 4 star hotel did not bother to call customer to check what happened, instead put "no show" and cancelled 4 days 3night room.

reviews.review_title: OK Hotel for VTL Stay in Singapore”
reviews.review_comment: The Good : 1.) Location has quite a lot of food places around. Next to a small shopping mall too 2.) Service and Staff are pretty good 3.) Technically next to a bus stop 4.) Facilities are good, GYM, Swimming Pool, Self Laundry Service. Cons 1.) Long Q at check ins. Long wait time. 2.) Lifts are ultra slow, only 2 lifts servicing the rooms. 3.) They will try to push you for VTL set meals. Overall a good hotel for the money i paid.

My young family of 5 was very happy & comfortable during our 1 night stay. We had the pool level, (level 3) & a patio. It is our first time at this hotel but we will definitely return! Already planning to book more than 1 night the next time! Totally recommended!
If you are going for staycation and looking for budget but great hotel, this hotel will be one of your favourite selection....
Big room, quiet environment, friendly staff

Ramada is one of my favourite hotels for staycations. The rooms are clean, spacious & comfortable. The location is also quite centralised & most importantly it is one of the most value for money hotels that provides complimentary parking to in house guests. For this staycation, the check in process took too long. About 15 - 30 mins for one check in. The hotel management should look at ways to refine the check in process. However, the staff were very service oriented. Some of the staff did their best to shorten the queue by asking guests waiting in the queue what kind of help they needed & responded accordingly. I was one of those who was offered by a staff (Hui Jia) to help me check in at the back end office. Indeed the service was amazing. Thank you very much Hui Jia. The lady housekeeping staff serving 13th floor was also very good. I requested for my room to be cleaned up while I went for a quick brunch and indeed when I was back in less than an hour, my room was perfectly cleaned up. Thank you very much to the housekeeping staff. I would love to return to Ramada for future staycations if the price is still competitive.
Kudos to Mr Izhar duty manager to let us have a late checkout for all the 5 rooms!

Stayed here for VTL hotel. Already told them before hand my flight arrival time. Reached the lobby and was told room not ready. Waited in the lobby for an hour in a cordoned off “VTL” area but not too far away from other people. Somehow seems like they forgotten about me and I had to check with them before they bring me into my room. Room is not bad, have spaces for my luggage and clean. However, they are not soundproof at all, constantly hearing footsteps and even people’s phone notifications. Mattress and pillows are nice. Decent stay, feels 4 stars but overpriced for the price I paid $200 (probably high season).

1. Check in & Check Out Time (3star) Check in timing was staggered due to covid and was asked to check in 1-2hrs after normal check in time. Check out time was only extended for 30mins despite late check in timing. Recommend if possible to extend for longer check out time if the check in time was delayed. 2. Waiting time for elevator (3 star) Due to the SHN for one of the elevator and the other elevator only accessible for B1 carpark to lvl 3, only 2 elevators left for hotel guests and ballroom guests, hence the waiting time for the elevator is quite long at times. 3. Hotel/ Staff Service (4 stars) Requested for ice and was told that we need to head down with the bucket from our room to the BAR at level 1. This created quite a hassle for guests. Not too sure if it’s due to covid or the hotel does not provide the service to the room. Fast service (5-10mins) for the replacement of in room kettle as it did not work. During check out, as there was additional billing to be made, we could not do the express check out and had to queue. However, staff was able to assist us to process the check out with billing without the need to queue. As we need to head for lunch and get other stuffs around the area, they also allowed us to keep our luggages with them although we have checked out. Appreciated. 4. Accessibility (4 stars) The hotel is a little far off from nearest MRT, Novena. About a 15mins walking distance away. However, there is a mall and other eateries around the area. 5. Pool (5 stars) The pool is pretty for photos and spacious for guests to swim and hang out at their own corners.
Other rooms voices can be heard. Pool is great! Breakfast is also good

Went for a family staycation. Location is good. Surrounding with many eateries. Hotel itself comes with a mall and supermarket. Facilities are basic and acceptable. Room size is acceptable considering the price. Overall if you are going for a simple staycation nearby to town, u can consider this.
The hotel Staff are like robots and have no understanding of dealing with international travellers. The swimming pool was nit clean like a few average hotels I've visited.
Good

Went solo for the first time and it was a great experience here. Very cosy room for a solo traveller. The bed was great and there are extra pillows as well in the cupboard facing the huge mirror. There is a bible as well in the room even though I was not sure what for but didnt really bother me at all. Was given a quiet room towards the end of the aisle, away from the lift. Venue is situated conveniently with many food choices around esp with Zhongshan Mall beside it.
The hotel was clean & the staff were very friendly, my experience there was super peaceful! The location isnt too central so you have alot of quiet and lots of great food spots to explore.
It was not bad for a one night staycation stay. It’s very near a park so I can bring my children out, and Zhongshan mall is just right beside. Good for a night stay!

I book a twin bed room.. upon arrival i told the staff if there is a room with a bathtub( I don’t mind paying more)..the kind male malay staff told me he will try his best but have to wait about 1 hour.. im not in rush to check in so I accepted it. When i ask about the additional fee to be paid, he told me its ok no need to topup..so eventually i check in about 4 plus, to my suprise, he upgraded me to a king bed with a bathtub..i was given a conner room and the view was supper incredible.. their service was super tiptop.. will definitely come back again..
Located just beside a small mall which is sufficient for daily needs. Room is clean and spacious enough. Value for money stay.

My first time went smoothly , hence , came back for the good service . Waited for 1hr plus for the room to be ready . Other family member waited for 2hrs . Given only drinks & checkout at 1pm as complimentary . Disappointed with the services given . Manager don't look sincere . Please work on the check in services .

reviews.review_title: Unprofessional front desk staff and poor arrangements”
reviews.review_comment: Call to hotel to ask for early check in, but the staff told me to check with lobby counter. When I reach to hotel at 12pm, there are many travellers queuing for check in. I was told that my room can be ready only by 2pm. (hotel check in time is 2pm). If hotel know that no room is available for early check, please inform guest via email when the early check in request was put up. And, when people called to check for early check in. The staff should straight away say that no room is available for early check in. At 2pm, I was still waiting my room. I asked the front desk staff, she told me to wait and the room is still under cleaning. I asked again how long it takes to finish the cleaning, the staff told me that she can't promise! So, I wait for my room from 12pm to 2pm, now still need to wait but dun know how long to wait some more? The staff attitude is bad and unprofessional. When check out, there was no express check out lane. For those stay cation local guest have to queue together with oversea traveller at the same check out lane. Personally, I feel this is a risk during covid. I spent 30mins to queue but less than 5mins to complete my check out. I will never come back to this hotel anymore.
Looks like staying at KSL johor bahru
Nice stay, good 4-star hotel.

Check in was very slow. Booked two rooms but only get to check in only for one room at about 3pm ie about an hour after the dedicated check in time at 2pm. The other room was only available and ready at 6.30pm. Other than the check in experience, housekeeping service is also slow as only 1 housekeeper is assigned to the entire floor where I stayed. Other than these two unfavourable experience, the amenities and the cleanliness of the room was fine. The staffs are also friendly.

reviews.review_title: One of the best and convinient hotels in Singapore”
reviews.review_comment: Check in time was fast and efficient. Staffs are very friendly especially the guy at the entrance. He helped us with our bags to the room. We dont need to worry if we need anything during the day without travelling out. Theres 7 eleven, mcdonalds, ntuc finest etc..Theres starbucks too. We really enjoyed our stay there.
Staff were kind, courteous, helpful and responsive. Cleanliness is super too
Delay check in nearly 2 hours of waiting and 1 malay lady staff is not very helpful in assisting

I had already informed the hotel about my estimated arrival time (2230hrs on 20th Nov). I arrived together with a VTL guest around 2300hrs, got out of my car, and proceeded to SafeEntry point and then to reception table. At the reception counter when I surrendered our ID and passport, I was immediately asked if we are "registering our names". I gave the confused look and asked what registering??? I was there to check-in into the hotel. The staff was also confused and after I said the guest just arrived vis the VTL Lane, she immediately understood and proceeded to guide us in the check-in. Another staff immediately retorted that we should have followed the signage and check-in using another door. What another door???? And so I realised there was this signage outside that apparently has an arrow sign to direct VTL guests to another door!!!! And we went through the wrong door. And so it is our fault. It is our fault for walking through the wrong glass door when there was actually no one to guide us, notwithstanding there was a signage in the frontage. And it was our fault for not reading all the signages of the hotel before we stepped in? Great service! Bad experience! And so my VTL guest was guided to another table some 10m away, and check-in went smoothly after that. Throughout the 7-days stay, my VTL guest and I had experienced multiple times where the room card will no longer work and we had to go down again to have it re-verified. Very irritating. On the day of my check-out, same thing happened again. This time I decided to verify how the staff would react if I were to tell her my card failed on me the 4th time. And so I again proceeded down the lift, and went to reception. I immediately told the staff (Joanne, indian lady) that they card failed the 4th time on me. She proceeded to re-code the card and ignored my feedback. I asked again when she returned me the card why did the card fail again? She replied that I have to come re-code the c
Good
NIL
The hotel staff are super friendly and i really enjoy staying in this hotel. Front office Manager, Mr Izhar, is very helpful and gave me the best service ever!!!
Nil

We stayed 2N at 16 floors (highest 17 floors). Room was clean, except some ants found in room 1683. Bed was comfortable, toilet clean and bright. Overall room condition was excellent. View was OK. Nothing to shout abt. Lotsa of eateries ard the hotel. 7-11 and NTUC supermarket just next building. Thought breakfast would be buffet style but just a set (option to choose Western or Asian). Nonetheless breakfast was filling. Used the gym and pool. Both were good. They have corner-off an area for continuous swimming. Gym was clean and well equipped. Gym and pool open from 7am to 10pm. Staff was professional and friendly. They accommodated to all my requests for high floor, connecting room and an hour of late check out. My family enjoyed the 2N stay. Highly recommended 👍
Great stay for being 1st timer guest.Great service rendered by Izhar during check in.Would definitely stay again.
Cozy peaceful location. Rooms are very spacious. There is not many channels on TV. Take note that $100 cash deposit is required and you might go to the nearby mall to withdraw it.
For the price, it's really quite good. Nice, quiet hotel. There's quite a lot of dining places nearby as well.

reviews.review_title: Great location w nice local food”
reviews.review_comment: Although No much attraction around hotel but there are lots of nice local food
Hotel WiFi is not good that I have to use my cellular network very often.
it was a nice 1 night stay to celebrate my husband bday,they also upgrade our room until the highest floor and have complimentary cake for the bday celebrant. recommended👍👍👍❤️❤️❤️

Lots of food nearby. easy to get around and accessible to town too. DO note that while check in is at 2pm, and I arrived at 4pm, I was told I need to wait 1.5h for the room i reserved. I thought thats quite ridiculous.

reviews.review_title: Pool is perfect for toddlers, just beside a mall.”
reviews.review_comment: Love our staycay. The pool is perfect for our toddler. The nearby mall is good for a quick bite and other necessities.

reviews.review_title: Comfortable and close to a lot of good food”
reviews.review_comment: Not exactly convenient to travel to but they do have shuttle bus service. Great for local staycation if not intending to travel out much because there are plenty of food choices nearby which is awesome. Hotel is clean and comfortable, nothing to complain about but will be great if the price could be lowered a little.

reviews.review_title: Car park chargeable after first entry”
reviews.review_comment: One complimentary csrpark coupon given per day is not acceptable for hotel guests who may want to drive in and out to other Singapore attractions
Spacious & clean room. Fast check in and out. Courteous staff.

hotels.name: ibis budget Singapore Pearl (SG Clean Certified, Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 21 Lorong 14 Geylang, Geylang, Singapore, Singapore, 398961

reviews.review_comment: All ok good

As soon as we check in, I saw roach crawling around the bed!! Omg!! And, the whole stretch of the corridor was especially noisy after midnight!! Can hear the foreign workers talking so loudly like nobody business!!
Nice relaxing stay. Clean and comfortable room.

Would like to take this opportunity to say “thanks you, Zarrikh” A very friendly staff and works with efficiently. Upon arrival, I called to the receptionist to requested extra pillows. Within 5 mins, Mr Zarrikh got the pillows for me.
Better than what I expected
Staff are friendly.
the room lighting is good n toilet also clean. Air con also cold n blanket can cover cold.
Room was spacious and good. Maybe could have been provided with slippers.
Good service
Good location. Hawker center just in walking distance. Clean room and friendly staff.
All the memory there is great!
The best are the staff especially ANIA and the INDIAN staff. Super friendly. Hugs to ANIA. I gave her my hug when she had her lunch.
good value for a one night stop over.... access to street food good, easy transport to irport ( bus direct to hotel, 9 sing dollar, .. grab 16 dollar sing to terminal

If you're a foodie, this place is a gem since it's near to all the local restaurants and eateries opened even late at night. Beryl's (recommended CHOCOLATE shop) is 10mins. by bus. It is also located to 3 bus stops (around 2-6min. walk) which is less pricey compared to MRT (around 12mins. walk). Relatively safe even for families with young children since the neighborhood is surrounded by apartment buildings (NOT brothels, I read that this is located in the red light district). As for the rooms, my only suggestion is to label the lights and water heater switch. They clean and change the sheets & towels daily, and provide us with bottled water, teas and coffee (also daily). Click my review if helpful :)

reviews.review_title: Great for a one or 2 night stay. Very small so you can't spend to much time in your room ”
reviews.review_comment: The room is small modern and clean but you can't spend too much time in there but there is so much to see in Singapore why would you..
For the price you pay isn't worth it, just save your money.

reviews.review_title: Bad neighbourhood. The rest is ok for the money ”
reviews.review_comment: They are happy to check you in early should they have available rooms.
the room was nice and clean but tiny i book for 1 queen bed not double bed then they said the room that I booked the bed will be like that can not change .that's make me upset of that.

reviews.review_title: A good option in an expensive town”
reviews.review_comment: All fine, llcation completely safe even if a bit edgy, easy transport to town, half the price of places there-and a decent size room
Clean, red area of Singapore and quite noisy

We had stay for 4 nights and 1 day at this hotel. All inquiries was answered promptly and immediately thru email and messenger. Staffs were nice and can communicate well with guests. They make sure that your room is always clean even if you do not request for room a service. We always got a bottles of water everyday and new sheets for 5 days stay. Worth the money for a nice bed to sleep after a long day trip in Singapore.

reviews.review_title: Good. Clean. A lot of food in front of the hotel. Far from MARY but many bus. ”
reviews.review_comment: More discount.
This good enough as budget hotel. At least clean and with proper facility.
Clean and convenient
Have some ants in room. Location is ok, few minutes walk to bust station. Around 10mins walk to MRT station. Staff are very nice friendly and accomodating.

reviews.review_title: An exceptional hotel for a cheap price”
reviews.review_comment: This is one of the few hotels in Singapore that offer affordable yet quality and clean rooms. Will definitely be back.

reviews.review_title: Best budget hotel in the area”
reviews.review_comment: There are lots of budget hotels in this area but this one is the best value, good size rooms and modern facilities

Simple hotel but nice and clean. The bed is comfortable and the rooms are new. The staff is really nice. It's close to Aljunied MRT station. I recommend it to everyone looking for cheap accommodation in Singapore (as per Singapore's prices) and who do not intend staying most day inside the hotel room.

We were in SG to watch the U2 concert at the National Stadium, and the location of the hotel was perfect for our purpose. In fact we just walked going back to the hotel. There are a lot of good dimsum places nearby.

Beware that this is in a terrible location if you are travelling to see the main sights of Singapore. The road the hotel is on is right in the middle of the red light district (guess they left that off the bio) so wasn’t safe to go out at night. They also never cleaned the sheets in the 4 nights we were there despite me requesting this twice. The staff were friendly

reviews.review_title: Budget hotel near to the superb eateries”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel room is small but enough for a solo traveler. What I like is the hotel is in a strategic location near to public transport and very near to superb eateries which offer much options (though it locates in the center of red district, pubs and bars etc.). What i think the hotel can improve is the sewerage system of the bathroom/toilet. It smells once in a while which made it not a pleasuring experience.
If you are searching for basic bed shower and toilet then this place should be fine. The rooms are tiny but functional. Staff are friendly and willing to assist in any way possible.
over roll no bad

reviews.review_title: Nice place for short term stay , clean room ”
reviews.review_comment: Quite far from Mrt if you want a hotel that near MRT

This is my second stay. The reason I come back as the location is quite good, the room’s cleanliness is acceptable and most important is the hotel provided parking although is on first come first serve basis. Unfortunately we are not able to park at the hotel compound this time as full. We don’t mind to park at road side. When we check with hotel staff on the road side parking fees payment method, the answer I got was “I am not sure.” The staff never take any initiative to check for us as we are not Singaporean, she just continue on her work. End up, we have to walk to road side, and look for any Singaporean can help us on this. I personally feel so ridiculous on as a hotel staff can convey such a message like “I am not sure” follow by “full stop” to their customer. Maybe this is because of BUDGET hotel that why we get BUDGET service. I will never recommend this group of budget hotel to anyone.

It was A very Good Stay,The Price is reasonable For A 2 star Hotel..All the staff Very Friendly And Helpful Especially The lady Anis,And the Guy Helmie..They are Always Smiling And Provide Us Good Service 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
I would like to commend your Ms. Anis for been very helpful and accommodating. And for the rest of the staff who are always smiling and that makes our day. Thank you
Staff were all friendly and accommodating. Thumbs up to them.
i was going for my u2 concert . so i would recommend this if you want near national stadium. few hundred meters to national stadium.

Pros: very clean, towel and bedsheets are all clean, we ask for room make up everyday and they never forget to give us fresh mineral waters bottles , clean the dustbin and also gives clean towel everyday! Cons: weird smell from the bathroom, management should have done something about it or at least put air refresher in the bathroom. Our room was at the corner and we can hear clearly whenever the upper floors water flush through the piping , it was so annoying and wake us up early in the morning, the sound was so loud as if it was like raining on top of your roof! The last day stay in the room was totally unbearable, should have ask them to change the room for us earlier Overall this hotel is clean, good , food convenient and worth for money to stay in singapore if u have children and u are looking for a room with a private bathroom. Many other hotel in Singapore with same budget but comes with shared toilet which I don’t really like it

reviews.review_title: Best place to stay near National Stadium”
reviews.review_comment: The minus side : No bath mat, this is important..since the bathroom is very small (understandable considering this is a budget hotel) and the water splashes every where after shower :( The other one is, no option for hot water in the shower. The room door is pretty thin, so you can hear everything on the out side. Over all it's ok for short time of stay, stayed here for U2 concert..which very close to this hotel.
The smell not good in hotel
don't afraid to book this even if it's in GEYLANG area. It's safe, clean, and worth the money. Will definitely stay here again.

Wanted to try new hotel. And this ibis Pearl was newly renovated. Saw their ratings was not bad so I booked. It was quite high price consider for budget hotel in Geylang area. There are better rooms at cheaper price actually. The room was quite big. But toilet was terrible!!! I find the toilet dirty and seemed like they purposely used black tiles to hide the toilet dirtiness. But I was very particular in hygiene. Toilet failed. Hot flask and things on table were covered with dust!!! I literally have to wash everything before I dared to use it. Lousy receptionist attitude too.
Nice and clean. Good for short stay. Plenty of food stops.
Friendly staff! My 3rd stay in this hotel.

reviews.review_title: All good, plenty food stalls, cheap prices. ”
reviews.review_comment: I have stayed here a number of times. I think it's good
Small room
Staff was really friendly and location is great to get around..

It was okay. We we're looking for a place to stay with cheap rates but good service and we got it. Only cons is that you hear the bathroom from the room above yours. And the bathroom door isn't really private so if you aren't that close, it might be really awkward.
For a budget Hotel, it was all very good: Very nice, attentive and efficient staff ; the cleanliness of the bed was remarkable!

good location. the hotel was recently renovated. facilities improved but difficult to connect to the hotel wifi. when successfully connected, it disconnected after just a few minutes (5 to 10 mins?)....
Good hotel and spacious and clean inside.
This is a good hotel for the price in a good location with friendly helpful staff. Wifi did not work well in the room, really needed use in the lobby. Some wifi boosters are needed.
Definition of comfortable. Clean, good facilities, good staffs, transportation access. The point is all good.
clean and good value for money
Quá tiện nghi
good location

Pros: The hotel is quite modern and the place is quiet. AC is working very nice. Cons: Not so spacious, and not valued for the price, the location is far from the nearest train station so you have to walk like 10-15mins to hotel.
If you can look for another place, don't get this one. Still renovating. Smells paint everywhere.

The room was spacious for four people compared to other room that we had surveyed before in Singapore. To commute from this hotel to other places, there are bus services available nearby (about 3-5 minutes walk). The staffs were friendly and helpful in attending to our request and we were able to check in earlier (12.00pm) than the check-in time (2.00pm). Recommended!
The best value for money budget hotel I've stayed in in Singapore.
So so only to stay at this place..can improve more good

It was a short stay for our transit stop at SG and was thinking to have a short nap before catching the next flight but there was renovation going on during the check in. Overall is a budget hotel with good and clean facilities.

reviews.review_title: avoid if you have other choices”
reviews.review_comment: Overall condition of hotel very poor Facility was outdated Room was dirty with ants in bedroom and bathroom Body was itchy after one night of sleep Yet, receptionist at night tried her very best at answering enquiries which was a plus Overall, avoid where possible
good

reviews.review_title: Cheapest one I could find in SG”
reviews.review_comment: This is located in the Red Light District of Singapore, but we didn’t really feel it much as we were always out in the city center. That said, this is quite far from most of the tourist spots but public transportation in Singapore is very efficient so it’s not much of a hassle, it just takes a bit of your time. We never tried taking the train as the nearest station is quite far, but there are a lot of bus stops nearby. Room is quite spacious for its price - SG standards. Bed was big and comfortable. All the facilities were working properly - AC, hot shower, TV, lights, etc. Staff were friendly and helpful. There’s also computers at the lobby if you need to use one. Wi-Fi is terrible though, I suggest you buy a sim. The only thing I would say that I didn’t like is that the door to the bathroom is made of glass, which is not good if you’re staying with friends like we did. It was frosted but you could still see through it. Overall, it was a really good stay. Would recommend.

This hotel is quite far from MRT but there is bus stop near hotel. You can travel by bus If you dont want to walk to MRT. For room, overall is okay but the wall is so thin, you can hear sound outside the room clearly and there is bad smell coming out from the water pipe.
Good good

reviews.review_title: nice hotel in SG , perfect space for a group of 3 ”
reviews.review_comment: stayed 2 days in this hotel with mom and auntie, place is clean and neat. modern design . not spacious but perfect for short stay. :)
Very recommended..👍👍

reviews.review_title: Room is clean and comfortable. Staffs are very helpful”
reviews.review_comment: Mrt station is quite far but luckily it is super easy to commute by bus. 7eleven is quite near
Cheap and convenient, would definitely choose it again if going to Singapour
The location is suitable for small group. The room is clean and nice.

reviews.review_title: Receptionists are very helpful. Hotel room is clean”
reviews.review_comment: the mrt station is quite far from this hotel but fortunately it is super easy to catch a bus near this hote
rooms were clean and value for money.
I will recommend to mg family and friendsz

Pros: 1. Affordable for a SG hotel 2. Location is near restaurants and other establishments 3. Helpful staff 4. 10-20 minutes away from Kallang MRT station. Cons: 1. Room is a bit small 2. Additional toiletries would be appreciated Overall, it's still a good hotel to stay in. Although hotel staff might not look friendly and smiling, they are very polite and accommodating to all our requests and questions. Recommended!
its the first time we had been in Singapore and we love this hotel, they got nice scent at the lobby. staff is nice. room is clean.

The room was just fair, a bit old. The location is not so good, it is located in a somewhat remote place. Tye staff were not so accommodating, not so friendly or hospitable. However, for travelers who just want a place to sleep, then this hotel is good enough.
I want to back in Singapore
My sister/cousin accidentally left the ring inside the room but the staff there told us that they didn't see the ring. And also the staff there is not friendly 👎🏻

reviews.review_title: Cheap chain hotel but does the job. ”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel is situated far from downtown and it is fine because it makes it so much more affordable. The area may seem a little dodgy with a lot of brothels around, but is is Singapore and it is all behind closed doors, so no fear of being harassed by men hanging around if you are a lady. I would say though that it is a little far from MRT but buses around will get you anywhere. It is a chain of hotels and they are very much like any chain. Standard rooms, simple but efficient and clean, although ours smelled of smoke because guests are disrespectful of the rules. Overall, it is fine if you are looking for a budget hotel and don't want to end up in a dorm.

reviews.review_title: WASTE OF OUR MONEY AND THE HAPPINESS OF OUR JOURNEY ”
reviews.review_comment: This is the most stupid desicion i have every made of my life when its selecting a hotel for my family trip. 1) Staff is very rude. 2) Toilet has very bad smell all the time. 3) Though they say they clean very day we have to use same bed sheets for our entire trip period. 4) The family room has the most limited space. At least there has no any place to hang our clothes. 5)I booked two number of rooms and one room has separate bath shampoo and shower gel.But for my other room i had only shower gel.When i asked about it from the reception,they said shower gel and the hair shampoo both are the same.So i have to go outside and spend some extra money for purchase those shampoo items for my use. 6) There is no one to help us carrying our languages. If you every consider about having a great journey in the Singapore i do highly recommend you NOT to book this hotel. THE IMAGES ON THE BOOKING WEB SITES AND THE ACTUALS ARE TOTALLY DIFFERENT.
Check in was hassle-free. Staffs were helpful and attentive. Upon entering the room, noted weird smell from the room. Room were okay, accommodative and comfortable. Quite decent stay.
Cleanliness can improved and more pillows to be comfortable..

reviews.review_title: Clean Value for money, Internet very spotty”
reviews.review_comment: Clean Basic Hotel, Area Good for Food

Wasted my money on this hotel sadly as I was unable to have a group of friends in the room. Read up on SG hotel laws before booking hotels as this hotel was particularly strict. Most staff weren’t very polite except one lady. Its not a bad hotel for families or couples as the price is considerably low. And the staff probably will not be so rude if you followed all the rules. Not coming back though. The location is probably the main reason for its strictness. But there’s many places that sell food nearby which is not bad. Thanks
The room is small but adequate. Plenty of food nearby to eat.
Definitely worth checking out and staying. Near to bus station, and food. Accomodating staff with awesome rooms. Definitely worth it!
The hotel was easy to find. Very near the bus stop. Also, multiple eateries are around the block, as well as, a 24-hr grocery store up front. The rooms are spacious.
Did not make up room properly
Worst hotel ever ...
decent hotel. rooms are pretty small, but the location is very good. many restaurants and fairly close to bus and mrt stops. overall OK for 1 or 2 nights
the room was comfortable and location is near at bus stop.
Limted facilities...need renovation and please add more TV channels
Need renovation very soon
room is clean and good. and requested room is available.
I had small room but it is comfortable and clean. Only problem is hot water seems to finish fast.

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Pacific (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 101 Victoria Street, Bugis, Singapore, Singapore, 188018

reviews.review_comment: Reviews can be deceiving.. If you have an open mind, the hotel is actually not bad.. location is great, the staffs are excellent. Yeah, the hotel need abit of revamping but overall it is a great stay.
Very kind stuff. Worth the money. Room is in good size. Comfortable to stay in.

reviews.review_title: Best Location Hotel in the City”
reviews.review_comment: The only thing we didn't like was the smelly bed sheets and pilow case. But the location is the Best! Very accessible to anywhere in town.
Convenient place, many restaurants nearby, shops and shopping centres within walking distance. Spacious room with nice view

Got this hotel paid extra as it was advertised with hotel and pool , turned up both gym and pool had been closed for some time Breakfast is basic cold toast not much else Rooms are dated needs a update

reviews.review_title: Swimming pool was close for renovation and breakfast was so-so”
reviews.review_comment: Booked the hotel was thinking of bringing our kids to the swimming pool but we were disappointed that the swimming pool was close for renovation which wasn't stated on their website. The breakfast set come was in a set menu instead of buffet style which we can take and eat as much as we would had wanted. Not recommended for travelers especially with young kids

reviews.review_title: Great location and nice room. Restroom was little disappointed ”
reviews.review_comment: Great location where very near bugis and the room was amazing. Little comments regarding toilet. There is stain on bathtub and looks quite old. Overall good.
Everything was good except the swimming pool was under Reno.
Quite clean.

If you’re looking at an affordable hotel with decent room and good location then definitely book this hotel. My 3 night stay comes with free breakfast and the value was worth it. Thank to Ms. Christine for upgrading my room, she was kind and very helpful. The breakfast was plated as its still pandemic but for me its already filling. Thank you!
WiFi not working swimming pool close location is good
Sound of lift is loud, just like a train is approaching
Should have inform us if the swimming pool outbof service as as with young kids...they are looking forward to swim
Upon reaching the hotel, we were told that the hotel is only for SHN guests. We had to book another hotel for our staycation on the spot.

Wasn’t told they have Stay Home Notice guests or would not have book there because the risks of transmission is quite high. Overall reasonable rate and location but understaff and quite a long wait at the counter for check in.
very good location and smooth check in and out
Hotel is very spacious, and not too expensive. Very good location too. However, our room came with a smelly sofa chair. Hotel staff accommodated to replace it.
City Center and good service staff

Location was good just that its an old hotel. Minutes walk to city hall mrt and bugis station. Shopping malls like bugis+ and bugis junction are nearby too. Food is easily accessible like markets and coffeeshop. Front desk staff are very helpful with helping me with carrying up and down of the pram. Hotel should have ramp to be more accessible as there is a short flight of stairs in/out of the hotel. Overall its a good stay with reasonably priced. Christine , Hayley and the indian frontline staff were very helpful and friendly.
Recommended Centrally located budget hotel to serve SHN with meals package

reviews.review_title: Horrible breakfast and staff seems very unsure of what they are doing”
reviews.review_comment: First day of check in, staff did not mention any information regarding facility usage and breakfast details till we check with them. They focus only on telling us extra payment requirement if we got covid. Nxt day morning, me and my gf ordered their American breakfast set (without any special order) at their breakfast cafe. They forgot our order and we waited more than 20min till we notice the table beside us receive their order (they ordered the same item as us) even though we are there much earlier. When food is served, we notice that we are missing several food item from the breakfast set (grilled tomato, ham, bacon etc) and the egg choice is wrong as well. What puzzled us is how did they serve us the food with 3 item missing and did not realize it since it is part of standard menu. Told the staff and he changed it for us, only to bring out wrong item again. All in all, our food item is wrong served 3 time. Their poached egg is also cold like it been left in the aircon for quite some time as well as overcooked (like hard boiled egg). Their tea and juice is also very diluted. Only good thing we can think of is their staff brought us the beer can opener at night time when we called their front desk and request for it.

Booked the hotel via agent but when I went for check in the staff just told me that they dont accept staycation. And that I have to call the booking agent. It could be avoided if they email me in the first place.

the hotel is much newer than i thought. was worried that it is a very old hotel. so surprised to find out the interior of the room is quite new. toilet is quite new too. room is big, with bath tub. a good choice of stay. walking 500m can reach bugis junction, many shopping and nice food there.
Good location
The hotel did not inform me that STB required upon I check in.They should contact me instead.
Convenient location

reviews.review_title: Value for location but not room”
reviews.review_comment: Furnishing is minimal, run down and not very clean. Buffet at restaurant is great and hotel is conveniently located in Bugis/City Hall area. Close to eateries and bus stop in front of hotel.
Bad!

A very big and spacious room. Nice layout of the hotel and near to all the Shopping Malls and Restaurant. Fast in Check-In and Check-Out and the Air-Con is very cold in the room. Unfortunately the parking is not free at all eventhough if you are the Hotel Guest and the facilities of the hotel looks old. But overall our stay here is positive. Shall be back again.
All the staff are super friendly and helpful. Attended to room issues very promptly and satisfactorily. Breakfast is good variety.
LOVE THE LOCATION-WALKING DISTANCE TO MALLS,BUGIS MARKET AND BUGIS MRT STATION. ROOM WAS CLEAN AND NICE COMFY BED. FRIENDLY STAFFS TOO (:
The room is small compare with the price we paid for. Location very handy we liked it. In the room is very clean.

I stayed in Hotel Grand pacific for two days. Pros: The location is good. Close to MRT, shopping malls, Bugis, etc. Staffs are friendly. I was allowed to check-in at 10 am which I greatly appreciated after a long haul 25-hour flight. Cons: Bed - It is not comfortable. It is also not a wooden bed frame. It is a rollaway bed. Room- the room is small and looked old. There was a space between my window and outlayer window and that space was dusty.
Staff were excellent at all times in assisting my partner who needed the use of a wheelchair. This is our second stay at this hotel and we will definitely be staying there again.
Location near MRT and waking distance near little India and Bugie market places
Unfriendly and uncooperative staff, old and mouldy smells in the bedrooms, dirty pool.
Best location near two MRT City Hall & Bugis Station, Hotel Staff is good and thank to agoda to search best deal

reviews.review_title: Satisfactory hotel. Helpful staff. Good food. Reasonable price. ”
reviews.review_comment: Keep up the good work...!
Need to upgrade the hotel condition

we have been staying at this hotel twice per year on and off for the last twelve year when it was called the alson but the last couple of years it has gone down hill it is the first time we have used your company and we will use your company when we come in november and january but at a different hotel on the last day in january our room was flooded it took an hour for someone to come and another 30mins for the manager to come water was running through the wiring no apolige left email address but heard nothing took photos

reviews.review_title: Fantastic location close to MRT starions bus at the front door, rooms are clean and comfortable.”
reviews.review_comment: Have stayed here many times. Convenient location with bus at door and several MRT stations within a few minutes walk. Great breakfast, friendly staff. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Great value for money.
The property is tired looking. there are 3 lifts but seems like 1-2 were always not working properly. Bathroom sink was leaking, generally not worth the price. Other better options nearby
Too crowded with few elevators
Quite an old tired hotel but so clean and fantastic location! I would definitely stay again
stayed here many times always enjoyable and all requirements are attended to
The location was comfortable and walking distance of many tourist destinations. The room was not clean enough even after the repeated reminder.

The hotel is in good location very near to bugis and bus station , beside is 711 for 24 hrs food needs, the staff are so accomodation except the deskman who check us in , a little irritating -he has this bad manners not so welcoming and arrogant...overall our stay is really good and will book again when i come back to singapore..

reviews.review_title: Great hospitality and worth the value”
reviews.review_comment: Booked 3 rooms and thanks for the staff to arrange it at the same floor for two of the rooms. I booked a triple bedroom which comes with a queen bed n single bed. It fit just nice for two adults and one 5 years old kid. However, we have to keep an eye on our 7 months baby when we put him on bed as the bed was quite high compare to standard. We requested a baby cot the next day and thanks to the staff for arranging it as previously was told the room was quite crowed if they were to put a baby cot in. Thanks to the housekeeping staff as well to change the bed sheet when requested due to certain reason. It was a pleasant n great stay for us there. Besides, it was within walking distance to bugis+, bugis Street and bugis Junction mall in 10 minutes. Strategic location with a lot bus stop nearby.

The room was clean and my request for two extra pillows was acceded to. Room’s cooling aircon was switched on when I entered the room and the nice gesture of providing two oranges on the room table provides a tinge of warmness of the CNY’s festive spirits. I would certainly go back to this hotel again.

No water tap for using at toilet cleaning. Next day room cleaning very late and doing it very fast by not paying attention of setting beds and putting ckeaning of used coffee cups etc. Order room service of food take more than half hourbfor getting one fried noodle plate. Morning break fast many showing sign board of food but when open it found hot warer only. Coffee water is not hot and no one taking care at breakfast area. Asked for morning call first day staff said we forgot due to mistake of our new staff. Not worth at all for paying money with family trip. How they are showing 4 stars it should show 3 stars hotel.

Picked this hotel because of it's convenient location, and it is definitely in a very convenient location for access to Orchard Road and Bugis Street precinct. Marina Bay precinct can be accessed with a 20 minute walk. That's kind of where the good part ends. This is an obviously older and now quite tired hotel. The facilities were adequate, but the room was tired but adequate. Dining in the restaurant was extremely disappointing for one evening meal we had there (seafood buffet), and the breakfast was adequate, but nothing more. I would suggest that this hotel is a relatively cheap option if you don't intend to spend any time in the hotel other than sleeping, and that you dine elsewhere.
-Good location -Very friendly and helpful staffs -Rooms are BIG, clean & comfortable -Breakfast is awesome
The room.is very old ..the batchroom is dirty expecially the drained water hole .that is a small insect come out from the drain hole ..the room is old and no clean

reviews.review_title: Value hotel with great access to food and shopping”
reviews.review_comment: Excellent access to buses and MRT and very close to Bugis, where there are lots of food choices and shopping. Good value and comfortable accommodation.

the front desk was quick to help me when they see struggle to carry my luggage. They also checked in to see if i was alright when i turn on the do not disturb for the whole day. location is about 10 min walk to bugis junction. bed was good and room is clean
The hotel appears to be understaffed. The checking-in process took a lot of time and so did the checking out. The location is great and the room was suitably large and clean.

The rooms are a bit old... paint and wood is peeling off esp. in the toilet door ... dust everywhere .. their cupboard and closet seems like haven't been cleaned for ages ... stains on the sheets .. old towels .. stains on the carpet .... during our 3 nights stay, they never changed the bed sheets not even once. They don't vacuum the floor... they just tidy up the beds, changed the towels, replenish the toiletries.. NOT worth the money paid for 2 rooms!!
Nice hotel
goood
The room spacious and clean, but maybe it's need some renovations.
Great location for couple who prefer walk for shopping
All good

Good location, good pricing. Breakfast here is about the best value meal in Singapore. Some of the rooms are a bit dated, but they are gradually renovating them. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Biggest problem is the lifts. Three lifts, one of which wasn't working the whole time we were there, and the two operating lifts were not electrically connected - pushing buttons only activated one of the lifts - leading to longer delays than necessary especially at peak times like checkout.
Get the newly renovated room.. smaller than the old version
You can go anywhere easy
Noisy guests spoiled it

For $400 a night. This is by far my worst experience. Firstly there were stairs right when you reach the entrance and no one was there to assist you life your luggage up. I was only offered assistances when I reach the front desk which was obviously too late. Recep was not friendly at all. She did not even give a smile. Another guest interrupted but she clearly did not speak English and she seemed like like lost her bag. But instead of offering help, Recep have her a look of disgust. Like she couldn’t be bothered. She just replied with a “huh? What? no no no. I don’t know.” And went on with doing her staff. She then handed me over to another Recep. A younger male who seemed new or maybe just reserved. Seemed nervous. She kept on telling him what to do and what room to give me. Spoke in Chinese infront of me which to me was offensive. If you need to speak in private pull him aside instead of just telling him across the front desk in another language. Someone else could have assumed that they were talking about them. So it is definitely not nice at all. Room was old and dated. Bedsheet Had some stains on it. I called for ice. Remember I’m paying $400 for one night. I was then told that a bucket of ice would cost $5. I’ve never been charged for ice so to me this was absurd given the price I was paying and this was not a budget hotel. Pushed one of the beds to the corner as I needed more space and lo and behold, dust and rubbish were found. Clearly they have not swept or vacuumed under the bed for years. Lift was also old and slow. There were different buttons for different lifts. So that was confusing too. All in all, totally not worth the price. Not a very pleasant experience too. Very much disappointed and a total waste of $400.
The location is very convinient to Bugis and bus to Suntec and other places

I’ve been staying in this hotel for quite sometimes, as i can say I’m a reguler, and always satisfied with this hotel. Good location for the first. Secondly, the staffs very nice, polite and communicative . We like Velu very much (the concierge) Nice room, spacious enough but the twin bed is small for me and my child (age 9), so if you bring children and want to stay in 1 room, you have to order additional bed for the comfy nice sleep. Definitely will recommend this hotel to may friends and family. Keep up the good work!
Hotel with old amenities need upgrade

reviews.review_title: Good hotel to stay, near to bugis street”
reviews.review_comment: Reception staff Mr Kenny Lai was good. Thank you. Not so keen with the staff at the restaurant, not friendly. Skipped the idea for buffet lunch cause the staffs at the restaurant.

We had a great room (1416) that was clean and modern. The beds were really comfy and the rooms were quiet and we slept well. It is a shower over a bath, but there was a handle to hold to assist with getting in and out and the bath only had low sides so it was better than others. There was some enamel coming off in the bath but we werent bothered by that. The location is excellent, with an MRT line less than 5 mins away (bras basah) and a bus stop out the front that many buses stop at. The Bugis and City Hall MRT were 5-10 mins walk away. There is a small hawker centre straight across the road, and the bugis shopping centre and market about 5 mins walk away.
Location is good not far from bugis and easy to find food, room is big and clean

Great shopping and eats - all things BUGIS within easy walk from hotel. Close to Bugis and Bras Basah MRT. Bras Basah is the station to choose if making your way there from an MRT with luggage as only 200m. Beds are a bit hard but a mattress topper was supplied when we called reception which made the bed more comfortable. Great buffet breakfast. Several food courts nearby under $10 AUD. Bus stop right outside hotel. Used MRT to Casino $1.50 SGD each and as it was after midnight coming back to the hotel only $8 AUD taxi ride back including surcharge.

Rooms were clean, bit dated but the location was fantastic. Near Bugis and City Hall MRT’s. Breakfast was good, presentation lacking a little but plenty of it. Same for westerners every morning. Bacon, eggs, baked beans, hashbrowns, fruit plus danishes and Chinese choices.
when I stayed, few of rooms in my floor were being maintained. I heard some hacking.

The hotel is worth your money, maybe not the hi-tech type but you can have a good sleep with their comfy bed and pillows, good breakfast choices, and the staff named Velu is the most friendly and accomodating staff during our stay.
The only cons is that the parking is not free 😬
Toilet bowl was clogged. Basically the hotel is too old and need to refurbished. The carpet is not vacuum and I can see lots of hair n dust.

reviews.review_title: Good value for location and good sized & comfy bed”
reviews.review_comment: Pros -very good location around Bugis, just opposite National Library which is another plus for my kids to have some quiet time -comfy bed, extra pillows for us and kids, complimentary baby cot, bottled water and good selection of tv channels -next to it is a 7-Eleven -very near to attractions, malls, bus stop, mrt -staff is friendly and check in/out is a breeze Cons - hotel room furnitures are dated and old but it is still usable so I am OK with it -Toilet smells after flushing but still bearable -Bath tub sized a bit small for adult, just nice for my 6&8yo kids to play in it -Cleanliness can be improved eg:dusty around the corners of wardrobe, under the bed and floor. -If you are sensitive to sound, you might need to consider to ask for room at the far end as we can hear tourists passing our room and talking outside/ other kids running around But for such price and location I would say worth it!!

The ONLY issue I wish to highlight is the attitude of the front desk staff. I am wondering if "Greetings" is not mandatory in their service. I wonder if that is only extended to foreigners that aren't Asian looking. I enquired about the legitimacy of having my Identity Card photocopied & the response was rather stern & harsh as though I was making a big fuss, which I didn't. I handed my credit card to the lady staff when a deposit was required. She processed the transaction but however, a male staff completed the transaction & returned my card instead. I thought it was strange that she didn't return my card herself. I think it is important that the same person who handled a customer's card should be the one to return back to the customer as this would prevent an error in returning to a wrong customer. Finally, did she wish me a pleasant stay in the hotel? I didn't expect any but it would have made my day if she did.

reviews.review_title: Very disappointed with the hotel staff. They give me room with renovation ongoing on top of my room”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel should not give the room to me. Even on sunday morning arround 8am the contruction start. can't sleep at all. Will not recommended for all type of travellers.
The carpet and beds are a bit dated but the staff and location were excellent. Staff was very helpful. For the money, it was definitely a good deal.

reviews.review_title: This is old hotel, insolation is needed to fix, too noisy”
reviews.review_comment: Don't think we will be back to this hotel again
Very good staff, clean room, Great location as the center of Singapore. Very good to stay.
Walking distance to shopping area and public transport such as MRT are very near.

First time we stayed here room was very new and nice. Two years later when we stayed here, we got s room that was not renovated yet ? I wouldn’t recommend but all in all adequate room even if a bit old

Value for money, Good size clean & comfortable room. breakfast had good variety of food to select from. Location was perfect for shopping & restaurants. Staff helpful & friendly. Definitely stay again.*****

Staff were very helpful, friendly and accommodating - arranged airport shuttle service. Location is very central to transport, eateries and shopping malls. Rooms were nice and large, but dark gloomy decor. Housekeeping requires attention in ensuites ie; terrible mould under hand basin rim, bath tap and bath drain. Pool area needs to be available a little later in the evenings. Would stay again
Near Mustafa Centre where there is everything there
Its an old establishment. But location wise its good
simple but complete facilities for two night stay..

reviews.review_title: The only thing changed as a concern is no key needed for going up the elevator which lowers the secu”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel has lowered the security requirement for inserting room key in order to go up the elevator which is my concern of guest security.

reviews.review_title: The hotel provides a good location in Singapore ”
reviews.review_comment: If you are food addict person or you love to walk around to discover the beauty of Singapore then this hotel is the one. Disadvantages: 1) their breakfast is not halal and it’s same and boring. 2) they don’t have hand spray in the bathroom 🤦‍♂️. If you have no problem with the above then I highly recommend this hotel to everyone.
Pros: Near shopping.mall Cron: kind of old and no free parking
Good Hotel
the hotel was very cosy, walking distance from everything, really enjoyed my stay there
very good
Good location, apart from that this hotel has nothing going for it. The bathroom is so small it’s a struggle when the door is open. The internet is poor.

Good location. Room is very tired, small and toiletries are basic. The carpet is old. The lifts are small and could only handle about 5 people and luggage. Overload easily.. The staff at reception was very kind and showed us three rooms available that we could choose as we were dissatisfied with the first two rooms that were given to us.

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Central (SG Clean, Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 22 Cavenagh Road/Orchard Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 229617

reviews.review_comment: Location good

reviews.review_title: Golden location, valuable. Breakfast is pack delivery to room ”
reviews.review_comment: Clean ! Comfortable! Well maintained Old hotel. Breakfast is sent to room with one container, not worth to pay any dollars to get that breakfast. ☹️ Taste awful
Nice breakfast, quiet stay in middle of town.
Very good
Lazy housekeeping, Chinese auntie wont clean your room Miserable reception.
Poor AC. Small room. No room service.

reviews.review_title: Ok for a clean bed with no luxury.”
reviews.review_comment: Bed was comfortable a and clean. WiFi was slow and television restricted w I th no access in movie channel.

Besides location this hotel offers nothing. Either short staff or pure laziness , entire 4 days stay was without cleaning/housekeeping despite informing the chinese lady housekeeping required. Just dirty! Reception unfriendly and look miserable.
I paid extra for breakfast. Yet the breakfast is just a packet of bee Hoon hang at the door of our room with a kids pack orange juice and cup of yogurt.
Very accessible to MRT (400m away) and bus station (200m away). Taxi stand across the street.
Great stay,

Great location. Fairly clean with outdated decor. Has hyflux water filter but the cold option isnt cold at all. The pool does has a great view but they need to do better landscaping. The ferns are overwhelmed and dried too. Breakfast is totally not recommeded. Sent up tasteless, soggy fried maggie with 2 halfsie hotdogs for the first morning, and fried tasteless pasta for the 2nd ones. Location has loads of eateries, fret not.
Good

Jot what I want . I actually request for a beautiful view. But what I get is a dark and super inside room. Totally not a good place for staycation. And the service is suck . I ask whether can change the room type and the staff who on duty did not answer my request.
Respectful and helpful staff especiallu the two concierge and April, the Filipina manning the front desk.

reviews.review_title: Very dirty hotel room with many defective items/fixtures ”
reviews.review_comment: Very dirty bathroom, room, hallway, etc. Bathroom has mold, shampoo bottle and shower gel bottle were still left open by the bathtub from previous guest. Many items in the room were defective, including missing bedside table, broken bathroom door, broken towel rack, etc etc.

Daytime woman at the desk so so. Night time desk man fantastic. Went way out of his way to get copies printed of documents the Philippines wanted for quarantine free return entry. A real gem in these covid days
good. worth for money. excellent location
Staff was utterly rude worse customer service
Due to COVID, the hotel had closed restaurant and hence there was lot of challenges for food.

Stayed in triple room, suitable for 3 adults and 1 kid. Suprisingly there is a bathup even though the toilet is quite small. Rooftop swimming pool, with pool for kids. Location is very near to sommerset station and all the shopping malls.

The intention was to have bathtub and the bathtub is not very big but acceptable. Check in and check out is fast. Easily accessible. What's more where you are located near to Don Don Donki which is 24 hours.
Basic hotel no frills, good bed. Super small bathroom
Great!!
I am really disappointed by the marketing strategy adopted by this hotel, it serves pathetic breakfast , staff is really bad.

Aircond is ok. Not super cooling yet can accomodate singapore hot weather. Location is gd. Reach out to nearest bus stop and mrt station Shower and bathtub, water pressure flow is strong and hot enough Water dispenser, my favourites. Easy to reach out for hot coffee and tea Bedding is fine. Comfy and cosy Sound proof of the room, able to hear kids crying in midnight. Nothing can be expect Cleaner, housekeeping. very nice person, would greet you hello, gd morning and friendly The wifi, can be disconnected sometimes but mostly quite stable for me while work from hotel. Overall, i would choose to stay again.

Hotel very well located near somerset mrt. Nearby hv 24 hrs indian muslim food, laundry service and bar. Price was decent for long stay. Fridge arent that cooling. Aircond is not that freezing but able to hold up Singapore hot weather. Water flow is big when showering. What i like the most is the water hot dispenser. Not need boil water and u get hot water instantly.
Excellent. I will give u 7 stars if there is an option to it. Great!!!

This is our second time to be in this hotel abd again we have had an amazing time. The only thing that we did not like is the breakfast. While booking it was never mentioned that breakfast is pre-packed. The breakfast was non edible and mostly stone cold when delivered at our door. So we ended giving the majority of our breakfast packs away or throwing them in the rubbish bin. It was really a waste of money. So do not pay for their breakfast! We tried it this time because the website says that cafeteria is now available and we did not realize that breakfast is pre-packed! It was really disappointing! There is also very limited viewing channel thats why this time around we brought our apple device to be able to watch decent films :) Other than the horrible pre packed breakfast and limited viewing option, we actually enjoyed the location, the staff and the hotel itself. That’s why we came back and stayed even longer this time.

The receptionist that chinese lady. She is so rude!! Your technician that came and fix my tv. 好像我欠你们很多钱这样。不想做工就不要做啦。don't show your guest one kind of bullshit face! To the management ifyou wish to know further details , feel free to contact me!

reviews.review_title: Avoid the breakfast if possible unless you can’t go out ”
reviews.review_comment: The breakfast was really a let down. No coffee was provided with the breakfast set. Called the reception and asking if have coffee, answer is just “sorry there is no coffee” … if I was served the coffee with the bread and potato salad & orange juice, I might be rather contented ( not still, not worth the 15$ Per set) .. you can get better breakfast set for just 5-6$ near to the hotel. Stay was not bad, quite clean as things are new.. but I won’t stay there again as my experience was not so positive as I waited more than 1 hour for check in that day due to school holiday period

Hotel check in system was horrible. Waited for almost 30 mins before I was served at the counter and waited another 20 mins just to be checked in. After checking in, I had to wait for another 15 mins just to take the lift up to my room as there was a fire alarm testing going on and ended climbing the stairs to my room. Room in real life looks very different from what was pictured. Was a little disappointed with the outcome. Asked for Late Check out and was told to check out anytime before 1pm. Received a call from front desk at 12.15pm asking me to check out immediately. Very disappointed by the rude service by the Front Desk. When checking out, I still have to wait 5 to 10 mins to check out. Overall, it was a disappointing experience and will never consider coming back..
Small room however for the cheap price its worth it.

Most unfriendly and rude staff! Upon asking to change room to double bed as requested during booking. Reception airs name Beni. Lied on face that no one checking out for 3 week and girl fully book for 3 week so can not change room. And same day I check Agoda it was doing available room for coming days. Bad experience.

Check-in took us about half an hour, while there are two receptionists but only 3 groups in front of us. Also, have requested king size bed for couple, but the lady receptionist said that left with 2 single beds, understand that requests subject to availability but expect they at least combine the 2 single beds for us. This is the first time for us to stay in this hotel and also the only time.

reviews.review_title: 1 HOUR TO QUEUE at least TO Check IN”
reviews.review_comment: Ridiculously long queue to check in. Had been travelling and staying in so many hotels in so many countries. Never in my life had I ever thought a hotel in my own home town (Singapore) to be providing this kind of service. I don't believe you would choose to blame your below standard service on the Covid situation. Come on, definitely an hour at least just to Check in? I had paid for my stay, yes I understand that the usual procedure needs to be done, but you are severely under staffed. Well. i just left, that's it. Definitely won't be returning. So guys if you are reading this review, do think twice unless they can offer you cancellation if you didn't manage to check in. Well just too bad i had to forfeit my stay.
Very good

reviews.review_title: Best hotel for location with an affordable price.”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel Grand Central has the best location in SG right at the heart of Orchard road with the most affordable price and cozy room.
Nothing memorable in particular but respected that the hotel has decent customer service. Did not give me any problem and it is near to town so that is a plus point. Thanks

The hotel is conveniently located just 5 mins walking away from Orchard Central. Don’t need to worry about food and entertainment as they are all within walking distance. The room is of a decent size and relatively clean although it showed sign of old age.

At the price offered, I would say is value for money this location. Overall was fine since it is quite near to shoppongs, coffee shop and cafe. Toilet is clean but small. Room facilities is alright a bit old. Ok for short stay.

reviews.review_title: Good location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: The quality of breakfast has room for improvement.
It was great experience

The Hotel was very clean and the comfortable. But the service wasn't that of what I expected . I was too tired I overslept one hour past the chk out and already there was a big commotion . Until the8 actually use Mastercard to open the door to ask my wife wake us up as my wife too was locked out cos we overslept when she went out to buy food . I was doing my night shift earlier before checking in. My wife offered to pay for another extension since she knew I was knocked out too tired but next moment she knew they already open the room which I felt theres no privacy. If they think something might have happen my wife is downstairs at their lobby to settle things. So it was a bad experience for me .
Nice room

I choose this hotel because of the pool. I tried to reserve a slot for the pool via email but I can only do it upon check-in. I checked in at about 3:50 pm but wasn't able to reserve a spot. The room is clean and the receptionist are kind.
We requst large room during our reservation but we can't get the room. Beside that, next to our room all in quarantine they did not seperate staycation customer and those whose in quarantine.

I think everything is fair enough. Didn’t get to use swimming pool as it was raining. Breakfast was PATHETIC. For one day breakfast, additional $30. We were served a halal meal which consist of 2 pcs prata and a few potatoes with curry. There’s small orange juice with a yoghurt. It’s really not worth it at all.
Location is superb for a staycay and affordable. Room and facilities are clean and service staff are welcoming. My only setback is my toilet has no bidet spray. Good to install one

reviews.review_title: Basic hotel in a centralise area”
reviews.review_comment: Overall its a ok stay, nothing much to comment about a hotel Very simple and basic hotel. However the location is great if you want a cheap hotel just right outside the shopping zone of orchard.
I like it as it's quiet!
Never come back again!

all requests were ignored. booked a king bed and got twin beds pushed together which were very easily separated. the beds were extremely itchy (I have sensitive skin, he does not). the counter staff were not very friendly either. location wise is pretty good and easy to locate. the hotel provides bath towels, shampoo, body shampoo and toothbrushes. soundproofing isn’t the best. overall, quite disappointing. they had a pretty cool water dispenser in the room though.
It’s very convenient ! Near MRT and Orchard shopping malls. Will try it again!
Bathroom size was pathetic.. aircon wasnt cold .. needless to mention, breakfast provided wasnt up to par.

Front office name Daphne was trully sucks. From the first time I approach her for registration, she don't even greet, smile n acknowledge my presence. Gv me a kind of look, e slowest registration I'm going thru at the counter. For formality sake just telling me no large bed n keep on telling me it's upon availability.. Eventhough I do made a remark in booking n payment 1 month in advance. What matters is not about the bed, but it's about her attitude. She don't deserve to be in the frontline.
Close to Orchard Road shopping area. Close to bars and restaurants. Room just big enough to be comfortable.
Hard Bed sheet, spoiled door with loud noise, broken glass , the top of the curtain is spoiled.
stinky room. chargeable for ice.
Nice location. Nice pool. Good ambience.

The room was just nice for 2 person's with a nice view as we got the 10th floor. However, the check in time was very slow. The facilities like swimming pool had restrictions (we could not go just to see as we have to request for the staff to escort us). The room had a lot of facilities. Worth the money paid.

reviews.review_title: You get what you paid for”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel cleanliness is atrocious. Limited TV channels available and fridge is not even cold. Staff is cold and not polite at all. They claimed to have a gym on site but its just a room with 2 equipment. On top of that, pool water is dirty and the bathtub in the room has a cracked on it. Highly not recommended but if you're to waste money, by all means
Not the best and not the worst. Location is great though
The room carpet got funny smell
I dun believe ur breakfast to ur guests some as SHN person or QO person.. We not SHN or Qo at ur hotel..but as guests for staycation The breakfast so bed.. not value of money
