Got a good deal for $97 for one night. Got a nice room with a view, However, the bathtub had a crack in it that needs to be fixed.
All i can say its the best staycation so far....staff is super friendly...
Might come again

Terrible first impression I have for Hotel Grand Central by female staff Rosni dyring checking in. Even the housekeeping is friendly and polite than there front counter staffs. And the gym has only 1 equipment. Next time please do not advertise that you have a gym when there is only an equipment that we can use. Return to stay: NEVER!
the locations is good. Some of the staffs at the reception are not so friendly. the swimming pools is closed
Poor service, standard sucks, manager like hooligoon dun allow me to shorten my stay. food sucks. Hotel & toilet size so small not meant for human stay. Food oso not meant for human consumption!
This is our last minute plan but it turn out to be good. We had a nice stay.
Location of the hotel is near to Somerset MRT station. A lot of good choices to shop around Orchard. Good restaurant as well
Good and helpful Staff...
Location is not too good, water boiler is not working, otherwise is good value for money

reviews.review_title: Very very long check in queue and very mouldy smell”
reviews.review_comment: Almost 5 and check in queue was extremely long and slow staff. Room very musky and air con smell of mould. Cigarette smell in room also.
This hotel thou a bit dated, the staff are friendly and place are clean. Not expensive given the great location.
it's okayyyy
Food provided during SHN is so lousy. Chicken curry is very smelly. Staff don’t understand about customer service and easy going. Ask for tooth paste and brush 3 times and never send to room.

reviews.review_title: Read all the reviews B4 U book this hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Encountered a rude malay receptionist (speccy guy) on 1st day of CNY. He is a shame to those working in service industry. Got the worst room view, facing directly to 3 neighbouring rooms. Have to keep my curtains on at all times for privacy. Small dirty swimming pool full of hairs & dirt. Stay here unless you have low budget.......
Had a great time Highly recommended!
Very accessible, near by orchard central, 313 and plaza sing

room abit small but still good. fridge was not cold. great location! hotel should put a notice in the room, about booking of slot usage for facilities eg. swimming pool, etc. staff at check-in counter was polite and accomodating. Appreciated his help!!
Very good location. Rooms are small but clean and decently nice. Value for money. Overall, satisfied with my stay and its a good 3 star hotel.
They can better the room on water heater for drinking not hot and toiletries item some are not place.
Nice location with very clean room. And good house keeper

The hotel is no where close to a good value for money. They did not highlight that they will be providing a bento box for breakfast, even though I paid a premium for a breakfast inclusive rate. Also, there were only 6 channels on TV...so nothing much one could watch. The daily housekeeping was basic. All in all, I wouldnt recommend this hotel to anyone to stay
Nice and clean environment. Very convenient too.
It’s Certainly the best bed and pillows I’ve ever slept in the hotels, And the location is really good, very close to orchard road and the MRT station.
Strict follow of SOP - Which is what I liked stay here in the midst of Pandemic! Professional Security Staff Professional Reception Staff All very helpful
Easy Walk to Plaza Singapurra
Easy Access to amenities
Room quite small, cheap in the area, near shopping center, 10-15 mins to sommerset mrt st. Not recommend if you have big luggages
Plus great staff! For business or pleasure- very centrally located. Worth the money in Singapore! Manager Benny is fantastic and runs a great team of staff!
Awesome hotel for aolo travelers or couples who are not fussy. Clean and value for money. Good central city location

reviews.review_title: Overall we are satisfied and enjoyed our stay”
reviews.review_comment: We enjoyed our stay. Friendly staff, accommodation is good. We were on high flr corner room and its quiet. Clean bed and sheets. Complete TV, wifi, aircon, iron and iron board, vault, hairdryer in bathroom, rainshower head and handheld shower, hot and cold water dispenser is a plus to this hotel. (anytime available). Free slippers, shower gel and shampoo nice smell, toothbrush and toothpaste freshen breath, toiletries complete. Breakfast is more than enough. Usage of swimming pool safe by booking so its kinda exclusive an hr of usage . Overall satisfied stay at affordable price. Recommended. Worth it.
- very close to all classic landmarks Great & friendly staff -Safe and Secure place -Close to MRT
Excellent location.The staff had my room upgraded.
Nothings is good. And more than that if you have car you must pay for parking. I did call before I booked the hotel staff said yes there’s parking included in my package

hotels.name: Champion Hotel City (SG Clean Certified & Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 37 North Canal Road, Clarke Quay, Singapore, Singapore, 059293

reviews.review_comment: First, it’s quite affordable given how hotel prices are in Singapore and I booked it during the holiday season, with access to Chinatown by foot. Second, the staff were all friendly and very helpful! Thank you so much!

reviews.review_title: No frills hotel for solo travelers”
reviews.review_comment: The location is excellent as it's surrounded by many F&B outlets, near MRT station and the city area. The hotel facility is adequate but not fantastic. The bluetooth speaker and USB charging ports are nice. The cleanliness is okay for someone who isn't too concerned about cleanliness like me. But if I'm a cleanliness freak I wouldn't be that impressed.
Small and basic room . Cant complain much for the price
Highly recommend for solo traveler
Excellent location. Friendly and helpful staff.

Great location for City Centre, Chinatown, Clarke & Boat Quay. MRT entrance across the road. Clean, well maintained. Get a front room with Park Views if possible (Windowless rooms are spacious but a little 'confining'.)

I posted videos of the hotel and many of my friends asked me about it. The hotel is definitely worth the money - awesome room, pretty balcony with a good view, and most importantly, the central location! I will definitely book a room here again!

reviews.review_title: Everything is good, except for cleaniness.”
reviews.review_comment: This hotel is good in everything, friendly and responsive staff, superb location, and value for money. But its cleanliness is really quite bad. When we first checked in, there was plenty of hair strands all over the floor. Also, the soundproofing is quite bad. Expect to hear noises throughout the day.
Gd location nice n cosy
Decent stay for the price and location. Parking not provided but location's great next to MRT. Very small room but wifi was good.
The single room is small but it has all the things that needed. The room is clean and the bed is comfortable. It is value for money.

reviews.review_title: Location Centric, Nice and Friendly staff”
reviews.review_comment: The location of the hotel is great which is in between Clarke Quay and Chinatown.. Also, near to MRT and a lot of eateries can be found nearby. Staff is super nice and the room itself though a bit small but it has all the basic amenities. Good for budget stay!!

reviews.review_title: Good for couples on a budget”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed 2 nights, basic amenities but room is in tip top, clean condition. Bed is cozy, bathroom is small but clean. Great location, close to CQ MRT and Clarke Quay Mall, with donki nearby. Many eateries, buzzing night life/cafes. Can walk around CQ riverside area :) would recommend!

Went for solo staycation and was pleased with the service! This hotel is perfect for solo travellers and its nearby shopping centres as well as the tourist site! The room that I stayed in was cozy and comfy for me! Would definitely come here again!
The hotel is in the city and can go to many places very easily.
Room is basic but good enough. Sound proofing not very good though
I thought the theme was amazing. Definitely worth the money for a night's stay and the room was spacious.
Clean, nice cosy small room, good location
good location,nearby mrt station and shopping mall. Love the room design.
Bedsheet is not clean - have stain and long hair Kattel - overflow when heat up even in half water level Day reception - ask for extra towel for next morning just giving excuses

reviews.review_title: Location is good but bad on room cleaning”
reviews.review_comment: Location is excellent but room cleaning is bad especially on bed there was so dusty and dirty.
good
Stayed during the Phase 2 Heightened Alert. Near Chinatown MRT. Modern and clean.

Stay here for 3 night single room without window. The wall wallpaper is very old and mouldy. Room is bit dusty maybe ventilation is not good. And got spiderweb.. nothing much can do in room as the space is very limited. Will I be back to stay this hotel again? Perhaps yes if they renovate it. Location wise, is very near to Clarke quay and Chinatown with walking ard 5 mins. Great location.
Actually extended my stay after 2 nights!!! It was a pleasant stay!! Love the minimalistic concept.

We book executive queen room and get same as advertise in picture Pros Cold aircon Strong wifi Tv channel around 6-7 Mini fridge Hair dryer Slipper and toileries adequate Large space for luggage under bed Cons Small room and toilet No wardrobe only small drawer A little bit dust Tv channel mostly for news Overall the hotel is clean ,staff also nice,cosy place,even the housekeeper also very helpful and friendly,near chinatown mall m mrt station..nice hotel
Like the room design, Air con not cold, hot bath is working well, bed ok, pillow case seems dusty though. But overall acceptable for sleep. Just has to sleep without the blankets
Cleanliness should be improve.
Request for quiet room but was assigned a noisy room beside the road… did not rest well.
very good service and the room is clean
Cosy
stayed one night at Champion hotel. Staff was nice! I had the single room. it was small but the space was well used. Just wish it has a window.
Good location for staycation

I recently stayed 7 nights at the hotel due to ongoing house renovation. Everything is great - the staff are friendly, housekeeping is prompt, the coffee machine at the lobby etc. I feel safe during my stay. It is walking distance to Funan, City hall area, Clarke Quay area and Chinatown area. It is a great option for anyone who just need a decent place to stay.
Excellent location and clean rooms. Enjoyed my 3 day stay.
Convenient location . Room is small but provide everything I need .
Nil
The hotel located right opposite of the clarke quay mrt station. Even though the room size might be small but it consist everything a hotel room should have.
Location is very good, but if you want the best CP especially customer service, this is not the place

My 2 nights stay was relaxing, which is really my goal...i notice only the room was dusty, esp the under table. I need to wipe all before i use all the facilities..the next day, i thought at least during room service, they will vacuum the floor like that, but only change linens was done. But over all, my stay was fun and still much recommended.

I rent a room for 10 days. I like the design, low price during pandemic, open air car park just in front of hotel, police station just opposite, bus stop at hotel entrance only, near to expressway, good place for tourists especially. Provide washing machine and dryer, super convenient, fridge and security box individual room.
Location near clark quary..so far okay..
Although it is a small hotel but the ambience promotes calmness.
No satellite/cable tv.
room is bit small but all facilities are provided and cleaned.

When met with problems, the front desk person, which I can't identify whether male or female, would find many excuses to push away the responsibility & if I insist on him/her addressing the probelm, temper will flare & he/she will raise his/her voice. Wifi connection didn't work at first until I insisted. Selling a room type on Agoda that is not available in the hotel is something they keep denying & refuse to apologize. Absolutely terrible & unprofessional way of running he hotel, as if they didn't pay someone enough to qualify for the job. Room is on the older side & very dusty. Cleaning women sits at the lobby's armchair all the time as if she owns the hotel. No smiles from any of them. Absolutely not returning & not recommending it anyone for whatever kind of stays.

The room is really smaller than the images. And cleanliness is not up to standard. The room is dusty, there was some pubic hair on the bathroom seat, stains were in the sink, and the bedsheet was dusty and sandy and with stains. The towers are really worn out and the spare pillow cases were obviously not changed and dirty. For the price, I have stayed in better places. This Champion Hotel does not deserve it's star ratings. Its way overrated.

Thanks for your early check in and front desk staffs are helpful and friendly.Housekeeper does a great job!Room is very small and bed platform is slightly high.No window view so I can't tell if is day or night.It is ok as I am out the whole day.The bed is comfortable.Heater is working.AC is in good condirion too. Walking distance to Chinatown for yummy eatery places, Chinatown MRT and shopping mall. Overall, I enjoy my stay here and will definitely come back again.

Near to Clark Quay MRT exit A Room was so cool with fixed rack for drying. Request hangar upon arrival if you need too. Near to any eateries (7 eleven 24hrs, macdonald) Happy customer will stay again. 👍👏 Water heater was damn good. 👍
Small but clean and nice ambience. You can hear other guests outside as its not soundproof but other than that. All is great & comfortable.
Centrally located
overall a good stay for birthday party, staff was nice & the balcony for smoking was very convenient!!
The room is small yes but just nice for 2 person . Also shout out to the frontdesk crew especially Ira for being super polite & friendly ! The staff and ambience i will gve 10⭐

reviews.review_title: Pretty good but a bit pricey given the room is small”
reviews.review_comment: Overall the stay is quite pleasant. The room is small and is a bit pricey given the room size is small but is clean and comfortable. Good location with nice cafes on nearby. Walkable distance to malls. However, the aircond and refrigerator took a long while to become cool given that the weather is cooling during our visit.
The bed was nicely tidy but notice there are some of the unwanted hair (maybe is drop from the previous customers). And there are some little stain on the bedsheet
Hotel is very near to public transport, attractions and local food. It is worth your stay in Singapore. I had my staycation there, and was very pleased with the room and the design.
amazing stay
If you are just looking for a place to sleep and out most of the time then this is ok. Not recommended for staycation as it is very small and literally no windows.

It’s easy to find and very convenient as it’s just a walking distance towards the MRT and The Central was just nearby. We stayed for just one day and it’s kinda worth the price for the location and room. Although the room was small, it has everything we need. It is great for a short weekend getaway if you need a quiet place.

Very clean hotel. I booked for Executive Single room for one night and then moved to my Premium Double Room with City view for 2 nights of stay. It was lovely and I love everything inside the room. Very spacious and you have everything you need. A walking distance to Clarke Quay and very near to MRT as well. Highly recommended for staycation.
Can't sleep well, mid night still can heard outside chit chat

The location is good, across the street from the famous parkroyal pickering hotel. The most disappointing part is the room layout. While I expected it to be compact, I didn’t not expect having the bed facing the toilet. Yep, you sit on the bed, and you see the toilet as the bathroom door is a glass one. It makes me really uncomfortable. Being in a very compact room without window and see the toilet from literally anywhere, I don’t know if I wanna stay there again. I think you can stay in a better-layout room with the same price if you can tolerate a bit more distance from the city centre. Honestly Singapore is very small, and it is so easy to commute to anywhere.

This hotel has excellent cleanliness, friendly staff, is located within walking distance to many attractions, has wonderful facilities such as free washing and drying services, and is cheaper than other hotels. You cannot ask for a better accommodation :)

Good: Check in was fast. Room was small but had plenty of storage. Room was clean. Basic amenities were given. Toilet hose was provided. Wifi was fast. Free hot drinks was amazing. Location was excellent. Bad: Rain shower wasn’t working properly because of loose fitting. Upbeat music can be heard during the day due to the gym classes nearby (maybe). Housekeeper auntie open my room door by mistake. Overall: Good stay... able to have a good night sleep.
Room was small but overall it's clean
Very friendly receptionist and the room are pretty clean as well. Location wise is quite accessible to MRT. Just a few mins walk to the nearest MRT.

Friendly staff, strong wifi, complimentary coffee/tea/milo machine for guests at lobby, clean & comfortable bed, convenient location (in between 2 MRT stations & malls). I like how the room is compact yet able to store my items with hidden drawers etc. Bonus to have a bidet these days because most hotels don't have one! Will stay here again if I need to be near office.

Once you enter, your nose sense some strong unpleasant scent. And one you enter the room, you will smell another unpleasant smell such as cigarettes. If you are really tight in budget, this could be one of option but i still would not recommend it

Bedsheet was dirty and the room smelled really bad. The pillows were really smelly I had them removed and the headboard smelled bad too. Asked for some spray to get rid of the smell but they only have disinfectant spray for the toilets. The aircon was ridiculously loud as well. Other than that, the room was tidy and modern looking and looks new. The staff was friendly and wifi speed was great. It is very near the mrt and walking distance to Chinatown and Clarke quay and was easy to find.
Love the interior design and layout of the hotel room. Clean. Small but wont feel unbreathable. Overall very good experience.

reviews.review_title: old room, wifi not working from time to time”
reviews.review_comment: Give it a try, was staying at the quay hotel last round. not to expectation, champion hotel at joo chiat is much more cleaner, bigger and well maintain then champion city. Wifi drops from time to time...

my mum stayed there for around 1 week and she said she was very happy. the place is very convenient, near to Chinatown and Clarke Quay Mrt. Many foods around and my mum had no trouble looking for food. The room has every facility a decent hotel should have, private toilet, fridge, and safe box. 5 stars for you~~

reviews.review_title: I wonder did they have change the bed sheet, cuz I'm always itchy when I sleep ”
reviews.review_comment: And saw some pollut at the bed sheet
Really like the room I got. The decor is really nice!

SHN 7nights at this hotel. Upgraded from single room to premium single room as there is no window, room is small and aircon sound was annoying which need to be improved. Construction at side road also created dusts. Room was designed in lean and creative manner which maximise the space and looks good. Receptionist and cleaner are helpful and friendly.
It’s near Clark Quay, so affordable, and clean

reviews.review_title: Simple and no-frills in the CBD area”
reviews.review_comment: If rooms without windows suit you, and you do not feel claustrophobic, this cheap boutique hotel may be just for you. Located inside CBD near Chinatown it is near the Singapore River and many eateries nearby. Early check in is available (if you try your luck).

staff was very rude prior to stay. was just asking about the STB’s regulations for staycations and staff’s reply was really rude and uncalled for. understand that that particular staff has left his/her job but it’s still pretty unprofessional. the room was a bit small even for 2 people and someone smoked on my level. was given the option to switch room so that was okay. hotel rooms lack hangers? and i have to self collect it at the reception, asked for extra towels but was told that there isn’t enough to go around. location is good though, we could walk to chinatown and clarke quay. pretty near city hall too. overall, i love this place for its location, but facilities was really mediocre.
Clean, friendly staff, central location. My room was small but it was well designed to increase storage space. There’s a cigarette-like smell everytime I enter the room but everything else was great.

reviews.review_title: comfortable stay for a solo traveller”
reviews.review_comment: small room with basic toiletries provided but overall comfortable enough. i brought an overnight bag with me since mine was a short stay but travellers with large luggages would likely have trouble opening them fully. Room and toilet were very clean and I felt comfortable using it. Walls were abit thin so could sometimes hear some noise from the corridors/other rooms but it didn't bug me too much. Would consider coming back if I need a place to crash for a short while
Hotel near clark quay mrt and chinatown..good location Room too small and the room no provide hanger. Can hear sounds from next room

reviews.review_title: very convenient location, new and clean hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Allocated a room on level 5, although no room has not windows, it was a ery clean and nicely designed room. with an open veranda to hang just near the lift lobby. very convenient location, near clarke quay central and clarke quay mrt, busstop just right outside the hotel. nice cafes nearby, i.e. punch cafe popular for western brunch.. feel like grabbing supper also can proceed to donki opposite, or short 10 minutes drive to geylang for some night supper.

Pro: Convenient location Cons: Bad draining system for the sink + shower, hand soap doesn’t even have a coaster for it, bath towels with holes, really strong smoke smell on non-smoking level, on the pricier
It was a cozy and enjoyable stay in the double room with no windows. However, ventilation could have been better and there were spots of stain on the sheets and wallpaper.

So far, so good. Executive single room is comfortable, value for money. Staying for 12 days. Has everything I need for a comfortable stay while waiting for a flight out of the country. Great job to the staff, thank you for all that you do.

cute boutique hotel across the road from a station. Room was small but well designed. Coffee and hot chocolate in the lobby 24/7, staff were friendly and helpful. self-service laundry on the top floor. would stay here again.
Great location. Room is small but has well planned storage.
Room smell cigarette

Hotel is centrally located within walking distance to many downtown attractions. It is also 2 minute walk to the subway system should you need to head out to attractions further away. I stayed in a single room. It was very small and extremely compact (9 sq meters). All space within the room is put to use. Refrigerator is hidden under the bed, built in drawers open to reveal a small safety deposit box, or space for clothes, etc. TV on the wall opposite the bed. Everything was kept very clean. The room key card activated the electricity for the rooms lights and air conditioning. Staff were very friendly when I asked any questions. BUT there was lack of any communication or brochures listing any of the available amenities. EG: I was never told there were self serve laundry facilities on the premises. Nor that there is a nice outdoor balcony / lounge area (5th or 6th floor if I remember) overlooking the park across the street. Reception does have water available, maps of the local area.

reviews.review_title: Good Place to Stay in Clarke Quay”
reviews.review_comment: Location is very good, just 3 minites walk to the nearest mrt station. Hotel is easy to find and reception is just on the entrance. Staff is kind and hospitable. Lobby is beautiful with coffee and tea machine for free. Elevator is big and not crowded when we went to SG. Room is big for 2, clean and bed is big and comfortable. Bathroom has complete basic toiletries. There's a kettle and coffee/tea in the room plus water. Will definitely consider staying here again in the future👍
there's nearby 7/11, fairprice, restaurants, starbucks & anytime fitness
queen size bed too small
Area is located near mall, eateries and transit. Desk is very accommodating.
Great location & price. My room was in far corder and dead quiet. Have had a great sleep

Though the room was small, you will be able to survive one way or another unless you have too much luggage. Easy around 10 minutes' walk to the Merlion Park and close to MRT Clarke Quay station, so without heavy luggage, you can easily cover most of the tourist attractions in the city. It is hard to find a hotel in central location at this reasonable pricing, so this clean hotel is especially recommended for a budget traveler like me.

reviews.review_title: Nice room, ok clean and close to where i wanna be”
reviews.review_comment: It was a good room, compact living, but no problem for me for a couple of nights, nice terasse! Good price and close to bars and Chinatown.

The space is really small, but very comfortable. It just takes a few minutes to MRT or Bus stop. What I like best is that after a whole day or a long trip out, I feel relaxed when I am close to the hotel, the smell is so sweet 👌. I will certainly return for the next time.
Excellent location. Walking distance to many attractions and transit. Clean and quiet rooms. Friendly staff.

hotels.name: YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 366 Orchard Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 238904

reviews.review_comment: Booked for 3D2N with balcony, the experience is amazing, room design is great and location is very centralised. Good choice for a short staycay
not bad
Took the balcony room with queen bed. Great view, room is well spaced out.
Good location, clean & comfortable. I love the adorable robot

I was at Yotel Singapore only for two nights. Room was very efficient made, just right as your outside most of the time anyway. I saw I nice mixture in the age of the guests. Guys like me, families and young people. Especially for the young people it is convenient that the hotel is real 2022 ! For me, 64 yrs, when I had some questions all the staff was great with their assistance. Also the IT man (senior) that helped me out with my mobile charge problems. All in all compliments ! Well done all.
Used the room for a birthday celebration & to use the pool! Quite cosy. Just nice for 4 pax. We didn’t stayover though. Convenient location!
Design is smart, bed is smart. There's robot for stuff delivering

reviews.review_title: Dated hotel in a good location ”
reviews.review_comment: The beds were too soft and the air conditioning could be colder. The lights and air conditioning would switch off because of the motion sensor, so it becomes a problem when you are sitting at the toilet bowl a little longer then usual.
It was a great weekend getaway. I just love the view from the room.
Location is very good.. But the BED is realyyyyy bad...veryyyyy uncomfortable...i cannot sleep because the bed..i think they use cheap BED...i will never ever stay in this hotel again

reviews.review_title: Best Value Central Orchard Road Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Yotel is centrally located and reasonably priced for Orchard Road - convenient for everything
very small room, stressful stay
room is for solo or couple only
Room is small. If you’re looking for a solo staycation to rest your mind and charge yourself, this hotel will great for you!
very clean 👍
Nice! Good job.
convience to orchard shopping areas, easy access to MRT. polite and helpful crews.

Yotel is the benchmark for hotels. Ever since my first stay on 31 Dec last year, I’ve never considered any other hotels. It’s been my to-go place for my past two staycations. I’ve already booked my third one and can’t wait to return! Yotel is clean, tidy and has fabulous staff. The hotel feels just like my second home. It feels welcoming and comfortable to stay there. Give Yotel a try! (Or many :P)

Pros: Nicely furnished room with adjustable bed. Body wash, shampoo, conditioner, moisturizer and toothpaste/toothbrush provided. Vanity kit is available upon request. There is also Iron in the room which comes in handy for business traveler. Nice view out the window. International tv channels. AI robot helps to deliver extra bottled waters or towel which is interesting to see. Cons: Room is small. Bathroom floods each time you take a shower. Has self-check in kiosk but not very dummy proof (staff is prompt to jump in and help though).
Clean room, with fantastic location at the heart of Orchard Road. Only thing about the room is that it is very small, door opens right to the bed.
Good location to orchard shopping centres, easy to access subway. helpful crews.
Room is really tiny but hotel is conveniently located near all the huge malls. Within walking distance
Is too small
Neat
Good size compact space of a room. Splendid view from room/balcony. Location is very very good, walking distance to shaw movie theatre, shopping malls and food places.
Sinking in your bed.
Nil
Great location... Clean rooms... Downside.. Rooms service only once in 4 days

The location is good, close to everywhere. However the bed is too soft for comfort, it will sink when we sleep on it, and the room is too damp. I hang a jeans, it felt cold and damp when I wore it the next day.

I would highly recommend this hotel for short staycations. My overall stay was near perfection except for the fact that the housekeeping staff was making so much noise in the early morning around 7-8AM, when most guests are still sleeping. Despite calling the front desk and letting them know about this issue, the noises still persisted the next morning. I am very disappointed with this experience. I'm not talking about any noise, it's those noises where staff were laughing and shouting at the top of their lungs. I hope you can tell your staff to be more considerate for the guests in the future. All in all, I would still come back to stay at this hotel.

reviews.review_title: A Gem in the Heart of Town”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed here twice and the standard has been great and consistent. The staff are nice and friendly and above all professional in helping you no matter how busy they are. The room is small but its comfortable and clean. Price is afforadable for a place located at the buzz of town. Love the view from the room. Will not hesitate to come back again.
Room was small but cozy. Second time staying at Yotel and service and cleanliness was great. Plenty of food around the area as well

reviews.review_title: Great location for Orchard Road shoppers”
reviews.review_comment: A very smart and stylish hotel. I had a great view from the ceiling to floor windows in my room. Loved the cute robots who did room service.

reviews.review_title: Value for money but bed wasn’t the best ”
reviews.review_comment: Good deal for a hotel in the heart of Orchard. Small room but cozy enough. Bed was weird, not sure if it’s the mechanics of the smart bed but partner and I felt like we were sinking in, and if too close to the edge it feels like the bed is pushing you off. May stay again for the convenient location, but not ideal if you’re looking for a good night’s rest.
Great Hotel...
Room is quite small but the incline bed makes a different. Staff was nice and efficient. Location was perfect.
Not too bad! Clean.

Pros: clean. Has all basic amenities. Fantastic location Con: Stayed in the premium room. Had the worst sleep among all the hotels ive stayed in my entire life. The bed was sinking.. also since the bed was able to go up and down, i can feel the bend on the bed ard the area that was able to lift up. I thot only one side was sinking... the whole bed was sinking when i sat around to find a comfortable position. Its was a horrible night sleep. The pillow was alrite. My biggest issue is the bed. A hotel is for u to rest. If u are not fussy about a sinking bed and is ok waking up with a backache, by all means this hotel is for u, otherwise, look elsewhere.
Nope

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Yotel. The view was great from the 27th floor, and although the room is not as big as what you’d get from other hotels, Yotel made sure that it was a good use of space, and every part of the room was well thought out. The facilities/amenities provided were good (including the free welcome Cocktail), and the only gripe I had was the fact that the bath and the room itself is only separated by a glass panel, and water did leak out to the room itself, it’d have been nice if there was a small slope or step from the shower to the room so that it doesn’t happen though. But otherwise, a fantastic place to stay in, and Orchard Road is just a stone’s throw away. Great location. Will definitely come again!
not recommended
Thank you for wishing me happy birthday!thanks for the macarons and birthday cards! Mel,jac and the other guy!
good location and modern hotel
Needs some twin bed for some cases

reviews.review_title: Great locations with modern hotel concept ”
reviews.review_comment: Great locations has making differentiation to this hotel, and support with modern concept especially great bathroom designs able to feel the sun and connected to Orchard. The skin urban lotions, shampoo and etc fm Australia is so nice and upgrade the standard of this hotel. Will definitely staying in this hotel for future visits in Singapore orchard.
Situated in the heart of Orchad Road - strategic location, value for money, love the view (if you're on high floor).
Our stay was comfortable…although its small its really very clean the toilet has bidet the view is fantastic! the location is superb will come back again!
Room is not spacious but has all the necessary facilities and location is great to go to ION orchard wheellock place ets
Best location and affordable prices
I love that the room was really clean and well maintained. It feels really cosy too. No regret booking the room with balcony as the view was beautiful in the evening!

Like the cleanliness and location. Swimming pool is quite small, surprise they don't provide bath robe in room. The space for queen room is only able to fit 2 pax at max. Overall recommended for short staycation.
Hotel room is very clean and compact. Value for money and hotel staff is very friendly.
room though small, has space saving features. i like the feature that allows bed to be propped up. only grasp was the tv that was so bad at connecting to my samsung phone.
Nice cosy room for 1. Has smart tv which is a plus point. Most importantly, it is located in the heart of orchard.
Love the ambience. Staff are warm and friendly. Love the service with a smile. Walking distance to mrt and shopping malls
Small room but very clean and very convenient location. Staff are very friendly n helpful I wish I knew that I had to book for the swimming pool
Most convenient staycation venue in Singapore. Quality staff and efficient check-in process.

reviews.review_title: Great central location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: Cleanliness and location wise is excellent. Not recommended during if going for swimming. No slots after check in, but no one was at the pool. Dissapointed abt this issue. Hopefully reservation for pool can be improve.

reviews.review_title: Nice albeit small room and great location”
reviews.review_comment: Very good service from housekeeping but unprofessional front desk officer (a woman with long hair). She was too harried and harsh towards guests.
Stayed for a night and enjoyed it very much. Room is small but clean and neat. Though the bed is just besides the door, i hardly hear any noise outside. Good location with many amenities nearby
good and nice for a escape
Room was clean when we checked in. It’s located at a good area and provided a lot of useful necessities
While the location is strategic, the bed is quite small for 2 ppl. We have stayed for 3D2N, but the staff never clean the room at all. Not even changing the dustbin. Disappointed.
Best thing is the location. But the room is smsll.
Very good location with awesome staff who are courteous and efficient, room was lovely with clean facilities and comfy bed!

This is my 1st time book with Yotel. My room lock have issue and after informed staff, they fast response to help chg new room for us even ald at the midnight. And give us a free drink to redeem on lvl10. This is professional. The pool is clean ,after swim won't feel uncomfortable. Will come back again.
The smart tv could not connect using ios.
The room is very cozy and nice 😍 2 people is just nice 👌🏻 The location is very convenient as well!

went for 2 days staycay. loved the room , small but compact and very modern! the pillows were really comfy and great to sleep in. Staff were all helpful since the beginning cause I made a wrong double booking and they help me out sort the problem out. Highly recommended and will be back to staycay again!
Friendly and Caring staff and surprising wishes for me with bday card & delicious macaroons. Like 👍🏼
Small room vs great location.
Super comfy bed and pillows. Great location as well.
The bed and pillow are super comfortable. Once u lie down, u wont feel like waking up again
The room and the view is AMAZING!!

Had a great stay! Booked the room with the balcony. The hotel accommodated our request for a high floor and gave us a room on the highest floor. The view was amazing! The service at the restaurant is excellent. Kudos to Matthew who went the extra mile for us. Not to mention the food as well -it was tasty and certainly value for money!
Bed can incline like hospital bed, pillows are good, many places to hang your stuff. Had a good view from the toilet

The staffs are attentive and gave a small gift token n birthday card on my birthday (though I didnt make any special request). the room is clean and had a great view overlook the city. Will definite go back again
Room is clean. Only the bed could have been better. Follows the weight so not really firm and stable.
delayed flight, does not wish to modify the stay, even with a supplement

Stayed there for 4 night. Superb location as its close to all amenities. Best place to walk around all the Malls in Orchard. I arrived earlier, the staff was very accomodating by allowing me to do early check-in. The in house cafe have good varieties of food & beverage selection. Only sad back, the bed is very small & not so comfortable. Was having back pain. Apart from that it was a perfect stay
staff was friendly and gave my boyfriend free snacks as it was his birthday. The room was clean. I especially loved the bed.
Your nice is so nice but your room is too small

Yotel's rooms are extremely small. It is really not worth the money. Queen bed doesn't feel like queen sized. Very small, even for 2 normal sized adults. Check in time is late at 3pm, check out time is early at 11am. Do not come here. There are other cheaper hotel deals you can get on carou-sell even. Do not come here. Rooms are not worth it.
Best hotel for a short getaway
Good for solo staycation! Not able to use miracast for my netflix shows but if you bring your own hdmi cable, that’ll be good! Bluetooth connection works for spotify. Overall it was a pleasant stay!
Bedding is sad
Very convenient near orchard.Hotel is nice,received the corner top room with a cityview.Love the bed super comfortable.
The room is rather small but the layout is cleverly designed to optimise the use of the limited space. One suggestion - a shower curtain will help to prevent the whole toilet being wet
There are 6 lifts in the hotel, but the waiting time for lift is still very long!
This is my 2nd visit to Yotel, first king room with Balcony is definitely worth the money, the room is super clean and the views are great!
You’ve got to be here & feel the cozy & nice view of either SG sun rise or Sun rise….
Thr bed was really comfortable and the hotel took note that we were there for our anniversary, and gave us a surprise gift. Really thankful of that. Will visit again.

Its a nice hotel even tho its a bit small but the soap and shampoo smells so nice on top of that theres lotion as well. The bed is the best part which is adjustable and super comfy!! And dont even get me started with the channels there was so many channels on the tv like astro and korean channels. Overall was a super pleasant stay i would definitely come again
Will repeat again !
Good value for money.... The city view at night was nice. The bed is very comfortable....If they have smart tv mean great.

It's a cute futuristic hotel that had a view in the toilet. Stayed there for 4 days 2 nights. The pool is quite nice. The restaurant also has good food. The room looks like in a futuristic set up. They call it a cabin. It's kinda tight for a queen sized bed. For travelers who have a back problem like me... The bed is quite soft for support. I guess it's built that way so that it can be bent. There is also no proper table which made it hard for me to do some desk top work. I used the foldable thing built below the tv which also works but not for longer hours. So if u plan to stay there and so some work, it's not a good place. I love the view from the toilet tho! Dint have the chance to experience Yoshi and Yolanda but I guess you guys should check it out! They're cute robots! 😍
Good choice if you want to feel like you're in the future! :)
This will be my Go To Hotel from now on! I love the service and I’m grateful that the staff accommodated my early check in request! Thank you Yotel Orchard! I will definitely come back!
Can be better
A nice place and comfortable environment

hotels.name: Mayo Inn (Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 9 Jalan Besar, Little India, Singapore, Singapore, 208786

reviews.review_comment: Check-in was fairly quick, and the room was quite comfortable and clean too, not too small. Room was equipped with all basic items. However, no hairdryer was provided, so we might need to bring our own next time. Hotel is within walking distance to multiple MRT stations, making it incredibly convenient to visit anywhere. Definitely recommended, will stay here again on my next visit!
Just see this as a 1 or 2 star hotel...
Value for money as room is spacious and had cable TV, even YouTube but too noisy. Sounds from the main road and doors slaming
Staff is not corporate and very cheating hotel
Simple and nice. Roadside parking can be hard to find on a crowded weekedn

With Netflix and YouTube on TV we whole day stay inside room and lazy to go out. But the aircon temperature should be improvised because it is quite warm although we on it at 16 degree celcius and waited for almost 1 hour to cool it down.
Near MRT. Value for money.

reviews.review_title: The staff are very polite and helpful. The Chinese elderly lady who is the same person who serves breakfast is very rude even when cleaning the room she doesn't do a good job. Because of her I rather ”
reviews.review_comment: It's only good location. Staff are good n friendly. Lift is very not auto,u have to keep pressing the level button till the lift door open. stayed there first in a room for 3 for 2 weeks, 1 week upgraded to a room for 4 but toilet was the same... I won't recommend for long stay or for family.
my first & last stay here.. thanks
Curtain had brown stains and walls were “rotting”

Very old hotel with basic facilities. No bottle warer given. Given shower gel and shampoo. Old style blanket and quilt type. Room and toilet shower quite spacious. Aircond and tv is good. Sound proof not good, can hear people talking outside, cannot really sleep well at night.
Room is clean ,service is great.

reviews.review_title: GREAT HOTEL BUT THE LIFT CMI...”
reviews.review_comment: I love the room and the balcony and the location! The only downside is the lift HAHAHHA they only have 1 handicap lift and I’m sorry but a person who is handicapped don’t even need a lift that hehe I’m sorry but I love tmr room tho still thank you !
Not bad if only for short stay
The room is acceptable. But the room itself didnt provide any water bottle so u have to buy or bring it with you
Nice location
No proper guidance to the room... No more information bout the facilities.. No value for stay in
So everything was nice. But to be honest, the lift where we press the button till we reach the floor. That was really uncomfortable. But the lift design is vintage which was really nice.

My stay there with my kid we’re great! Loved the spacious bath room. Friendly and good service provided by a Chinese girl and a Philippines guy at the front desk. Please note: the balcony was dirty and need to clean up. No house phone, request for 3 towels but was not in room upon arrival.

I think I was given a disabled person room. A lot of facility for disabled person like handles in shower room. I feedback about poor sink design where mirror protrude out and cover half of sink space. This is first time I saw sink with this design. It is very hard to brush my teeth and wash face because of the design. I basically need to bend myself to certain angle before I can reach the water tap. I can post the photo if the system allowed. I requested to change room but refused. I basically stay with this condition for 7 nights! Also, the shower's hot water run out after a short while and becoming cold water. If you just want good location but don't mind stay in discomforts, it is still a good deal for it's location. But this is the last time for me! Definitely stay away given choice.
Near to bugis and great location
Staff and service is best! Good experience staying in this hotel Room also good Location also good
nice, clean and well maintained
Good for short stay for the location
Glad i choose Mayo Inn,near bugis,near tekka market and cheers just across.. Cool design on the lift
Room is ok...I dun min the balcony. The room is on 4th floor and near the main road,can be a little noisy.Huge bathroom. The only problem is the TV channels...Luckily I could just settle for MeWatch.
near to mrt and lots of eateries at walking distance

Staff were friendly and very helpful. Hotel is relatively close to city as well, with many buses and a train station nearby. There are also food establishments all around the hotel. Cleanliness can be improved. Walls and carpet were visibly stained. Room also reeked of smoke smell although it is a non-smoking room.

There's a tv but we can't watch coz not connected or something. The elevator is interesting. You have to hold on pressing the button until you reach you desired floor. Cleanliness wise was good. Staff is friendly.

reviews.review_title: One of the worst hotel ever ”
reviews.review_comment: When i first came in the staff was good but when i reach to the room there was no plug for easy access to charge my phone when we try to on the aircon it takes very long to cool up the room only to realise there was no telephone to call the front desk worst the lift was the slowest and we had to hold the button in order to move the lift so i say this hotel deserve a NO NO and i will never come back
5 mins walking distance to Jalan Besar MRT. Walking distance to bugis

The Philippine guy receptionist was super rude. No smile during check in like I’m owing his money and knock my dock super hard at 11.30am asking me to check out (seriously?). Of course you do know that I’m going to check out that day based on my booking date. Does this action necessary? If I don’t check out up until 12.30pm maybe you can do it or even 1pm. But 11.30 serious? Your hotel’s check out time is 12pm. I still have another 30 minutes oh god! By the way, I check out 12pm sharp idiot! Not even a thank you from you. What a bad hospitality you have. Shame on your hiring.

reviews.review_title: Lack of hospitality and essential services”
reviews.review_comment: First of all, the room 306 does not have any telephone. The television and the wifi is not working properly. I have to walk down to the reception at level 1 to request my services to be restored but was told that the technician is not around and someone would attend to me shortly. About half an hour, a guy came up and attempted to restore the channel but was unsuccessful and was told to wait further. I request to change the room but was told that the hotel is full and the room I booked is cheap because it is booked online. Later, another guy came and I was able to connect to the internet and the tv. After dinner, I can into the room and turned on the tv , only to find out that it has restored to its ‘room setting’ and the wifi is not working. At this juncture, I am too tired to go down to the reception to complain. Hope the next customer avoid getting the 306 room. What an unpleasant experience for me.

I was very disappointed after I arrived at the hotel, as my room was very different to what I was expecting after reading the generally positive reviews of Mayo Inn. My room smelt strongly of cigarette smoke, was not very clean and rather worn (cigarette burns on the furniture and carpet, dirty curtains, dusty...) with small ants on the floor and furniture, insects in the jug and several hairs in the bed! I asked to change rooms and was able to choose from shown two other rooms on the same floor, both with ants around and insects in the jug, but slightly less dusty and worn, with cleaner beds and no smokey smell. There were no water bottles provided as mentioned in other reviews, nor was there an option of breakfast. The terrace mentioned in several reviews was not accessible during my stay. The price was low, the staff were fine and the location was great, but I would not come back here again.
+free basic breakfast on rooftop (included in stay) +silent airco, and good shower -payment went wrong first time, but adequately solved

This hotel is well located, equidistant between two MRT stations, each less than a five minute walk. The room and bathroom are good sized and clean and the hot water and AC are fine. There is a small lift and a basic breakfast served on the rooftop. The staff are exceedingly friendly, polite and helpful . The Internet is the only failing point, it repeatedly drops me and I need to log in again; very annoying. The bed is a mattress on a raised platform which caused me no problems but could be problematic for an elderly person or someone with a bad back. ,

Pros- the room is clean, the room has tv, ref, cabinet and kettle, free breakfast (bread, egg, cereals, coffee and hot choco) very near to Jalan Besar and Rochor MRT, has convenience store in front, many food stalls beside the hotel, Bugis can be reach by 10-15mins walk, staff are very accommodating and approachable Cons- small bathroom, very thin blanket and very slow lift
good location to 2 MRT station, easy to get food (theres some 24h resto nearby)
Located at Rochor, easy access to nearby attractions. Kg glam, lt india is just within walking distance. Nearest mrt/bus stop is Rochor. Spacios bathroom, clean and great hospitality. Worth d money.

Stayed with my family (2 adults and 2 kids)for 3 nights. The room is clean and neat, complete with toiletries and bath towels. They properly clean the room daily. The place is quiet and not crowded. The location is good also, right next to the hotel is a convenience store where you can get drinking water, there are also lots of food establishments around it, and mrt and bus stations is also walking distance. If ever we go back to SG again, i prefer to stay here over and over.
feel itchy of the bed

reviews.review_title: Service and location are good. Hygiene and noise are the problems”
reviews.review_comment: Staff responded to requests quickly. They were nice. The location is surrounded by different restaurants and food courts. only 3 minutes walk to the MRT. Booked 2 rooms. Cockroach was found on the pillow of one room. The other room smelled moldy and many ants were on the mirror table. Showed the cockroach to the reception. Staff promised to clean the room thoroughly. The noise barrier was horrible. Could easily hear the mom talked to her kids in the next room. Noise from vehicles outside kept my family awake whole night. Lived there for 2 days. 2 of us felt sick immediately after home. Actually I doubt the high rating of this hotel in agoda.
Nice staffs , good location (bus MRT)Old but clean

We stayed in 1 family room and 1 standard room. The staff is kind enough for the free additional mineral water. near to bus stop and near to rocher MRT station. if you are going to have a good meal at zamzam restaurant, you can either walk or talk a bos (1 stop) to zam restaurant. the room is quite spacious (family room) with a very nice and clean toilet. spacious toilet too. will stay there again.
I had written asking if they had windows and if they open....... someone wrote back yes...... which was not true... other than that....... i was very happy with the room and facilities.........

This hotel is situated near 2 mrt stations which are just a walk away. Food is abundant all around. Several convinience stores in the vicinity. Staff are very nice and accomodating. Place is nice, although a bit old. Some bed sheets and carpets need upgrading. Nice Warm shower is always available. Complimentary breakfast is appreciated. Definitely staying again.

Adequate space for 4 of us in the family deluxe. Good , convenient location. The receptionist is present 24/7, and very helpful/friendly. No bin provided in the room though, that's the only improvement to suggest
Location good, Room is clean, only the bad thing is lift is old style ;have to wait long time and press the button until reach the floor level~

reviews.review_title: Better book other options if with young children”
reviews.review_comment: Check in slow, breakfast limited but okay however staff a bit rude saying "I wont serve you if you dont give me your vouchers". Of course I hv vouchers. Why dont she just say "pls gv me yr vouchers" like any other hotel. And she dont know difference between margarine and butter. Same line MRT stations nearby but taxi difficult to get because no stop on busy main road. Worst aspect is traffic noise if one is unlucky to get road-side room.

reviews.review_title: Great Location, very close to mrt”
reviews.review_comment: All alright except Street traffic noise. ROCHOR MRT Station is just around the corner. Close to Little India.

The hotel is located near 2 downtown line MRT stations, so it's quite convenient to get around the city. The room was quite small but cosy, and the toilet is quite big. The bathroom has a good shower with plentiful hot water. Shower gel and shampoo are provided. There is also a fridge in the room as well as a kettle and tea and coffee. Two bottles of water are provided each day. The air conditioning is efficient. The bonus for us was the complimentary breakfast on the rooftop. The lift is really slow but because it only has 4 floors so it won't be a big problem. Friendly and helpful staff.

Below are the things I like the most. 1. Location and accessibility. Near Jalan Besar station. 2. Spacious room 3. Quiet even though the place is along the road. 4. Had a free breakfast tho we did not avail it. Saved us 💵 5. Overall 5/5
Its not value for money. Room size is very small.
Room is quite big with television.

reviews.review_title: Ideal budget-friendly room in good location”
reviews.review_comment: The room has all you need for a short stay in Singapore. It is clean and the staff are always on hand to help. Would highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Very small room with limited facilities”
reviews.review_comment: No phone in the room. Hot water was not available a few oocasions. No one to advise about the surrounding attractions. Floor and the walls were not clean.

One elevator for handicapped only that can be operated by pressing the button for the desired floor CONTINUOUSLY which was something that I never expected from a 3 star hotel. Super slow elevator. Hotel staff does not help with luggage or anything even when senior citizens are involved in the group. Also you cannot see outside.. no clear glass windows.
It’s spacious for the affordable price.

Friendly counter service. Hotel is decent. Very near to Rochor Mrt Station. Hawker food aplenty within walking vicinity. Safe location. Highly recommended to take this as the base camp to wander around Singapore Island.

Tidy place, near mrt station (only 100 meters), clean and quite big room, they have a nice staff, and even they allowed me to check in early. You have to try this hotel guys, i recommend this hotel if you search a budget hotel.

I booked a family room which has 1 large bed and 1 single bed. But when the staff saw us, they upgrade the room to a family deluxe one, which has 1 large bed and 2 single beds!! Eventhough there's a language barrier, the staffs really kind and helpful. The most important part is, the location! It's really strategic! It's near 2 mrt stations; Jalan Besar and Rochor. It's easy to find halal food, and cheap food nearby. About 400m to Bugis Street, and about 600m to Mustafa Center. I definitely recommend it to everyone, and will choose Mayo Inn for my next trip. The only thing that need to be upgraded are the lift. But it's okay as it is.

The location near to Jalan Besar MRT Station (Downtown Line), various Indian restaurants, Mustafa, Bugis, etc. Room is spacious with rooftop access, though the entire place looks quite old as it's a heritage building.

Good location, close to mrt, comfortable bed, the staff really do great job! She even greet me belated birthday and able to get my request. Really like the hotel its just that the lift need upgrade. But yeah would rate 8 out of 10! Cheers

Quite expensive for a night of stay but since there's a Singapore F1 event during our stay, it's acceptable. Also, everything in Singapore is expensive compared to other Asian countries so it's expected. Cleanliness and room amenities are great. Location is very strategic, near MRT and bus stations, stores and malls. Also, the complimentary breakfast (not included in room rate) was great and they gave us free bottled water for 2 days. Lastly, they allowed us for an early check-in since it's so hot outside. The downside is very slow internet connection. Despite the high room rate & slow internet connection, it's still highly recommended. Good Job Mayo Inn! 👍👍👍
No parking facilities
nice hotel, good location.

Location is convenient walking distance to 2 MRT stations Bugis and Jalan Besar. Cleanliness could be improved! Not clean under the beds and found 2 live cockroaches. Good priced hotel for Singapore and simple breakfast an added bonus.
over all ok

Pro- near to mrt station,1 minute walk. There are many indian muslim restaurant nearby hotel, n walking distance to kg gelam for more halal food. Clean room Contra- free bfast but starts at 8. Who going to start their day that late...went up at 7.30 to see if possible to hv it earlier, the terrace door where the bfast served even locked. Cant even get to see the view from roof terrace. TV using iptv, many time get hang maybe due to uncapable internet line...how u feel the show stops halfway while u r watching- got to restart again n again....haiyoo. Til one time, it was gone n cant even restart again, so suddenly cant use tv. The hotel need to connect the tv to normal tv too in case iptv cant function.

reviews.review_title: Good hotel and great access to all locations . mRT is nearby”
reviews.review_comment: Pros: good and nice rooms. Easy access to MRT Cons: little noisy due to traffic in the nearby roads

Near two MRT Station (Jalan Besar & Rochor), near bus stop, near foodcourt. It provides refrigerator, TV, water heater & water kettle. The minus point only on the WIFI. Fyi, we stayed in the 4th floor. But you can buy local SIM card that provides 100 GB data for SGD 10. Definitely will stay here again on our next trip to Singapore
Hotel is situated near to MRT station with reasonable price and private bathroom. Reception was not friendly during arrival. Other than that everything is fine.
really recommend to, good location, just a few minutes to BRT station, room has quiet big space and very clean, it's money saver.

reviews.review_title: Suitable for family and location was very good”
reviews.review_comment: Few mins walk to MRT stations, near to Bugis St, suitable for family, everything was perfect.
Good
Near MRT , very good and nice

Hotel is strategically located near MRT and bus stop, near hawker shops and is 15 minutes away from Bugis Street. Our room was upgraded to Deluxe and is provided with simple complimentary breakfast. All staff were very accommodating and friendly!
Excellent location ....clean rooms. Near to all the 3 stations little India, rochor and Jalan besar. Best place for the price.... couldn't ask for more.

reviews.review_title: Great location for a cute hotel”
reviews.review_comment: 5mn walk from Jalan Basar Mrt station ( downtown line). Bugis shopping area and Little India visiting places at walking distances. Many restaurants and cafes in the area, open till late at night. Hotel is quite, clean, nice ac, hot water and smart tv. We were very happy with our choice

reviews.review_title: Charged Twice for a Single Night Stay”
reviews.review_comment: The morning after my single nights stay the front desk staff confirmed I was double booked but I was NOT being charged twice for night. I showed them Agoda emails that confirmed I was being charged twice and was again told that I wouldn't be. After multiple times contacting Agoda, they confirmed I had been charged twice. Finally, after several hours of emails to Agoda, I was told I would get a refund in 2-4 weeks. In addition to the above issue, the front desk told me there was a phone in my room but the there was no phone. I also requested help getting my TV to work and received zero assistance. Besides all that, nice enough place to stay.

We booked a room that was over 30 m2 according to Agoda. It turned out to be a very small room without any window. The hotel blamed Agoda, I will write to them about this. The room was dirty. There was dust on top of all the surfaces. The spoons were used and not cleaned. There was a pair of slippers and an empty bottle under the bed. The carpet had multiple sigaret burns. The free breakfast was ok, but staff seemed to prefer being anywhere but there. Front office staff were friendly. The only positive thing to say about this hotel is the proximity to the MRT with easu airport transfer.
I had requested for early check in which was also approved by Hotel over the email; however when I reached the Hotel, I was informed that the Room is not available and need to wait till 2pm.
Small and basic room, but that’s expected in Singapore. Good to stay if your planning to be out and about during the day. Great location, 3 min walk to two MRT stations. Friendly and helpful staff.

reviews.review_title: Everything good here except the internet”
reviews.review_comment: I found everything good in the hotel except the internet. They have a captive portal which pops up once in every hour to agree to the terms of the internet and breaks connectivity. Thus one cannot work for more than an hour without that irritating popup. Rest it's a good hotel overall.
The location is very strategic

Very good hotel at very nice location and very clean. Rooms are good and spacious. Few points to note - 1. Lift is very slow. It was more of a platform lift instead of passenger lift 2. Breakfast just have toast and eggs and milo nothing else. Lot of room for improvement
Reception open all night which is helpful; room clean; nice firm bed; good AC ; central location.

Well-kept rooms though some small cleaning slip-ups; Quiet room if facing the side-street; Did not remember request for extra pillows needed for medical reasons; Helpful front-desk staff Ray and Sara but not others; Adequate breakfast with same choice everyday; Powerful air-con but can’t be redirected away from bed; Safe area yet with lots of restaurants and convenience stores nearby; Mini-fridge; Free bottles of water; Coffee-making in room; No closet or shelves; Close to two metro stations on two different lines; Multiple international tv channels but every re-entry of room requires reboot; Ample hot water in bathroom; Towels and bed-linen changed daily even though not necessary; Large windows with frosted stain-glass; Black-out curtains for keeping out street light helps sleep after time-zone change. Hydraulic lift/elevator awkward to use but only necessary when moving heavy bags on check-in/out; Weak wifi which cuts out frequently. Good value for Singapore
The hotel is clean and close to the MRT (Rochor) and near to many eateries.

The location was superb only thing is the room was dusty and old and the aircondition was dirty causing me and my partner to fell ill...The lift was old school. The bed was really hard giving me and my partner a sore back.

The hostel is located near 2 downtown line MRT stations, so it's quite convenient to get around the city. The room was quite small but cosy, and the toilet is quite big. The lift is really slow but because it only has 4 floors so it won't be a big problem.

The only good thing about this place is the location. Very near to eateries and MRT Stations, convenient to go anywhere. Otherwise room was small and not very clean. Staff not very friendly and only plain toast bread for breakfast. Wifi signal very bad, will never stay here again.

This hotel is in an excellent location just a few minutes walk from two different MRT stations. It makes getting to the airport on the mrt very easy and cheap. There are plenty of places to eat nearby as well as shops to buy drinks and snacks. It is a quick walk to Bugis street, Arab street and little India. The room I a reasonable size with good storage. The bed is clean and comfortable. The bathroom has a good shower with plentiful hot water. Shower gel and shampoo are provided. There is also a fridge in the room as well as a kettle and tea and coffee. Two bottles of water are provided each day. The air conditioning is efficient. The bonus for us was the complimentary breakfast on the rooftop. There were three options and we loved the steamed buns and egg option washed down with tea and coffee. The staff were all friendly and helpful. We will be back. Thankyou for a great stay.
This hotel is super clean. Great staff Amazing simple breakfast on the roof top..
Location is near by 2 MRT stations. However the room is not keep sound even we are on the 3rd floor but we still hear sound from the road

We really enjoyed our stay here. Its located in a colorful area. Raymond was a great help. Breakfast is basic, however the WIFI was good and the smart TV was welcome. Room was fine. Would stay again as its good value located so close to the MRT and little India

reviews.review_title: Clean, best location, price so so”
reviews.review_comment: Family room is wide enough for 3 adult, location is near 2 MRT n bus stations, staff helpfull, get breakfast, price average.

reviews.review_title: Not so bad or not so good. ”
reviews.review_comment: Is a nice place to stay with limited needs

Quite spacious. The room has a TV too if I wanna watch YouTube or Netflix. Breakfast is alright too, boiled eggs or cereal. If you need a water hose for when you use the toilet, they have it. Also, Rochor MRT Station is only 2 minutes away. I have stayed at a few different places each time I visit Singapore but I'll definitely come back to Mayo Inn again!
Room half the size of the that published on Agoda website. Unhelpful about change and wanted extra payment. Apathetic "jobsworth" staff. Wi-fi pathetic.

hotels.name: Hotel G Singapore (SG Clean Certified & Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 200 Middle Road, Bugis, Singapore, Singapore, 188980

reviews.review_comment: Lot of eateries around, and walking distance to shopping mall
The room is too small
loved the hotel vibe and very central location! room is comfy only downside is no fridge. Restaurants were great too. will be back again!
Explore the heart of Singapore without paying exorbitant prices. G hotel is a sure cozy and convenient place.
Staffs are friendly and they provide prompt room service. The room is a little small but big enough for 1 person.

Really excellent amenities in a very small room, although not unexpectedly so. Still very well designed to make the most of the small space, and loved the toiletries too. The location is excellent for all kinds of good and affordable food. Oh, and 25 degrees' burgers are amazing!
Cozy

Simply love e location of e hotel..walking distance to bugis junction.. Love e room..although its small bt i find it very cozy Staff are friendly.. Need not worry abt food..food are every where around e location
The cleanliness of toilet need to improve, especially the floor as there quite slip
The room is cozy and perfect for solo travellers.Location is convenient and food surrounding.Staff is friendly and helpful.

Booked the queen package with free upgrade and burger in bed. However, we were given the smaller room instead of the upgraded one. When I contacted customer service, they offered a free upgrade and free parking (the original package that I bought) when I book with them AGAIN. Overall, quite a lousy experience.

reviews.review_title: Great location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: The location is convenient with MRT stations and bus stations nearby and the room is comfortable and clean.

reviews.review_title: Great location and many eatery just around. ”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel is just a very basic
near town and cafes
Nice hotel for staycation 👍👍👍

Horrible stay at hotel G. Carpark doesn’t even have enough lots. To add insult to injury, they only provide 1 carpark coupon even though I stayed for 2 nights which is ridiculous. Room is tiny, not very clean. Please avoid staying here, money is better spent elsewhere.
Good stay but very very small room...

reviews.review_title: Great location and nice boutique hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Hassle free check in and out. Hotel staff is friendly and helpful. Room size is adequate for single or couple. Spacious room and big comfortable bed. Very convenient place with 2 restaurant in the hotel and lots of eatery nearby.

For short stay - no wardrobe, luggage stool or mini fridge. For solo or couple - frosted glass between bath and room. For WFH - good standard table and chair (not office). However, only the bed is facing the small TV (no mirroring or cast). View of next building. Pillows and quilt smell although linen is clean. Staff has great customer service. Location is ideal for exploring and shopping.
Location of the hotel is good, but it is very noisy inside the room. Rooms are close together, bad sound proofing.
2d1night stay. Clean room. Love Ginett food and wine.

Hotel is great, have returned for multiple times. Bathroom is spacious and clean, with tons of bathroom accessories available for use. Room decor is also beautiful and pictures shown are accurate and true to size of room. However the prices can be revisited as it has been increasing steadily over the past few months. Definitely recommend if price is not an issue.
Very nice & convenience hotel 👍🏻👏🏻
The room is very small
Great if you looking for a cozy and peace environment, design of the room was fabulous. With a reasonable price too

stayed 3 nights ..when sunrise , they are cracking noises from outside the room . No idea what is that nosies sounds like metal expansion noises …1st night of stay , I felt itches over my body , bed perhaps not clean. Requested to change flwg to solve the problem .

Room were rather small. Kinda dusty around the curtain areas indeed housekeeping should make an effort to do some cleaning. Water around basin area tend to leak on the floor maybe due to the small area n low running tap. Room is very comfortable, and situated in a very convenient location. Multiple mrt station within walking distance. Food at 25 Degrees is delicious. I will recommend friends to stay here. We were lucky to secure a room at such ideal location at the very last minute of new year's eve. Staff were very prompt and courteous on any of our request during our stay. Keep it up ✅ Overall had a good experience with Hotel G. 🙂

Me and my partner check in late . We book the park view room but there’s no one park view room available. So have to downgrade to city view which we don’t mind. But feel that they should reserve the room .
Rooms are very compact and "cosy". Clean and value for money. Centralised location and easy access to the MRT and food nearby.
Very clean hotel & cosy...
Clean and comfort place to chill, and relax.

reviews.review_title: Decent ! For its location and friendliness of the staffs”
reviews.review_comment: Thanks Aiman for facilitating the stay. I had a last min booking during Christmas but had an exceptional stay.
Clean & Comfortable Room, But Too Bright! Easy Access To City Or Temples Or Nearby Food Centre. Nice Pub & Decor.

reviews.review_title: Value for money, wifi may be an issue”
reviews.review_comment: Definitely worth the price. Strategic location. Very helpful staff as I was serving my quarantine while waiting foe PCR test result. The Wifi can be unstable at times though.

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel room with many food arnd the hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Nice hotel room with many food arnd the hotel

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel at a good location”
reviews.review_comment: My first time staying in this hotel. Location: Good location as it's near Sim Lim Square, shopping centers, and food courts/restaurants. Transportation: Near bus stops and 10 min walking to MRT. Room: Small but comfortable. There's not much of a view out of my room. Some of the electrical outlets and light bulbs were burnt out and need to be replaced, and there's quite a bit of dust that can be seen behind the TV since it's mounted in a way that can be seen easily. Staff: Friendly and efficient. Parking: Ample paid parking within the building. Overall enjoyed my stay for a few nights.

Hidden gem in town. Loved the huge tv and good shower. However, there were ants in the room and cigarette smell (even though it’s a non-smoking hotel). Service could have been better. But overall for the price paid, I think it’s decent enough.
My 1st encounter, as a hotel guest, I had to pay for carpark. Should add all room rates with carpark. Overall satisfied.
Nice hotel n good food
An amazing stay. Being an amazing affordable boutique hotel is not easy to maintain but you guys did it with great customer service. Having basic gym with boutique ambience is nice.
Great room ambience
ok
It would be wonderful if a fridge could be provided in the room
excellent nice. No parking place.
Cosy, quite nice bedroom but poor bathroom/toilet design. Floor always wet and never dry throughout my stay. Otherwise great location, lots of food nearby.
Very bad experience, in Covid-19’s times also Not clean the room

I realised I left my expensive silk pyjamas in hotel after checking out. When I called to Hotel G for several times and they feedback that they will get back to me but never called me back after waiting for 1 day. Every time I called back and their staffs just gave me the same answer which are their staffs are still busy to clean other rooms. Truly disappointed with the service.
the mattress is super soft... did not have a good rest. the aircon was making noise.... 🤦‍♂️ 🤦‍♂️ 🤦‍♂️

a funky hotel, getting there for first timer was not easy as the hotel entrance/lobby/driveway is on level 2 (Had to enter the building carpark to get there). Not suitable for couple imo as the room is really tiny but efficient. The frontdesk staff are polite and helpful. Overall a good experience.. Thank you!

I'm not sure if it is because they were overwhelmed, but there were a few pain points. Let's go through the good points first. 1) Room was a bit more spacious than I expected, with the toilet quite generous. More importantly, the room was clean and the bed was comfortable. 2) Even though there wasn't a refrigerator, staff was kind enough to offer a solution which was to place it in a common refrigerator and retrieve it later. Now, the not so good points. 1) The reception is always busy. 9 times out of 10, nobody picks up my call. And I wasn't calling at the peak period (i.e. check in check out timing) either. 2) I understand that parking is not included, and that was made clear when I asked the staff. Staff mentioned that there is a max charge of $15. Imagine my shock when I was charged almost double of that. I'm not sure if a coupon was needed to get that flat rate or not, but I wasn't offered and it was implied to me that per entry, that was the maximum I'll be charged and that it'll be automatic. It's not a large amount but it sure left a sour taste in my mouth. Overall, it's not too bad, a little pricey but maybe don't come when they're busy.
Paid King bedroom but room size quite small...But everything is good.
Paid King bedroom but room size quite small...But everything is good.
Nice room and staff, but super long wait.

Honestly speaking, the room that I book is very small for this price. Ambience wise thumb up and that comes with a window view that can see bit of MBS. Room a bit dusty and can see cob web on the ceiling. Pillow is also very thin. Bed placement is not fantastic at all for a chinese who is superstitious as the bed is facing the door directly. Power point is also very limited. No bidet in the toilet as well. But the pressure of the rainshower is damn good. Check in wise is fast and smooth. Overall experience - average for this hefty price.
Room was super small, toilet was horrible. Have mosquito in the room…
Friendly staff and seamless check-in, great experience
Air cond no cold enough The controller unable to control the temperature correctly

Went to Hotel G to celebrate my birthday and anniversary with my hubby. We love the lightings in the room. Room was clean. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Breakfast @ 25 degrees was really good. Gym was also equipped with good and new machines for a good workout. Only thing missing is that the hotel does not have a pool. Else we would really enjoy the stay even more.
Clean and well decorated
Great location n easy access to food places
Nil
Refer to my other review for details.

The hotel is just 3 minutes walk away from Bencoolen MRT exit A. Right at the lobby is a burger restaurant / chill bar, not to mention the ample food options around the area. At this pricing, you are getting hot shower, clean bed, cold aircon and free water/coffee/tea/good toiletries. Highly recommeneded!
