Location: Right above the Outram Park mrt station. With a sort of dedicated route to the hotel via an elevator from right inside the station. Very convenient. Hotel room: Size is not that spacious but still okay at 22m2 as per its website for the basic room. Our booked King bed was actually 2 singles merged into one. Minus a point for not informing us at the reception. Overall room is clean. Bathroom/toilet is very small. First time I ever got "damaged" twice while in the toilet during my shower. First my right hand swung onto the bath soap tray during shower and while drying myself outside the shower my back knocked against the metal sharp end of the shower door handle. Fortunately it was not that hard that would cause a deep painful bruise. Lastly the toilet door was not working as well. Staff: I have no issues with anyone. Everyone was very efficient and helpful. Due to the SG Clean status of this hotel, the various procedures to ensure everyone's safety from the pandemic were not that inconvenient at all. Sound out to the front office staffs from Rachel who checked us in as well as the entrance lady who'd explained clearly what we needed to do to enter the hotel premises daily. Facilities: The swimming pool was quite nice. We were only allowed an hour daily and the added step to appear at the front desk just to collect the card pass was slightly inconvenient. Would it not be more useful to allow this set hour to be programmed into our hotel room cards instead of needing to go physically collect it at the reception when using the pool? Another minus half point. Summary: We would come back if we need to go Chinatown again and when the price is as good as what we got.
Good location, near chinatown. Clean.
Offer price, worth to stay. Check in a little bit slow. Location near chinatown, nearby chinatown hawker and market. Carpark need to purchase coupon @$12 per entry.

reviews.review_title: Awesome service and near to MRT”
reviews.review_comment: It is very accessible to MRT and within walking distance! The staffs are very very friendly and polite! I booked this very last minute for my boyfriend’s birthday and I requested for early check-in and they accepted my request. Room view is great with city view though it’s not on high level. Very happy with our stay! I will def come back again!

I was assigned a check in time but couldn't make it and would be late so I called their reservation line and was very surprised by how fast they picked up my phone call! The ladies (I've made several calls) were very pleasant over the phone. The hotel is located very conveniently above Outran MRT and there is a lift that leads to B1 of the MRT. Room is a little small but nonetheless it's clean and cosy for 1 night. Will definitely come back again when I'm burnt out and needed some time away from home!
Love it will come back!!

reviews.review_title: Nice clean hotel, but not for drivers”
reviews.review_comment: If you drive, be warned hotel car park is not included and is very expensive.
Nice, clean and spacious room. But aircon control doesn't work, it was freezing cold
Slow customer service. Never answer calls. Not going back

Friendly and helpful staff. Comfortable and clean Splash Room and great location for shopping. Convenient public transport. If only the restaurant was open. Overall, I had a great staycation with my cousin. Thanks to all at Dorsett SG.

Expected that with time slot arranged to check in for guest will fasten the process of check in. But guess what, from we que till we done the check in, it took 30 mins. The que was so long. Quite disappointed for the waiting time during the check in.
Room was spacious enough for couples and there was everything you need. I love the rain shower from the high celling. Do note that the toilet doors cannot be lock as there is no lock on it.

Very convenient location, the entrance to Outram Park MRT station is very close the hotel entrance. Chinatown is only a few bus stops away, Keong Saik Road is only a few minutes away with a lot of restaurant. Room size is adequate with comfortable bedding, strong shower and decent wifi speed. Check-in process is slower than some hotels but overall a pleasant stay.
Had my bday bash with my friend.. they are strict but we understand why. Staff and Managers are really kind and very professional.
Had my bday bash with my friend.. they are strict but we understand why. Staff and Managers are really kind and very professional.

hotels.name: lyf Funan Singapore (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 67 Hill Street, City Hall, Singapore, Singapore, 179370

reviews.review_comment: Sound proofing is very bad for this hotel rooms. Otherwise it will be a very good hotel at city center
This is my 4th time staying in this hotel.. my daughter really enjoy their bunk bed. Unfortunately, I’m still trying to book their 2 bedroom studio but not luck 🤣

Have been visiting Lyf for 3-4 occasions, really like the place, easy check in, near to many food and entertainment. Really like the place. However, had a not really good experience on my last stay. Not sure if it's the chemical used for washing the bedsheet too strong or what but it triggered my rashes. Didnt really enjoy myself during the 3days stay as i can't sleep and eat well. But overall i will still recommend Lyf to my friends.
Highly recommended to stay! Cozy room , clean and great environment.
Near everything, worth the money
Accessibility to town is great, with clean rooms and a good view.
The room is really clean and cosy. Great location too. We enjoyed exploring the different photo spots in the hotel!
very nice staffs!
Easy access to food with plenty of choices in the mall.
Interesting living in the city kind of accommodation. Will even consider to place guests if coming to Singapore for short stay. Location is good and everything is available in the mall.
Will stay again!

Check-in took us sometime as we cant retrieve our booking in the app. But the staff are very patient while assisting us. The location is good. There are plenty of food selection in the mall, and even nearby. So far a pleasant stay in this hotel

reviews.review_title: Good stay for Altogether Rooms for family”
reviews.review_comment: We booked Altogether Rooms (4 bedrooms) for our family of five. There is no TV but a big screen with Samsung Flip where u need to chromecast anything u want to watch from your handphone. Rooms are clean. There's a small kitchenette where u can cook but the anti-stick pan got alot of scratches, so didnt use. Can go to communal kitchen on 3 flr for cooking. Service is good, friendly staff.

reviews.review_title: Value for Money, Location is Good”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel is new as well!
An apartment with shared kitchen and facilities, very unique. Good for long stay
A great place to stay, room was big enough for 2. Encounter aircon issues during our stay but was resolved in time. Staff were excellent!

We kept seeing lyf funan's hotel on TikTok and decided to try it out. we were amazed by the different facilities available and would definitely book a longer stay in the future. the staffs were friendly as they attended to us patiently, knowing it was our first time.
Great

The pantry was the only thing that was bad I can talk about. It was really full and the bins were overflowing. Other than the fact that there is no TV in the room we were in, the place was really nice.
Nice room n location, wish all the room had a tv.. not only for selected rooms

reviews.review_title: Lovely Staycation in a Modern Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Value for money. Great location, very accessible. Lots of food options in the Funan Mall. Will definitely book again.
Me and my gf was served by a Staff named Win, he was friendly and attend to our questions and needs patiently. The hotel room is clean and neat. We loved the studio simple design
Highly recommend
Similar to hotel except it doesn't equipped with TV. Comfortable bed for good night 😴! Value for 💰!
Location is amazing! Hotel room is comfortable. Will definitely come back for another staycation

Lyf is definitely for young adults and people who like to socialize and lazy to go out to buy food. More like a hostel than a hotel, which is cool. One of A Kind room is not bad after all, no TV but it's cozy, suitable for people to do their work from home days. Plenty of restaurants as the hotel is in Funan Mall, you won't die from hunger. There's a huge kitchen pantry for guests to use, you can cook and feel free to use the kitchen's equipment. I would recommend this hotel to young adults to have a good time with their friends. Definitely, not a kid-friendly hotel. I would return though!
Check in time wasted 30 min to wait. Room no tv

It was alright for the room. Perhaps they can look into changing their wooden small chairs into something more comfortable maybe office chair? Room Air Con isn't that cold. Really disappointed, perhaps I won't choose this hotel for a long stay. Unless they fix their air con.

reviews.review_title: Second stay here less stellar than first!”
reviews.review_comment: I think the room allocated to you will make or break your experience here. Second time here I was banished to a really far end room so it was quite a walk there and the view was not as immerse. Im also surprised to see lots of people still there, even at common areas in the heightened phase. I still wish there is a TV for the basic rooms, it will do much to enhance the excitement here.
Room was clean, well designed. They have

Managed to check in slightly early. The staff there were really friendly and nice. The room has no TV but the internet speed offset it. Room was clean as well. All in all, would really recommend Lyf hotel :)
good

-No television in room. -No complimentary packet tea or anything. -No bottle drink. -No complimentary parking and i have to pay a lot. Staff never even ask me when I checked in. When ask, they are not even polite and just say it’s under Funan not them. Hello, I’m a guest here. -Staff lie about the view, telling me I have a good view. In the end, the view was a hotel block beside us. I’m okay if he tell me that I don’t have a nice view. Totally ridiculous.
one of the male staff should understand what he position are, you are in the service line not Army camp, The female receptionist are nice and friendly.

Had so much trouble checking in via the app. Front office agents were persistent to ONLY check-in via the app even with multiple failed attempts. Went to the room to unlock using the app, yet it failed. Come down to reception and told the issue, yet insisted to try again using the app to unlock. Until I requested physical card keys, they obliged. I was looking forward to the stay but due to the technological glitch, this dampened the staycation. I urged LYF by Ascott (a reputable brand) to relook into this and as it does not solve or provide a seamless check-in experience for the guests.
Interior design of the hotel is fun, minimalist and thoughtful! The staff is generally very nice and welcoming too. Great place for a short stay :)
Very nice
Convenient and very comfortable rooms, we shall be back again when the situation gets better!!!
Nice and clean room but do not provide tv console.

reviews.review_title: Tiny room in a Central Mall”
reviews.review_comment: Check-in is via mobile phone. Which can be used to access doors and room. Space is quirky and hip. Nice concept. Staff is very courteous and polite. The hotel is in Funan Mall, which is very convenient and near many bus/mrt. Cleanliness has to improve abit. As there is an uninvited tiny visitor in room
Clean, convenient, friendly staff
Strategic location, nice bunk beds, spacious and friendly staff!
Booked a much needed 'me time' staycay. Location is great and accesssible. Room is cosy and clean.

A 1 night solo staycation. Location was amazing as it is mere distance from the mrt station and located in a mall with loads of food options! Staffs were friendly and professional. Was greeted and attended to the moment i entered. The attendant too greeted me and gave me directions when she saw me at the corridor. High tech and modern space. Room was big enough for 1 or possibly 2. Bed was comfy! Like what others have reviewed, pillows can be a little too soft but it was alright for me. No TV but that's fine too. Mugs, mini kettle, hair dryer were available. Will definitely come back again!

reviews.review_title: A hostel-like hotel that bonds people together”
reviews.review_comment: My husband and I like the whole concept of a place to shop, work, meeting new people and holiday at the same time. The staff are wonderful and the room is really not bad. We like the shared facilities and the design of the place. It's definitely one of its kind in SG and we enjoyed our stay. Will recommend to our friends/families who wants an upgrade from staying in typical hostels/chalets.

reviews.review_title: Compact room that value for money ”
reviews.review_comment: Pleasant staycation with my wife, the room's facilities was not as complete as some others (no TV, fridge), but overall design & structure are new and cozy. But a bad experience happened during our stays, where the receptionists were not well-communicated and most of the tenants have been delayed for check-in, included ours. Strongly recommend to approach the reception prior to check-in timing as it might take a long process.

Had a really great solo staycation; room is very cosy and staff and super nice and friendly. Senior Lyf-Guard (that's what the staff at the concierge are called) namely: Win gave an impeccable service; remembers me by face and name at once, and helped me my e-keycard issue without me needing to give much details as he remembered that i had booked 2 nights under 2 different platforms, and may face that issue. I personally also enjoyed the free photo booth that creates a gif file for you out of 4 photos... had fun with that alone, as well as with my friends who came over to view the property. Only 2 things to feedback for improvement: 1. Hot water took quite sometime to come on, had to run under cold water for 5 minutes before hot water comes out for shower. 2. Wifi Internet speed is super low at times with speed of 13Mbps; quite impossible to get some work done; had to link to my own mobile data to do work instead (good if you are trying to escape from work and have a real staycay, haha). I definitely see myself going back to Lyf again for staycay; looking forward to the next round I can get some off-time. Highly recommended!
Able to house all 6 of us under 1 room, different vibes! Hope to come back soon!

You can help the firestation's ambulance going out at night or in the day time. Pillow too soft and there's no basic cable service in the room. Even Budget hotel like Big hotel & hotel 81 has basic cable services in the room.
Nice
Great place to unwind during a long weekend ! Adjacent mall has many nice eateries with discounted price if you are a lyf-ian :) Definitely would recommend for short staycation.
Loved staying here - would come back again!

I usually leave reviews not just only to those bad experiences but most definitely for great ones. This is was a trial staycation for me and my wife. We heard from past reviews that they have thin walls and you would hear sirens from SCDF which is right across the street. We still decided to give it a go. When we arrived, we where feel welcome by the team especially those young and tall guys which I think is part of the mgmt team and not the front desk. They set expectation that the check in will have wait time but they are working as fast as they can and to stay in their co-working space infront. After a few minutes it was our turn and they explained everything to us about the stay. The room was high enough as requested. Throughout our stay I would say they have been consistently providing excellent service even to your simple inquiry. I hope they can keep this culture and personality while they are working and while the hotel is in business. The co-spaces are well planned. I was able to work in their co-office space. My was able to spent some time in the gym where they have a human size hamster wheel as substitute for a treadmill. Though we did not use the shared kitchen but I think others will find it useful. As the covid situation here is set to zero we are not being complacent in using shared utensils and kitchenware. The room is wide enough for 2 persons but I still which there are 2 chairs which can accommodate 2 person on their desk to perform work related duties, other than that... there’s no TV, which is good, no fridge.. which we wish it had. The aircon is great... No issues. The toilet is large enough for my big built. They have Shower gel, conditioner and shampoo incase you need to know. Dont forget to download their app. It’ll be useful as a mobile key to your room and other shared spaces. Everyone is great in LYF. We live LYF to the fullest. Thanks for the experience.

reviews.review_title: Good central location. good food. good shopping.”
reviews.review_comment: Good central location. good food. good shopping.
Very nice
No TV. No coffee/tea. No bottled water (had to use a jug to fill up). No refrigerator. No bathroom amenities except toothbrushes and shower/shampoo gel. Super small gym (useless). Slow wi-fi.

The room was crazy beautiful. Great layout, spacious to a sin, and very functional. Facilities were cool - there was a fun lobby area and a quaint gym - and proved to be great photo backdrops. Located within Funan so dining options were varied and plentiful.

This was my second stay in this hotel. Please be aware that there isn’t a tv in this room but tbh I didn’t really care since we travelled around the area most of the time anyway! Good location with really convenient mall underneath. Only downside, it is beside the firehouse so alarms and firefighter bells are can be heard sparingly throughout the night.
good

We had booked the 6 bedroom duplex and had a whale of a time with our group of 5 (was a pity the cap was still at 5 then). There was plenty of personal space as well as when the group wanted to come together to chill and share a meal. Will definitely book again.
Design Modern & share kitchen available
Not advise for leisure or family stay

This is just the place if you would like to just 'netflix & chill'. Simple, clean design of the room. No tv so you gotta bring your own laptop/projector. Staff were very friendly and you will be spoilt for food choices given the hotel is right on top a shopping mall. Would revisit again!
Good location. Direct link to Funan Mall. 5-8mins walk to MRT station (City Hall). But no TV and refrigerator in the room.
The design is not ok, very noisy, no fridge inside the room
We love the all together Room. It is so spacious and clean. Easy check-in and out.

Booked a 4-room apartment at lyf funan. The place is very accessible, is located inside the mall. Have sufficient kitchenwares, did some cookings during our stay. The apartment is very clean and tidy. Polite & friendly staffs. Highly recommend others to stay here too. Will make another booking soon. 👍👍
Amazing for a group stay. Spacious living area and kitchenette. Comfy beds and fun design! Can’t wait to stay again.

Really great place for a group staycay, everyone was really impressed with how nice the apartment and rooms are. No lack of food options to choose from since it's right inside Funan mall. No TV isn't such a big deal; you can chromecast/screen-mirror to the Samsung Flip projector to watch shows from your mobile device. Only downside was the roller blinds in the rooms that didn't keep the light out that well, best to bring sleeping mask or get from the reception.

reviews.review_title: Noises from construction start 12am until 2~3 am for 2 nights”
reviews.review_comment: I'm writing this at 2 am, as there are ongoing drilling noises from nearby that disturb my sleep and I'm frustrated can't sleep now. It happened yesterday too and I called to reception to complain, I'm not sure whether the noise stop or I eventually fall asleep due to super tired. And it happens again now. It started around 12am but I was doing work so I was hoping it will stop by the time I go to sleep. But sadly it did not, and it is 2 am now. Call to inform the reception at 1.30 am but the noise still there. I guess maybe it is out of their control? The hotel itself is good and the staff are friendly and helpful. The bed is comfortable. But because of the disturbed sleep, I'm really not in the mood to share much on it. I can only give it 5 stars to say that it is really good except my disturbed sleep. Hope the hotel will settle the noises for the following days but I'm saying goodbye to my good night sleep and prepare for a sleepy Friday ...
Great location, friendly staffs. Cosy room but didn't aware the room that I booked w/o tv

Location was great, just above the funan Mall which has lots of food options. Price was pretty affordable too but the actual room layout was different from their website. We were supposed to have 2 toilets but ended up only with 1. Not sure if we were given a wrong room. Also, not much facilities (gym was small) and no pool. Nice common area at lobby.

Stayed here for two nights with friends in the larger all-together room for 6 people. We were very comfortable and enjoyed the access to shops just downstairs within Funan. Convenient kitchenette with a microwave. Bonus points to the toilet with bidet and rain shower. We were also able to loan a HDMI cable from the reception for connecting devices to the large TV in the living room. Overall a great place to unwind with friends.
slightly noisy due to acoustic work. and there's no TV in the room. Fridge is shared too.
Location is good! Value for money, different room types to suit your needs! Friendly staff! Will be back! :)

Great location within the mall. Nice and clean room that comes with a kitchen. Love the hotel design and concept. Great staffs too. Will be perfect if there’s tv in the room and can provide bedroom slippers.
It's the best place to stay for a short staycation, there was Alot of nice food just underneath and it's perfect for foodie
This is by far one of the best and affordable hotel for 4 room apartment to spend time with family
Everything is good just no tv in room :(
Staff were very friendly n helpful, rooms were fabulous
Great place with really chill vibes
Good location. Spacious room. Lots of instaworthy places for photoshoot

Hip and attractive lobby with array of facilities and decor, kids love it! Great for families to stay together for bonding, it’s a bit noisy as the compressor of next building is next to my room. Booked a room for 6 but only 1 litter bin, no TV at all which you may say is to foster bonding but staying up to date on the news is important for us. Will recommend to people :)

reviews.review_title: Lack of concierge access from unit”
reviews.review_comment: I was on the 12th floor (1239) and the unit nor the shared area (microwave/fridge area) did not have any access/phone to call concierge. I was accidentally locked from the outside as I was microwaving my food, my phone was inside the unit, I was wearing boxers only. Then the security asked me to just go down the concierge at the 4th level. Anything you can do with that?

Love the location which is near to amenities & shopping, very convenient to get food & entertainment. Except the check-in process is very slow, staff even request we pass him our NRIC which is against PDPA policy in Singapore unless you are at the check-in counter. He brought arouns not only our NRIC but others too, he walks around with asking other guests to do the same. When I later ask him back for my NRIC since I saw what he is doing, he even threaten that if I never submit to him my NRIC I will not be able to check-in. Why can't the hotel issue Tickets instead if they are expecting many guests to check in around the same time. Check-in process must be improved!!
Comfort and clean
Great stay with my gf, all the nearby mall is around Good for couple to go on quiet moment
Facilities are well maintained & clean. Staff is friendly & helpful. Location is super. We like the way the place is decorated - unique & cheerful.
Very Clean & Great customer service.
good

reviews.review_title: Excellent features and up to standards ”
reviews.review_comment: As a name of the SHA, I would like to express my heartfelt appreciation to the FOA for accommodating my stay. Went the extra mile and met my requirements, the female staff was really helpful and polite. Establishment features were excellent and felt really taken care of. Highly recommended!!! Located on top of Funan Mall makes it really convenient to get stuff and the guidelines of covid-health was adhered. Will visit again soon.
Definitely will stay again, like the room design and all the facility, it will be good if can have cheaper parking fee, the parking fee really expensive.

i like the room...clean and very nice. but the is no tv, telephone and no room service (u need extra towel etc, u will need to go down to reception), they only do basic room cleaning for 3 nights n above. 2nights and below no cleaning. i dont mind actually. the staff are very friendly and excellent location. will definately visit again. Highly recomended for dont mind the trade offs for price and location with basic aminities and no room services.
Highly recommend this hotel very clean and the staff are friendly..
The hotel has not tv, not an issue for us. Room is clean and simple. A bit on the expensive side for the price.

The 5th floor kitchen is messy , fridges give out a stench, cabinets full of spilled food. The people do not wear masks while cooking in the kitchen. The room is small so be careful of moving around. The staff are wonderful.
Overall was good. Location was convenient. Very near to Font canning park and Clark quay. Only inconvenience is fridge is not in the room. And should provide bottled water.

A young guy staff (Zhen Jie / Jun Jie, sorry i didnt catch the name correctly) who help me with my check in was very friendly and helpful. Help me with my request and late check out on the next day. The check in process is fast and i love the simplicity of the room and the hotel concept. It is a Staycation for my wedding anniversary, though the hotel do not provide room deco but they help me decorate the chalk board outside of the room and help me write a card which i requested for. Down side is the refrigerator on each level is very small and full but overall happy with the stay.

It was indeed a very awesome experience and my wife and I got ourselves a pretty decent room. We liked the idea of a shared kitchen and would most likely recommend and choose to go back again if given the chance. :)
